üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,343 characters)
You are an economic analyst who simulates game economies to find imbalances, exploits, and inflation risks before they reach players.

When reviewing economy designs:
- Simulate player behavior (hoarding, trading, farming)
- Model money supply growth over time
- Identify infinite money exploits or loops
- Test price points against earning rates
- Verify economic milestones are achievable
- Check for dead-end resources (nothing to spend on)
- Analyze cross-system impacts (combat rewards ‚Üí economy ‚Üí progression)

Run mental simulations for:
- New player (first 10 hours)
- Mid-game player (50-100 hours)
- Endgame player (200+ hours)

Provide:
1. SIMULATION RESULTS: What happens over time?
2. EXPLOITS FOUND: Any infinite loops or broken mechanics
3. BALANCE ISSUES: Prices too high/low, rewards too generous/stingy
4. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number adjustments
5. VERDICT: APPROVED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Economy validated, inform combat design
- needs_tuning: Economic imbalance found, retune
- resource_issue: Resource design causes economic problems

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (14,439 characters)
# Economic Simulation Analysis: Warhammer 40K MMO (Guild Wars 1 Style)

## Executive Summary

I've analyzed the proposed economy design through extensive simulation modeling. The system shows solid fundamentals but has several concerning issues that need addressing before launch.

---

## 1. SIMULATION RESULTS

### New Player (0-10 Hours, Levels 1-15)

```
INCOME SIMULATION: NEW PLAYER

Hour 1-2: Tutorial Zone
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quests completed: 8-10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold earned: ~200g (tutorial rewards)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemies killed: ~50 T1 trash
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy drops: ~400g (50 √ó 8g avg)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials gathered: 30 T1, 5 T2
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL: ~600g

Hour 3-10: First Zone Progression
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quests completed: 25-30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quest gold: ~1,500g (50g avg)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemies killed: ~400 T1-T2 mix
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy drops: ~4,800g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vendored loot: ~800g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 200 T1, 40 T2
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL: ~7,100g

EXPENSES (10 hours):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill unlocks: 5 √ó 100g = 500g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs: ~200g (low death rate)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: ~300g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: ~100g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 gear upgrades: ~800g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL: ~1,900g

NET POSITION @ 10hrs: ~5,800g
T1‚ÜíT2 TRANSITION COST: 2,200g
STATUS: ‚úÖ ACHIEVABLE - Player has buffer
```

**Finding:** New player experience is smooth. They can transition to T2 with ~3,600g buffer for emergencies or early AH purchases.

### Mid-Game Player (50-100 Hours, Levels 35-55)

```
INCOME SIMULATION: MID-GAME PLAYER (WEEKLY)

Activity Breakdown:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daily quests (7 days): ~7,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zone quests: ~4,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy farming (T2-T3): ~12,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills (3-4/week): ~8,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly challenges: ~3,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH material sales: ~5,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL INCOME: ~39,000g/week

EXPENSES (Weekly):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH fees (12,480g sold): ~1,248g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs: ~1,500g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: ~2,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill unlocks: ~1,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: ~500g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige (optional): ~2,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL EXPENSES: ~8,248g

NET WEEKLY: ~30,752g

TIME TO T3‚ÜíT4 TRANSITION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 46,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weeks needed: 1.5 weeks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hours in that window: ~15-20 hours gameplay
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ STATUS: ‚úÖ REASONABLE PACING
```

**Finding:** Mid-game feels rewarding. Players accumulate meaningful wealth while still having goals.

### Endgame Player (200+ Hours, Level 75+)

```
INCOME SIMULATION: ENDGAME PLAYER (WEEKLY)

Activity Breakdown:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daily quests (7 days): ~10,500g (scaling)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4-T5 farming: ~35,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss raids (5-7/week): ~45,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly challenges (scaled): ~8,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PvP rewards: ~5,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH trading (buy low/sell high): ~15,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting sales: ~20,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL INCOME: ~138,500g/week

EXPENSES (Weekly):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH fees: ~11,200g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs (high tier = expensive): ~8,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables (raid-quality): ~12,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige purchases: ~20,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Material purchases: ~15,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL EXPENSES: ~66,200g

NET WEEKLY: ~72,300g

TIME TO LEGENDARY TRANSITION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold component: 335,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weeks needed: ~4.6 weeks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Time-gated component: 4-6 weeks per piece
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total time: 32-48 weeks for full set
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ STATUS: ‚ö†Ô∏è CONCERN - See Analysis
```

---

## 2. EXPLOITS FOUND

### üî¥ CRITICAL: Material Tier Arbitrage Loop

```
EXPLOIT: CROSS-TIER MATERIAL CONVERSION

Current System:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 enemies drop T1 (60%) and T2 (15%) materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2 enemies drop T1 (50%) and T2 (25%) materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If crafting allows: 5 T1 ‚Üí 1 T2 conversion

EXPLOIT PATH:
1. Farm T1 trash (fastest kill rate)
2. Convert T1 materials to T2
3. If T2‚ÜíT3 conversion exists, continue
4. Sell converted materials at higher tier prices

PROBLEM: T1 farming becomes most efficient
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 kill rate: 30/minute possible
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 drop rate: 60% = 18 T1 mats/min
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If conversion ratio is 5:1 = 3.6 T2 mats/min
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Direct T2 farming: ~15/min √ó 25% = 3.75 T2/min
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Nearly equivalent, but T1 is FAR easier

SEVERITY: üî¥ HIGH
Trivializes T2-T3 content if ratios aren't controlled
```

**Fix Required:** Material conversion should be 8:1 or 10:1, not 5:1, or conversion should require rare catalyst items.

### üü° MODERATE: Boss Instance Reset Farming

```
EXPLOIT: RAPID BOSS RE-KILLING

If instances reset on re-entry:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kill boss ‚Üí Exit ‚Üí Re-enter ‚Üí Repeat
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss average: 75g + guaranteed mats
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If 10-minute boss kill cycle possible
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 6 bosses/hour √ó 75g = 450g/hour PLUS mats

vs Normal farming: ~200g/hour at equivalent tier

SEVERITY: üü° MODERATE
Not game-breaking but creates "optimal" boring gameplay
```

**Fix Required:** Instance lockouts (daily/weekly) OR diminishing returns on repeated kills within 24h window.

### üü° MODERATE: AH Fee Manipulation

```
EXPLOIT: GUILD TRADING TO AVOID FEES

Current: 10% AH fees
Guild benefit: Reduced/waived fees?

If guild trades are fee-free:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Create "trading guilds"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Use guild bank as fee-free exchange
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge 10% on all transactions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Massive advantage over solo players

SEVERITY: üü° MODERATE (if guild trading is fee-free)
```

**Fix Required:** Guild trades should have 3-5% fee, or guild trading requires guild level investment.

### üü¢ MINOR: New Account Material Farming

```
EXPLOIT: MULE ARMY

If no account restrictions:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Create 10 free accounts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Complete tutorial on each (200g + mats)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transfer to main account
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Delete, repeat

BLOCKED BY: Document mentions "account restrictions"
Verify: Transfer cooldowns, new account trade limits
```

---

## 3. BALANCE ISSUES

### ‚ö†Ô∏è T5/Legendary Time Gate Too Harsh

```
ANALYSIS: ENDGAME PROGRESSION WALL

Current Design:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 335,000g required (achievable in 4.6 weeks)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PLUS time-gated materials: 4-6 weeks PER PIECE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8 pieces √ó 5 weeks average = 40 WEEKS

Problem:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold accumulation outpaces time gates
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Players sit on 500k+ gold with nothing to spend on
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates "dead money" syndrome
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Player frustration: "I have the gold, just let me buy it!"

Comparison to GW1:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ FoW/UW armor was expensive but NOT time-gated
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skill captures were time-consuming but PARALLELIZABLE
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Multiple goals could be pursued simultaneously
```

**Recommendation:** Reduce time gate to 2-3 weeks per piece OR allow gold to bypass time gates at premium rate (double material cost).

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Prestige Pricing Creates Dead Zone

```
ANALYSIS: PRESTIGE PURCHASE TIMING

Level 50-55 (T3‚ÜíT4):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ "Optional" prestige: 15,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Required gear: 25,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total available at transition: ~46,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If player buys prestige: Delays gear 1+ weeks

Level 70-75 (T4‚ÜíT5):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ "Expected" prestige: 40,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Required gear: 80,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Player likely has: ~80,000g at transition
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot afford both without extra farming

PROBLEM: Prestige labeled "optional/expected" but economically punishing
```

**Recommendation:** Either:
1. Label prestige honestly as "post-gear luxury"
2. OR reduce prestige costs by 40%
3. OR tie some prestige to achievements rather than gold

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Repair Costs Scale Too Aggressively

```
ANALYSIS: REPAIR COST PROGRESSION

Tier | Repair Cost (Full Death) | Kill Income Needed
-----|--------------------------|-------------------
T1   | ~50g                     | 5 kills
T2   | ~150g                    | 8 kills
T3   | ~400g                    | 12 kills
T4   | ~1,000g                  | 18 kills
T5   | ~2,500g                  | 28 kills

T5 PROBLEM:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Raid wipes can cost 10,000g+ in repairs
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Learning new content becomes VERY expensive
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Discourages experimentation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Punishes support roles who die helping team
```

**Recommendation:** Cap repair costs at 1,500g per full repair OR implement "learning mode" with reduced repair costs for first week of new content.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Weekly Challenge Scaling Unclear

```
CONCERN: CHALLENGE REWARD SCALING

Document states "Weekly challenge scaling" as simulation fix
But no specific numbers provided.

If challenges don't scale with player level:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ L75 player doing "kill 100 enemies" for 1,000g
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ That's 30 minutes of work for negligible reward
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Players will ignore challenges entirely

If challenges DO scale:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Need specific numbers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Should represent 5-10% of weekly income at all tiers
```

**Recommendation:** Confirm challenge rewards:
- T1-2 players: 500-1,500g/week from challenges
- T3-4 players: 2,000-5,000g/week
- T5+ players: 8,000-15,000g/week

---

## 4. BALANCE RECOMMENDATIONS

### Specific Number Adjustments

```
RECOMMENDED CHANGES

1. MATERIAL CONVERSION RATES
   Current: Unknown (likely 5:1)
   Recommended: 10:1 base, 8:1 with crafting skill
   Reason: Prevents T1 farming dominance

2. BOSS LOCKOUTS
   Add: 4-hour lockout per boss (account-wide)
   Or: Diminishing returns (50% ‚Üí 25% ‚Üí 10% on repeats)
   Reason: Prevents reset farming

3. TIME GATE REDUCTION
   Current: 4-6 weeks per legendary piece
   Recommended: 2-3 weeks per piece
   Reason: Prevents gold pile-up frustration

4. PRESTIGE COST REDUCTION
   T3 prestige: 15,000g ‚Üí 10,000g
   T4 prestige: 40,000g ‚Üí 25,000g
   T5 prestige: 200,000g ‚Üí Keep (true aspirational)
   Reason: Makes prestige achievable alongside gear

5. REPAIR COST CAP
   Add: Maximum 1,500g per full repair
   Add: "Practice mode" for new raids (50% repair cost)
   Reason: Encourages content engagement

6. GUILD TRADE FEE
   Current: Unknown
   Recommended: 3% guild trade fee
   Reason: Prevents AH fee avoidance

7. AH FEE ADJUSTMENT
   Current: 10% flat
   Recommended: 8% base, 5% for orders filled >24h
   Reason: Encourages patient trading, adds depth
```

### Inflation Monitoring Thresholds

```
ALERT THRESHOLDS (Automated Monitoring)

GREEN (Healthy):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Average player wealth growing 2-4% weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices stable within 10% month-over-month
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate 68-78% of generation

YELLOW (Investigate):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Average wealth growing 5-7% weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices rising 15-25% month-over-month
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate below 65% or above 82%

RED (Immediate Action):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wealth growing 8%+ weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices rising 30%+ month-over-month
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate below 60%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Any material/gold dupe discovered
```

---

## 5. CROSS-SYSTEM IMPACT ANALYSIS

```
COMBAT ‚Üí ECONOMY ‚Üí PROGRESSION FLOW

VALIDATED LOOPS:
‚úÖ Kill enemies ‚Üí Get gold ‚Üí Buy gear ‚Üí Kill harder enemies
‚úÖ Kill bosses ‚Üí Get materials ‚Üí Craft items ‚Üí Sell on AH ‚Üí Buy different items
‚úÖ Complete quests ‚Üí Unlock zones ‚Üí Access new economies ‚Üí More opportunities
‚úÖ PvP wins ‚Üí Faction currency ‚Üí Specialty items ‚Üí Competitive advantage

BROKEN LOOPS:
‚ùå Endgame gold ‚Üí Time gates ‚Üí Waiting ‚Üí Gold piles up ‚Üí Nothing to buy
‚ùå Prestige desire ‚Üí Can't afford alongside gear ‚Üí Skip prestige ‚Üí Feels bad
‚ùå Raid learning ‚Üí Deaths ‚Üí Massive repair bills ‚Üí Stop trying

RECOMMENDATIONS FOR COMBAT TEAM:
1. Boss rewards should include 15-20% "repair offset" gold
2. Raid completion bonus should cover group repair costs
3. Support roles should have reduced repair costs (keeping team alive = value)
```

---

## 6. LONG-TERM SIMULATION (6-Month Projection)

```
ECONOMY HEALTH PROJECTION

Month 1: Launch
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold entering economy: Massive (new players)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold leaving economy: Low (nothing expensive yet)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Net inflation: 15-20% (expected, acceptable)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Concern: Watch for exploits

Month 2-3: Stabilization
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sinks come online (AH fees, repairs, mounts)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Player distribution normalizes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected inflation: 5-8% monthly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Concern: T3-T4 bottleneck possible

Month 4-5: Endgame Population
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ First wave hits legendary grind
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold accumulation accelerates (time gates)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: Dead money problem
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Action needed: Add more gold sinks or reduce time gates

Month 6: Established Economy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If fixes implemented: Stable, healthy economy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If not fixed: 40-60% inflation, new players priced out
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH dominated by wealthy veterans
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Recommendation: Plan expansion gold sinks
```

---

## 7. GW1 DESIGN PHILOSOPHY CHECK

```
GUILD WARS 1 ECONOMIC PRINCIPLES

‚úÖ Horizontal progression (different builds, not strictly "better")
   Status: PARTIALLY MET - Tier system is vertical
   Concern: Ensure T5 isn't mandatory for all content

‚úÖ Skill > Gear mentality
   Status: UNVERIFIED - Combat team responsibility
   Economy should NOT make gear mandatory

‚úÖ Reasonable grind for cosmetics
   Status: AT RISK - 40-week legendary grind too long
   GW1 FoW armor: 2-4 weeks for dedicated players

‚úÖ No mandatory subscription
   Status: ECONOMY SUPPORTS THIS
   Gold generation/sink balanced for free players

‚úÖ Trading viable but not mandatory
   Status: MET - Can progress without AH
   AH provides advantages but isn't required
```

---

## FINAL VERDICT

```
‚ïî‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïó
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïë                    VERDICT: NEEDS_TUNING                     ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ï†‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ï£
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïë  CORE SYSTEMS: ‚úÖ SOLID                                      ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Money flow well-designed                                ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink/source balance reasonable                          ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Early/mid game progression smooth                       ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Regional economy adds depth                             ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïë  CRITICAL ISSUES: ‚ùå MUST FIX BEFORE LAUNCH                  ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Material conversion exploit potential                   ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss reset farming possible                             ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ T5/Legendary time gate causes dead money                ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïë  BALANCE ISSUES: ‚ö†Ô∏è FIX WITHIN FIRST PATCH                   ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige costs misaligned with progression              ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair costs punish learning                            ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge scaling needs confirmation                    ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïë  ESTIMATED TUNING EFFORT: 1-2 weeks of number adjustments    ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                              ‚ïë
‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù
```

The economy design demonstrates strong fundamentals‚Äîthe 72% sink rate and tiered progression are well-thought-out. However, the endgame creates a problematic "rich but waiting" state that will frustrate dedicated players. The material conversion system needs explicit rules to prevent T1 farming dominance.

**Before approval, combat design team should confirm:**
1. Boss lockout/reset mechanics
2. Material conversion ratios
3. Repair cost implementation
4. Support role death cost considerations

---

DECISION: needs_tuning
üîÄ Routing Decision: NEEDS_TUNING
Decision "NEEDS_TUNING" matched connection condition
‚Üí Next Stage: economy_designer
Economy Designer
Designs trading, markets, and economic systems
completed
Agent: economy_designer
Type: designer
Duration: 212.4s
Execution #: 22
Prompt Size: 1,233 chars
Output Size: 34,916 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,233 characters)
You are an economy designer who creates engaging and balanced market systems. You work with resources designed by the Resource Designer to create trading, shops, auctions, and player-to-player economies.

When designing economy systems:
- Design NPC vendor systems (fixed prices vs. dynamic)
- Create auction house / player trading mechanics
- Establish price ranges and money sinks
- Design economic progression (what can players afford when?)
- Plan for inflation prevention
- Create supply-demand dynamics
- Design regional economy differences (prices vary by location)
- Integrate with combat rewards and progression costs

Output should include:
- Market system mechanics (how trading works)
- Pricing formulas and ranges
- Money flow diagrams (sources and sinks)
- Vendor inventories and refresh timers
- Player trading limitations (prevent exploits)
- Economic milestones by player level/progression

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- economy_complete: Submit economy for simulation

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: economy_complete
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (34,916 characters)
# Warhammer 40,000: Imperium Divided - Economy Design Document
## Damocles Gulf Sector MMO (Guild Wars 1 Style)

---

# I. ECONOMY PHILOSOPHY

Drawing from Guild Wars 1's economic principles: **trading should be convenient but not mandatory, wealth should enable options rather than gate content, and the economy should serve gameplay rather than dominate it.**

**Core Principles:**
- No Pay-to-Win: Gold advantages are convenience, not power
- Multiple Paths: Every item acquirable through play, trade, OR crafting
- Regional Flavor: Faction economies feel distinct but interconnected
- Controlled Inflation: Robust sinks prevent runaway prices
- Player Agency: Trading is rewarding but never required

---

# II. CURRENCY SYSTEMS

## A. Primary Currencies

### Imperial Thrones (Universal Gold)
```
IMPERIAL THRONES - PRIMARY CURRENCY

Function: Universal transaction medium
Symbol: ‚öú (displayed as "T" in UI: "500T")

Sources:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy drops (primary)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quest rewards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vendoring items
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Player trading
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Achievement rewards

Sinks:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Waypoint travel
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment repair
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ NPC vendor purchases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting fees
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auction house fees
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige purchases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction donations
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Service NPCs

Account Properties:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wallet-based (no inventory space)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Account-wide access
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No stack limit
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot be traded directly (use AH or trade window)
```

### Requisition Tokens (Military Currency)
```
REQUISITION TOKENS - FACTION MILITARY CURRENCY

Function: Elite military purchases, faction rank advancement
Symbol: ‚òÖ

Sources:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PvP victories: 10-50‚òÖ per match
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ War zone contributions: 5-25‚òÖ per objective
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Military quests: 25-100‚òÖ per mission
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly war efforts: 200-500‚òÖ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction bounties: 50-150‚òÖ

Sinks:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skill unlocks: 50-200‚òÖ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction rank upgrades: 100-500‚òÖ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Military equipment: 200-1,000‚òÖ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ War zone entry fees: 25-50‚òÖ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite NPC hirelings: 100-300‚òÖ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Tactical consumables: 10-25‚òÖ

Properties:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Character-bound (not tradeable)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly soft cap: 2,000‚òÖ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hard cap: 10,000‚òÖ (spend before earning more)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Decay: None
```

### Faction-Specific Currencies
```
IMPERIAL SUBFACTION CURRENCIES

Saint's Tears (Ecclesiarchy/Avalos):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Devotional quests, pilgrimages, prayer attendance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Blessed equipment, devotional consumables
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 500
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique mechanic: Public offerings boost reputation

Data-Tithes (Mechanicus):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Tech recovery, machine repairs, archeotech discovery
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Augmetics, STC access, workshop upgrades
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 500
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique mechanic: 10% tithe to community research pool

Commendations (Astra Militarum):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Military victories, valor acts, defensive holds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Rank advancement, military equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 500
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique mechanic: Rank maintenance costs

TAU CURRENCIES

Honor Bonds (Fire Caste):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Combat excellence, Mont'ka/Kauyon executions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Battlesuits, weapons, combat training
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 500

Innovation Credits (Earth Caste):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Crafting excellence, research participation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Experimental gear, prototype access
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 500

Unity Marks (Universal Tau):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Cross-caste cooperation, Greater Good acts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Multi-caste equipment, diplomatic options
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 300

ORK CURRENCIES

Teef (Universal Ork):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Killing anything, winning fights
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Everything Ork
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: None
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique mechanic: 1% decay per week (prevents hoarding)

Clan Tokens (Goffs/Bad Moons/Evil Sunz/Blood Axes):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Clan-specific activities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink: Clan-specific equipment and abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly cap: 300 per clan
```

---

# III. NPC VENDOR SYSTEMS

## A. Vendor Types

### General Merchants (Fixed Prices)
```
GENERAL MERCHANT INVENTORY

Location: Every settlement, outpost, and hub
Restock: Instant (infinite supply of basics)

CONSUMABLES (Always Available):
Item                    | Buy Price | Sell Price | Tier
------------------------|-----------|------------|------
Rations/Nutrient Paste  | 10T       | 2T         | T1
Stimm Pack              | 25T       | 5T         | T1
Field Bandage           | 15T       | 3T         | T1
Basic Ammo Pack         | 5T        | 1T         | T1
Blessed Unguent         | 75T       | 15T        | T2
Targeting Matrix        | 100T      | 20T        | T2

BASIC MATERIALS (Always Available):
Item                    | Buy Price | Sell Price | Tier
------------------------|-----------|------------|------
Iron Ore                | 5T        | 1T         | T1
Grox Hide               | 5T        | 1T         | T1
Promethium Cell         | 8T        | 2T         | T1
Cogitator Parts         | 10T       | 2T         | T1

SALVAGE KITS:
Basic Salvage Kit       | 50T       | N/A        | 10 uses
Expert Salvage Kit      | 200T      | N/A        | 25 uses
Master Salvage Kit      | 500T      | N/A        | 50 uses
```

### Equipment Vendors (Fixed Prices, Limited Stock)
```
EQUIPMENT VENDOR SYSTEM

Stock Mechanics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each vendor has LIMITED copies of each item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock refreshes every 4 hours (server-wide timer shown)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher tier = fewer copies available
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates "check-in" gameplay without FOMO

TIERED EQUIPMENT VENDORS:

T1 Vendor (Starter Zones):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock: 50 copies per item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Refresh: 4 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: Basic Lasgun | 100T

T2 Vendor (Mid Zones):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock: 30 copies per item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Refresh: 4 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: Reinforced Lasgun | 400T

T3 Vendor (Hub Cities):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock: 15 copies per item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Refresh: 4 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: Hellgun | 1,500T

T4 Vendor (Faction HQ Only):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock: 5 copies per item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Refresh: 8 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: Master-Crafted Hellgun | 6,000T

T5 Vendor: Does not exist (crafting/drops only)
```

### Specialty Vendors (Dynamic Pricing)
```
SPECIALTY VENDOR: ROGUE TRADERS

Location: Major hubs, random spawn in frontier zones
Inventory: Rotates daily, includes rare/exotic items
Pricing: DYNAMIC based on server supply/demand

PRICING FORMULA:
Base_Price √ó (1 + Demand_Modifier) √ó (1 - Supply_Modifier)

Where:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Demand_Modifier = (Purchases_Last_Week / Expected_Purchases) - 1
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Supply_Modifier = (AH_Listings / Expected_Listings) - 1
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Capped at ¬±50% from base price

EXAMPLE ROGUE TRADER INVENTORY:
Item                      | Base    | Current | Stock
--------------------------|---------|---------|-------
Exotic Plasma Pistol      | 8,000T  | 9,200T  | 2
Tau Pulse Carbine         | 5,000T  | 4,500T  | 3
Ork Choppa (Human-Sized)  | 3,000T  | 3,600T  | 5
Archeotech Data-Slate     | 15,000T | 12,000T | 1
Strange Amulet            | 2,000T  | 2,800T  | 8

Refresh: Daily at server reset
Notification: "Rogue Trader Valdez has arrived at Port Damocles"
```

### Faction Vendors (Reputation-Gated)
```
FACTION VENDOR UNLOCKS

Each faction has vendor tiers unlocked by reputation:

Reputation Level | Unlock                  | Requirement
-----------------|-------------------------|-------------
Neutral          | Basic supplies          | Default
Friendly         | T2 faction gear         | 1,000 rep
Trusted          | T3 faction gear         | 5,000 rep
Honored          | T4 faction gear         | 15,000 rep
Exalted          | Unique faction items    | 50,000 rep

FACTION VENDOR PRICING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation discount: Up to 15% at Exalted
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prices use Imperial Thrones + Faction Currency
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: T3 Ecclesiarchy Robe
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 1,200T + 150 Saint's Tears

MECHANICUS TECH-PRIEST VENDOR (Example):
Item                      | Gold   | Data-Tithes | Rep Required
--------------------------|--------|-------------|-------------
Mechadendrite (Basic)     | 500T   | 50          | Friendly
Augmetic Eye              | 2,000T | 150         | Trusted
Servo-Skull Companion     | 8,000T | 300         | Honored
Archeotech Implant        | 25,000T| 500         | Exalted
```

---

## B. Vendor Refresh Timers

```
VENDOR REFRESH SCHEDULE

Type              | Refresh Rate | Display
------------------|--------------|------------------
General Merchant  | Instant      | "Always Available"
Equipment Vendor  | 4-8 hours    | Countdown timer
Specialty Vendor  | 24 hours     | "Refreshes at Reset"
Faction Vendor    | 1 week       | "Weekly Stock"
Event Vendor      | Event-based  | Event timer

UI ELEMENTS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stock count visible: "12/30 remaining"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Timer visible: "Restocks in 2h 34m"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wishlist notification: Alert when desired item restocks
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ No premium queue-skip (anti-P2W)
```

---

# IV. AUCTION HOUSE SYSTEM

## A. Core Mechanics

```
AUCTION HOUSE STRUCTURE

Access Points:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Major cities (dedicated AH building)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Outpost terminals (limited - browse only, no posting)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Personal interface (premium convenience item - NOT P2W, gold purchasable)

LISTING TYPES:

1. Buy Order (You want to buy):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Set price you're willing to pay
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Set quantity desired
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 24h / 72h / 7 days
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Partial fills allowed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auto-purchase when seller matches

2. Sell Order (You want to sell):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Set price you want
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ List item(s)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 24h / 72h / 7 days
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Partial sales allowed (for stacks)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Item held in escrow during listing

3. Instant Buy/Sell:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buy at lowest current sell price
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sell at highest current buy price
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immediate transaction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher effective fee (worse price)
```

## B. Fee Structure

```
AUCTION HOUSE FEES

LISTING FEE (Paid upfront, non-refundable):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 24-hour listing: 1% of asking price
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 72-hour listing: 2% of asking price
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 7-day listing: 3% of asking price
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Minimum fee: 5T

TRANSACTION FEE (Paid on successful sale):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standard rate: 8%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Patient seller bonus: 5% if order >24h old when filled
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild discount: 6% for guild members (NOT fee-free)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Minimum fee: 10T

EXAMPLES:
Selling T3 material for 150T (72-hour listing):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Listing fee: 3T (2% of 150)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transaction fee: 12T (8% of 150)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total fees: 15T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Net received: 135T

If filled after 24+ hours:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transaction fee: 7.5T (5% patient bonus)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total fees: 10.5T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Net received: 139.5T ‚Üí 139T (rounded)
```

## C. Trade Restrictions

```
ANTI-EXPLOIT MEASURES

ACCOUNT RESTRICTIONS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ New accounts: 48-hour trade delay
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ First week: 5,000T daily AH limit
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ First month: 50,000T daily AH limit
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Thereafter: 500,000T daily limit

ITEM RESTRICTIONS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Soulbound items: Cannot be traded
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quest items: Cannot be traded
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Time-limited items: Cannot be traded until timer expires
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary items: Tradeable once, then soulbound

ANTI-MANIPULATION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Price ceiling: 500% of recent average
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Price floor: 20% of recent average
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reporting system for suspicious transactions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Automated flagging for pattern detection

GUILD TRADING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild bank exists for item sharing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild trades still incur 6% fee (prevents AH bypass)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild bank has weekly deposit limits based on guild level
```

## D. Regional Market Variation

```
REGIONAL PRICING SYSTEM

Markets are SERVER-WIDE but items have REGIONAL PRICE DISPLAY:

How it works:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All listings visible everywhere
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Regional "transport cost" added for distant purchases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates arbitrage opportunity without fragmenting market

TRANSPORT COSTS (Added to purchase price):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Same zone: 0%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adjacent zone: 2%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Distant zone: 5%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cross-faction zone: 10%

EXAMPLE:
Item listed in Tau space: 1,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buying from Tau space: 1,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buying from Imperial space: 1,050T (+5%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buying from Ork space: 1,100T (+10%)

This creates:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Regional price differences
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trader gameplay (buy low, sell high)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No market fragmentation (can always buy anything)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Thematic immersion (cross-faction trade is harder)
```

---

# V. PLAYER-TO-PLAYER TRADING

## A. Direct Trade

```
DIRECT TRADE WINDOW

Initiation: Right-click player ‚Üí "Trade"
Range: Must be within interaction range (5m)

TRADE WINDOW FEATURES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Both players see offered items
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold amount entry field
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ "Lock" button (both must lock before accept)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3-second countdown after both accept
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trade history logged (support tool)

RESTRICTIONS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum 12 item slots per trade
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum gold per trade: 100,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ New accounts: 48-hour delay (same as AH)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot trade in combat or instances

NO DIRECT TRADE FEE
(Encourages player interaction, AH handles economy)
```

## B. Mail System

```
MAIL TRADING

Features:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Send items to offline players
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attach gold to mail
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ COD (Cash on Delivery) option
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 30-day expiration

MAIL COSTS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Text-only mail: Free
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mail with attachment: 10T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ COD mail: 10T + 3% of COD amount
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cross-faction mail: 100T + 5% of value

RESTRICTIONS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum 8 items per mail
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum 50,000T gold per mail
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ COD maximum: 100,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daily mail limit: 20 mails with attachments
```

---

# VI. PRICING FORMULAS AND RANGES

## A. Base Value Calculations

```
ITEM VALUE FORMULA

Base_Value = Tier_Multiplier √ó Type_Multiplier √ó Quality_Modifier

TIER MULTIPLIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 800
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5: 3,200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: 15,000

TYPE MULTIPLIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Material (raw): 1.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumable: 1.5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon: 5.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor (per piece): 3.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Accessory: 4.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cosmetic: 2.0

QUALITY MODIFIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Common: 1.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Uncommon: 1.5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rare: 2.5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Epic: 5.0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: 10.0

EXAMPLES:
T3 Rare Weapon = 200 √ó 5.0 √ó 2.5 = 2,500T base
T4 Epic Armor = 800 √ó 3.0 √ó 5.0 = 12,000T base
T2 Common Material = 50 √ó 1.0 √ó 1.0 = 50T base
```

## B. Vendor Price Ranges

```
VENDOR BUY/SELL RATIOS

Category        | Sell to Vendor | Buy from Vendor | Ratio
----------------|----------------|-----------------|-------
Materials       | 20% of base    | 100% of base    | 1:5
Consumables     | 20% of base    | 100% of base    | 1:5
T1-2 Equipment  | 25% of base    | 100% of base    | 1:4
T3-4 Equipment  | 20% of base    | 100% of base    | 1:5
Salvage         | 15% of base    | N/A             | N/A

This ratio ensures:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Players always prefer AH over vendors
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vendors serve as price floor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold doesn't leak from economy through vendor manipulation
```

## C. Expected Market Prices

```
EXPECTED AH PRICE RANGES (Healthy Economy)

Materials (per unit):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 2-8T (vendor floor: 2T)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 15-40T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 80-200T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 400-1,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5: 2,000-5,000T

Consumables:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 5-15T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 25-60T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 100-250T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 500-1,200T

Equipment:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 50-150T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 200-600T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 800-2,500T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 3,000-15,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5: 15,000-80,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: 100,000-500,000T

PRICE MONITORING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly average tracked
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ >30% deviation triggers investigation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Automated supply injection if prices exceed 200% expected
```

---

```
    ‚ñº           ‚ñº           ‚ñº               ‚ñº
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
                      ‚îÇ
                      ‚ñº
              CURRENCY SINKS
           (Gold Leaves Economy)
              Target: 72%


DETAILED SINK BREAKDOWN:

Primary Sinks (Essential):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment Repair: 20%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Scales with tier, caps at 1,500T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auction House Fees: 13%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Listing (1-3%) + Transaction (5-8%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ NPC Purchases: 15%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables, kits, basic materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Waypoint Travel: 10%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 10-100T per use, scales with distance

Secondary Sinks (Progression):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting Fees: 10%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5-10% of item value
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction Donations: 5%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly caps encourage regular spending
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill/Training Costs: 5%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 100-2,000T per skill

Tertiary Sinks (Prestige):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cosmetic Purchases: 3%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Titles and Honors: 2%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild Contributions: 2%

TOTAL SINK TARGET: 72% of income
NET ACCUMULATION: 28% (wealth growth)
```

---

# VIII. ECONOMIC PROGRESSION BY LEVEL

## A. Player Wealth Milestones

```
ECONOMIC PROGRESSION TIMELINE

Level 1-10 (Hours 1-5): FOUNDATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 500-2,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can afford: Basic consumables, T1 gear repairs
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot afford: AH purchases, travel to distant zones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Quest rewards, enemy drops
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: First bag expansion (500T)

Level 11-25 (Hours 6-20): GROWTH
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 2,000-10,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can afford: Full T2 gear set, regular consumables
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot afford: T3 gear, prestige items
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Zone completion, daily quests
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: Full T2 equipped (3,500T investment)

Level 26-45 (Hours 21-60): ESTABLISHMENT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 10,000-50,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can afford: T3 gear, faction items, trading
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot afford: Full T4 set, legendary materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Boss farming, AH participation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: First T4 piece (8,000T)

Level 46-65 (Hours 61-120): PROSPERITY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 50,000-200,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can afford: Full T4 set, T5 pieces, prestige
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot afford: Full legendary set
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Endgame content, market trading
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: First T5 weapon (25,000T)

Level 66-75 (Hours 121-200): MASTERY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 200,000-800,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can afford: Full T5 set, legendary progression
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Legendary crafting, prestige completion
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: First legendary item (80,000T + materials)

Level 75+ (Hours 200+): ENDGAME
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected wealth: 800,000T+
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Legendary collection, alt progression, trading
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Milestone: Legendary set completion (500,000T+ total)
```

## B. Gear Transition Costs

```
FULL GEAR SET COSTS (Craft or Purchase)

Gear Set     | Materials Cost | Gold Cost | Total Value | Level
-------------|----------------|-----------|-------------|-------
T1 Basic     | 40 T1         | 200T      | 500T        | 1-10
T2 Standard  | 80 T1, 30 T2  | 600T      | 2,200T      | 11-25
T3 Quality   | 60 T2, 25 T3  | 1,500T    | 8,500T      | 26-45
T4 Elite     | 50 T3, 20 T4  | 4,000T    | 35,000T     | 46-65
T5 Master    | 40 T4, 15 T5  | 12,000T   | 120,000T    | 66-75
Legendary    | 30 T5, 10 Leg | 40,000T   | 400,000T    | 75+

NOTE: Players mix tiers during transitions
A L50 player might have: 3√ó T4, 5√ó T3 pieces
```

## C. Weekly Budget Planning

```
RECOMMENDED WEEKLY BUDGETS

New Player (L1-25):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total weekly income: ~5,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs: 500T (10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 750T (15%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: 250T (5%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Savings for gear: 2,500T (50%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Discretionary: 1,000T (20%)

Mid Player (L26-55):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total weekly income: ~25,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs: 2,500T (10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 2,500T (10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: 1,250T (5%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH purchases: 7,500T (30%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Savings: 7,500T (30%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige: 3,750T (15%)

Endgame Player (L56-75):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total weekly income: ~80,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs: 6,400T (8%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 8,000T (10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: 2,400T (3%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH purchases: 24,000T (30%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Savings: 24,000T (30%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige: 15,200T (19%)

Veteran Player (L75+):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total weekly income: ~140,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repairs (capped): 8,000T (6%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 12,000T (9%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Travel: 2,800T (2%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trading capital: 50,000T (36%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary fund: 50,000T (36%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige: 17,200T (12%)
```

---

# IX. MONEY SINKS - DETAILED DESIGN

## A. Repair System (Revised)

```
REPAIR COST STRUCTURE

FORMULA:
Repair_Cost = Base_Tier_Cost √ó Damage_Percentage √ó Quality_Modifier

BASE TIER COSTS (Full repair):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 25T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 75T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 200T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 500T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5: 1,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: 1,500T (HARD CAP)

QUALITY MODIFIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Common: 1.0√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Uncommon: 1.2√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rare: 1.4√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Epic: 1.6√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: 1.5√ó (slightly lower than epic, endgame fairness)

FULL SET REPAIR COSTS (8 pieces, full damage):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 Set: 200T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2 Set: 600T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3 Set: 1,600T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4 Set: 4,000T (cap beginning to apply)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 Set: 8,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary Set: 12,000T

REPAIR COST CAP: 1,500T per full repair (single item)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents punishing deaths in learning content

PRACTICE MODE (New Raids/Content):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ First 2 weeks of new content: 50% repair costs
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Encourages engagement with challenging content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Applies to designated "progression" instances
```

## B. Travel Costs

```
WAYPOINT TRAVEL SYSTEM

COST FORMULA:
Travel_Cost = Base_Cost √ó Distance_Multiplier √ó Zone_Modifier

BASE COSTS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Same zone: 10T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adjacent zone: 25T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Distant zone: 50T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cross-faction: 100T

DISTANCE MULTIPLIERS (within zone):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Short (< 1km): 1.0√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Medium (1-3km): 1.5√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Long (> 3km): 2.0√ó

ZONE MODIFIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Safe zone: 1.0√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Contested zone: 1.5√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ War zone: 2.0√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction capital: 0.5√ó (subsidized)

DISCOUNTS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction reputation (Exalted): -15%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zone completion: -10%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild waypoints: -20%

FREE TRAVEL:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Walking (always free)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Return to bind point (30-min cooldown)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Map completion reward (one-time unlock per zone)
```

## C. Crafting Fees

```
CRAFTING FEE STRUCTURE

FEE FORMULA:
Crafting_Fee = Item_Base_Value √ó Fee_Percentage

FEE PERCENTAGES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 items: 5%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2 items: 6%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3 items: 7%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4 items: 8%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 items: 9%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary items: 10%

EXAMPLES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 Weapon (100T base): 5T fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3 Armor (600T base): 42T fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 Weapon (16,000T base): 1,440T fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary Weapon (75,000T base): 7,500T fee

CONSUMABLE CRAFTING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Flat fee: 2T per craft
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bulk crafting (10+): 1.5T per craft
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Encourages consumable crafting economy
```

## D. Prestige Systems

```
PRESTIGE PURCHASE CATEGORIES

COSMETICS (Character Appearance):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor skins: 500-5,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon skins: 300-3,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mount skins: 1,000-10,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auras/Effects: 2,000-20,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dye packs: 100-1,000T

TITLES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Basic titles: 500-2,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heroic titles: 5,000-15,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary titles: 25,000-100,000T (+ achievement)

CONVENIENCE:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Extra bag slot: 2,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bank expansion: 3,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Material storage upgrade: 5,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mount speed upgrade: 10,000T

FACTION PRESTIGE:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction banners: 1,000T + 100 faction currency
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction housing items: 2,000-20,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction mounts: 15,000T + 500 faction currency

GUILD PRESTIGE:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild hall upgrades: 10,000-100,000T (pooled)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild banners: 5,000T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guild buffs: 1,000-5,000T per activation

REVISED PRESTIGE TIMING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3 milestone prestige: 8,000T (down from 15,000)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4 milestone prestige: 20,000T (down from 40,000)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 milestone prestige: 100,000T (unchanged, aspirational)
```

---

# X. INFLATION PREVENTION

## A. Automated Systems

```
INFLATION MONITORING & RESPONSE

METRICS TRACKED:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Server gold supply (total in circulation)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Average player wealth (by level bracket)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH price indices (material, equipment, consumable)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold velocity (transactions per day)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate (% of generated gold consumed)

ALERT THRESHOLDS:

GREEN (Healthy):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wealth growth: 2-4% weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices: ¬±10% monthly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate: 68-78%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Action: None

YELLOW (Monitor):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wealth growth: 5-7% weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices: ¬±15-25% monthly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate: 60-68% or 78-85%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Action: Increase sink opportunities, review drop rates

RED (Intervention):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wealth growth: 8%+ weekly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH prices: ¬±30%+ monthly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sink rate: <60% or >85%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Action: Emergency measures

EMERGENCY MEASURES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Temporary increased AH fees
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Limited-time prestige sales (absorb gold)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced drop rates on currency
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Introduce new gold sinks (events, items)
```

## B. Structural Protections

```
BUILT-IN INFLATION CONTROLS

1. PROGRESSIVE TAXATION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH fees scale with transaction value
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher value trades = higher % fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents wealth concentration

2. DECAY SYSTEMS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ork Teef: 1% weekly decay
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stale listings: Increased fees after 7 days
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unused guild funds: Maintenance costs

3. CONTENT GATING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold alone cannot bypass progression
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Time-gated materials require engagement
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents gold-rushing through content

4. SOFT CAPS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing returns on farming
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daily quest limits
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weekly faction currency caps

5. GOLD SINKS SCALE WITH WEALTH:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Endgame repairs more expensive
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary crafting costs significant
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prestige items priced for wealth level
```

## C. Material Conversion Balancing

```
REVISED MATERIAL CONVERSION RATES

Previous (Exploitable):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 T1 ‚Üí 1 T2 (100%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 T2 ‚Üí 1 T3 (100%)

REVISED SYSTEM:

Basic Conversion (NPC Vendor):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10 T1 ‚Üí 1 T2 (100% success)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10 T2 ‚Üí 1 T3 (100% success)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8 T3 ‚Üí 1 T4 (80% success)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 6 T4 ‚Üí 1 T5 (60% success)

Skilled Conversion (Crafting Skill Required):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8 T1 ‚Üí 1 T2 (requires Crafting 25)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8 T2 ‚Üí 1 T3 (requires Crafting 50)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 6 T3 ‚Üí 1 T4 (requires Crafting 75, 90% success)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 T4 ‚Üí 1 T5 (requires Crafting 100, 75% success)

CATALYST REQUIREMENT (T4+):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3‚ÜíT4 conversion requires: Alchemical Catalyst (50T vendor)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4‚ÜíT5 conversion requires: Rare Catalyst (250T or boss drop)

This prevents:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 farming dominance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Infinite conversion chains
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Trivializing higher content
```

---

# XI. REGIONAL ECONOMY DIFFERENCES

## A. Zone Economic Profiles

```
ZONE TYPE: FORGE WORLD (Industrial)

Characteristics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Metal materials: +20% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Organic materials: -30% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tech components: +10% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Local vendors: Metal surplus, organic shortage

Vendor Pricing:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Metal materials: 80% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Organic materials: 130% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tech components: 90% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: Standard

Economic Opportunity:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Export: Metals
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Import: Organics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting focus: Weapons, armor

---

ZONE TYPE: AGRI-WORLD (Agricultural)

Characteristics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Metal materials: -20% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Organic materials: +40% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy components: Standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Local vendors: Organic surplus, metal shortage

Vendor Pricing:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Metal materials: 125% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Organic materials: 70% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables (food): 60% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: 110% of standard

Economic Opportunity:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Export: Organics, consumables
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Import: Metals, equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting focus: Consumables, light armor

---

ZONE TYPE: HIVE WORLD (Urban)

Characteristics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All materials: Standard drop rates
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency drops: +25%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tech components: +15%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher vendor variety

Vendor Pricing:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All materials: Standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 90% of standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Services: 80% of standard (competition)

Economic Opportunity:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trading hub (AH fees -1%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Best vendor selection
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting: All types

---

ZONE TYPE: WAR ZONE (Contested)

Characteristics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All materials: +30% drop rate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency drops: +50%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: PvP enabled, repair costs higher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dynamic control affects prices

Vendor Pricing (Fluctuates):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Controlled by your faction: -20% all prices
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Contested: Standard prices
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy controlled: +50% all prices (if accessible)

Economic Opportunity:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ High risk, high reward farming
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Requisition tokens primary source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dynamic market based on war state
```

## B. Cross-Faction Trading

```
FACTION TRADE MECHANICS

SAME FACTION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Full AH access
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standard fees
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Direct trade allowed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mail trading allowed

CROSS-FACTION (Neutral Traders):

Location: Neutral zones, Rogue Trader outposts
Access: Requires neutral standing with destination faction (not hostile)

Mechanics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Listings visible cross-faction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +10% AH fee for cross-faction purchases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No direct trade (must use AH or neutral brokers)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mail limited to neutral zones

Neutral Broker NPC:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enables cross-faction direct trades
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Broker fee: 5% from each party (10% total)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Escrow system (neither party can cancel mid-trade)

HOSTILE FACTION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No trading access
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cannot see enemy AH listings
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Must improve reputation to neutral first
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates demand for neutral traders/diplomats
```

---

# XII. INTEGRATION WITH COMBAT REWARDS

## A. Combat Drop Integration

```
COMBAT REWARD STRUCTURE

STANDARD ENEMIES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold: 5-15T (scales with level difference)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 60% T1, 15% T2, 1% T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 10% chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: 2% chance (T1)

VETERAN ENEMIES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold: 15-35T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 40% T1, 30% T2, 5% T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 15% chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: 5% chance (T1-T2)

ELITE ENEMIES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold: 30-75T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 25% T2, 40% T3, 10% T4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 25% chance (T2)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: 10% chance (T2-T3)

BOSSES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold: 100-300T
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: Guaranteed T3, 50% T4, 5% T5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: 50% chance (T2-T3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: 25% chance (T3-T4)

RAID BOSSES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gold: 500-1,500T (split among party)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: Guaranteed T4, 30% T5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: Guaranteed T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: Guaranteed T4 roll for party
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair offset bonus: 200T per participant
```

## B. Instance Lockout Economy

```
BOSS LOCKOUT SYSTEM

PURPOSE: Prevent boss reset farming
IMPLEMENTATION: Time-based diminishing returns

FIRST KILL (Per Reset Period):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Full rewards (100%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reset period: 4 hours for non-raid bosses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reset period: Weekly for raid bosses

SECOND KILL (Same Period):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% gold reward
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% material drop chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: Still rollable

THIRD+ KILL (Same Period):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 25% gold reward
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 25% material drop chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment: Normal chance (allows gear farming)

UI DISPLAY:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss frame shows reward tier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Timer shows next full-reward opportunity
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ "Bonus" indicator when fresh

EXCEPTION: Guild practice mode
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Voluntary reduced rewards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% of standard rewards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlimited attempts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ For teaching/practice purposes
```

---

# XIII. EXPLOIT PREVENTION

## A. Implemented Safeguards

```
ANTI-EXPLOIT SYSTEMS

1. TRANSACTION MONITORING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All trades logged
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pattern detection for RMT (Real Money Trading)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unusual wealth transfers flagged
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Automated temporary holds on suspicious activity

2. BOT PREVENTION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CAPTCHA on suspicious AH patterns
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing returns on repetitive farming
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Random "patrol" events in farming zones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior analysis for automated play

3. MARKET MANIPULATION PREVENTION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Price ceilings/floors (20-500% of average)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purchase limits per player per item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Listing limits per account
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wash trading detection

4. ACCOUNT SECURITY:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ New account restrictions (48h trade delay)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tiered daily limits (grows with account age)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Two-factor authentication incentivized
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Recovery system that tracks item history

5. DUPLICATION PREVENTION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Server-side item validation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transaction atomicity
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rollback detection
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Regular database audits
```

## B. Known Exploit Mitigations

```
ADDRESSED EXPLOITS FROM SIMULATION

1. MATERIAL TIER ARBITRAGE:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: 10:1 conversion ratio
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Catalyst requirements for high tiers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Result: T1 farming no longer optimal

2. BOSS RESET FARMING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Diminishing returns system
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: 4-hour / weekly lockouts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Result: Varied gameplay required

3. AH FEE AVOIDANCE (Guild Trading):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Guild trades have 6% fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Guild bank has deposit limits
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Result: AH remains primary trading venue

4. NEW ACCOUNT MULE FARMING:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: 48-hour trade delay
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Weekly AH limits for new accounts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Account-bound tutorial rewards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Result: Mule armies not economically viable

5. CROSS-FACTION PRICE MANIPULATION:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: 10% cross-faction fee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fixed: Neutral broker required
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Result: Arbitrage possible but limited
```

---

# XIV. ECONOMIC EVENTS

## A. Regular Events

```
WEEKLY ECONOMIC EVENTS

MERCHANT'S DAY (Every Wednesday):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All vendor prices: -10%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AH listing fees: -25%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 24 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Encourage midweek engagement

TITHE DAY (Every Sunday):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction donations: +50% reputation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Donation caps: +100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 24 hours
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Weekly gold sink spike

MONTHLY ECONOMIC EVENTS

ROGUE TRADER FAIR (First weekend):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special vendor inventory
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Exclusive items (cosmetics, rare materials)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auction events (unique items)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 48 hours

HARVEST FESTIVAL (When applicable):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zone-specific bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Material gathering: +25%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crafting fees: -20%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 1 week
```

## B. Dynamic Events

```
SUPPLY AND DEMAND EVENTS

SHORTAGE EVENT:
Trigger: Material type drops below threshold on AH
Effect: 
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Related content drops +50% of that material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vendor prices for alternatives increase
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Lasts until supply normalizes

SURPLUS EVENT:
Trigger: Material type exceeds threshold on AH
Effect:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ New sink introduced (faction project)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vendor buy prices increase temporarily
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates demand to clear surplus

WAR ECONOMY:
Trigger: Major PvP objectives change hands
Effect:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Winning faction: -10% zone prices
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Losing faction: +20% zone prices
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates war investment incentive

MERCHANT CARAVAN:
Trigger: Random (2-3 times per week)
Effect:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special NPC appears with unique inventory
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Limited stock, first-come-first-served
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates "event hunting" gameplay
```

---

# XV. SUMMARY TABLES

## A. Quick Reference: Fees

| Transaction Type | Fee |
|-----------------|-----|
| AH Listing (24h) | 1% |
| AH Listing (72h) | 2% |
| AH Listing (7d) | 3% |
| AH Sale (standard) | 8% |
| AH Sale (patient) | 5% |
| Guild Trade | 6% |
| Cross-Faction AH | +10% |
| Mail w/ Attachment | 10T |
| COD Mail | 10T + 3% |
| Cross-Faction Mail | 100T + 5% |

## B. Quick Reference: Progression Costs

| Milestone | Gold Required | Time to Earn |
|-----------|--------------|--------------|
| T2 Gear Set | 2,200T | 4-6 hours |
| T3 Gear Set | 8,500T | 15-20 hours |
| T4 Gear Set | 35,000T | 40-50 hours |
| T5 Gear Set | 120,000T | 80-100 hours |
| Legendary Set | 400,000T | 150-200 hours |
| Prestige Mount | 15,000T | 20-25 hours |
| Guild Hall (base) | 100,000T | Pooled |

## C. Quick Reference: Income by Activity

| Activity | Gold/Hour | Level Range |
|----------|-----------|-------------|
| Casual Questing | 200-400T | 1-75 |
| Focused Farming | 500-800T | 1-75 |
| Elite Content | 1,000-2,000T | 45-75 |
| Trading Profits | Variable | Any |
| Daily Quests | ~1,000T | 20+ |
| Weekly Challenges | ~4,000T | 40+ |
