Prompt Size: 1,273 chars
Output Size: 66,529 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,273 characters)
You are a combat designer who creates engaging, strategic combat systems. You work with resources (consumables, gear materials) and feed into progression (XP, loot rewards).

When designing combat:
- Define core combat mechanics (targeting, damage types, status effects)
- Design player abilities and skill trees
- Create enemy types with distinct behaviors
- Establish damage formulas and stat scaling
- Design loot drop tables and reward curves
- Balance difficulty progression
- Create combat variety (melee, ranged, magic, stealth, etc.)
- Ensure combat supports different playstyles

Output should include:
- Combat mechanics overview (turn-based, real-time, hybrid)
- Damage calculation formulas
- Player ability catalog with costs and cooldowns
- Enemy bestiary with stats and behaviors
- Loot tables and drop rates
- Difficulty curve and encounter design principles
- Integration with resources (consumables) and progression (XP, gear)

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- combat_complete: Submit combat for balance analysis

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: combat_complete
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (66,529 characters)
# Combat System Design Document
## Warhammer 40,000: Imperium Divided - Damocles Gulf Sector

---

# I. COMBAT PHILOSOPHY

This combat system draws heavily from **Guild Wars 1's design principles**:
- **Build diversity over gear dependency** - Your skill bar choices matter more than stat stacking
- **Limited active skills** - 8-skill bar forces meaningful choices
- **Positioning and timing** - Combat rewards tactical play, not button mashing
- **Team synergy** - Classes complement each other without hard requirements
- **No holy trinity lock** - Flexible roles, not forced Tank/Healer/DPS

**Core Design Tenets:**
- Combat should feel visceral and appropriately grimdark
- Every class can complete content solo, but groups unlock new strategies
- Skill ceiling rewards mastery without punishing casual play
- Faction identity extends to combat mechanics

---

# II. COMBAT MECHANICS OVERVIEW

## A. Combat Style: Real-Time with Tactical Pause

```
COMBAT FLOW

Real-Time Execution
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Actions execute immediately upon activation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Global cooldown: 0.75 seconds between skill uses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Auto-attack fills gaps (weapon-dependent speed)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Positioning matters (flanking, cover, range)

Tactical Elements
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill queuing (1 skill can be queued)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Target calling in groups
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Interrupt windows on enemy abilities
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge/block mechanics (active mitigation)
```

## B. Core Combat Stats

```
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTES (Allocated via Attribute Points)

STRENGTH
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +3 melee damage per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1 armor penetration per 2 points
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Heavy weapons, power armor

BALLISTIC SKILL
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2 ranged damage per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +0.5% critical hit chance per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Precision weapons, advanced optics

TOUGHNESS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +20 health per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1 armor per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Heavy armor, fortification abilities

WILLPOWER
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +5 energy/faith/WAAAGH! per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1% ability damage per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Psychic powers, leadership abilities

AGILITY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1% dodge chance per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2% movement speed per 5 points
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Evasion skills, mobility gear

INTELLIGENCE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2% skill cooldown reduction per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1% resource regeneration per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Required for: Tech abilities, tactical skills
```

## C. Secondary Stats (Derived)

```
OFFENSIVE STATS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Physical Damage: Base weapon + (STR√ó3 or BS√ó2)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Chance: Base 5% + (BS√ó0.5%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Damage: Base 150% + gear modifiers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor Penetration: STR/2 + weapon + skills
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: Weapon base √ó (1 + AGI/100)

DEFENSIVE STATS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 100 + (TOUGHNESS√ó20) + level√ó10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: TOUGHNESS + gear (reduces physical damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy Shield: Gear-based (absorbs before health)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge Chance: AGI% (cap: 40%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Block Chance: Shield-dependent (cap: 50%)

RESOURCE STATS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy/Faith/WAAAGH!: 100 + (WILLPOWER√ó5)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resource Regen: 3/sec + (INT√ó0.03)/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown Reduction: INT√ó2% (cap: 50%)
```

---

# III. DAMAGE SYSTEM

## A. Damage Types

```
PHYSICAL DAMAGE TYPES

KINETIC (Bullets, Impacts)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Unarmored, Flesh
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Vehicles, Energy Shields
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Autoguns, bolters, melee strikes

EXPLOSIVE (Grenades, Missiles)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Armor (50% effectiveness)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Groups, Light Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Single targets, Heavy Armor
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Frag grenades, missile launchers

RENDING (Power weapons, Monomolecular)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ignores: 50% of Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Heavy Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Energy Shields
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Power swords, chainswords

ENERGY DAMAGE TYPES

THERMAL (Plasma, Melta, Fire)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Energy Shields
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Armor, Vehicles
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Thermal-resistant enemies
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Plasma guns, meltaguns, flamers

LAS (Lasweapons)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Armor, Reflective surfaces
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Flesh, Light Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Mirrors, Energy Shields
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Lasguns, lascannons, hotshots

ION (Tau weapons)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Energy Shields (25% effectiveness)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Vehicles, Heavy Armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Infantry swarms
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Ion rifles, railguns, pulse weapons

SPECIAL DAMAGE TYPES

PSYCHIC (Warp powers)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Willpower saves, Null fields
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Low Willpower targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak vs: Blanks, Anti-psyker wards
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Psyker abilities, daemon weapons

WARP (Corruption, Chaos)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Faith, Purity
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong vs: Corrupted targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Applies: Corruption stacks
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Chaos enemies, corrupted areas

TOXIC (Poison, Radiation)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduced by: Toughness saves
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Applies: DoT effects
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ignores: Armor completely
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Toxin weapons, environmental hazards
```

## B. Damage Calculation Formula

```
DAMAGE CALCULATION PIPELINE

Step 1: Base Damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon Base + (Primary Attribute √ó Scaling Factor)

Step 2: Skill Modifiers
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Base √ó Skill Coefficient √ó (1 + Damage Buffs)

Step 3: Critical Check
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Roll vs Critical Chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If Critical: √ó Critical Damage Multiplier
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Damage = 150% + bonuses (cap: 250%)

Step 4: Armor/Resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Physical: Damage √ó (100 / (100 + Armor))
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: Damage - Energy Shield absorption
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Type-specific calculations

Step 5: Damage Buffs/Debuffs (Additive, Capped at +50%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final = Step 4 Result √ó (1 + Total Buff%)

EXAMPLE CALCULATION:
Bolter shot by Battle Sister
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base: 45 (weapon) + 30√ó2 (BS 30) = 105
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill: "Blessed Burst" √ó 1.2 = 126
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No crit (rolled 87 vs 20% chance)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 126 √ó (100/150) = 84 (target has 50 armor)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buffs: 84 √ó 1.15 (+15% from War Hymn) = 97
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final Damage: 97
```

## C. Damage Buff Cap System

```
BUFF STACKING RULES (GW1-Inspired)

Damage Increase Buffs: +50% HARD CAP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All sources additive within cap
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Excess buffs provide no benefit
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Encourages buff diversity over stacking

Damage Reduction Buffs: +50% HARD CAP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Same rules as increase
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents invincibility stacking

Example:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ War Hymn: +15%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Blessed Ammunition: +10%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fury of the Emperor: +20%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zealot's Rage: +25%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total Before Cap: +70%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Applied: +50% (cap reached)

MULTIPLICATIVE EXCEPTIONS (Outside Cap):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Damage Multiplier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Type-specific bonuses (e.g., +vs Orks)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Debuffs on enemies (separate calculation)
```

---

# IV. STATUS EFFECTS

## A. Crowd Control Effects

```
HARD CC (Movement/Action Denial)

KNOCKDOWN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 1-3 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Prone, cannot act, -50% damage taken reduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: Each application within 30s = -50% duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity: 10 seconds after 3rd application
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Explosions, power fists, charges

STUN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 0.5-2 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Interrupted, cannot act
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: Same as knockdown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity: Shares DR with knockdown
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Concussion, psychic shock, flashbangs

ROOT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 2-5 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Cannot move, can still attack/use skills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: Independent track
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity: 10 seconds after 3rd application
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Gravity effects, web grenades, ice

SOFT CC (Impairment)

SLOW
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3-8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: -30% to -70% movement speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Strongest effect only (no stacking)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Chill effects, webbing, injuries

BLIND
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 2-5 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: -50% accuracy, reduced vision radius
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Duration refresh only
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Flashbangs, smoke, psychic assault

TAUNT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3-6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Must attack taunting target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Most recent taunt wins
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Tank abilities, intimidation

FEAR
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 2-4 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Flee from source, -30% damage dealt
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity: Faith/Willpower-based resistance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Terror troops, daemons, psykers
```

## B. Damage Over Time Effects

```
DOT MECHANICS

BURNING
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 5-25 per tick (scales with source)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tick Rate: Every 1 second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3-10 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Refreshes duration, +20% damage per stack (max 5)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Removal: Water, roll action, cleanse skills

BLEEDING
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 3-15 per tick
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tick Rate: Every 2 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6-12 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Independent stacks (max 3 sources)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Removal: Bandage, healing skills, time

POISON/TOXIN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 8-20 per tick
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tick Rate: Every 3 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 9-15 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Strongest poison only
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Removal: Antitoxin consumable, cleanse skills

CORRUPTION (Special - Chaos)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 2-10 per tick
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tick Rate: Every 5 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Until cleansed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Stacks increase tick damage and unlock effects
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 stacks: -10% healing received
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 stacks: -20% damage dealt
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 10 stacks: Mind control risk
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Removal: Shrine cleansing, priest abilities, rare consumables
```

## C. Buff/Debuff Effects

```
OFFENSIVE BUFFS

DAMAGE INCREASE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Values: +5% to +25% per source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: +50% total
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Common sources: War cries, blessings, stims

ATTACK SPEED INCREASE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Values: +10% to +30% per source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: +50% total (2.0 attacks per base attack)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Common sources: Frenzon, overclock, battle trance

ARMOR PENETRATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Values: +10 to +50 per source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: None (but diminishing returns on formula)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Common sources: Blessed ammunition, targeting systems

DEFENSIVE BUFFS

DAMAGE REDUCTION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Values: +5% to +25% per source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: +50% total (always take at least 50% damage)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Common sources: Iron resolve, suppression fire, shields

REGENERATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Values: 5-50 health per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: None (but healing aggro generates)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Common sources: Blessings, medkits, rally points

INVULNERABILITY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 0.5-3 seconds maximum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: Cannot exceed 3 seconds per activation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: Minimum 60 seconds between any invuln effects
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Rosarius shield, emergency teleport, zealot's sacrifice
```

---

# V. PLAYER CLASSES & ABILITIES

## A. Imperial Classes

### 1. BATTLE SISTER (Ranged DPS / Support)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Holy warrior wielding bolters and faith

RESOURCE: Faith (100 base + Willpower√ó5)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +3/sec base, +5 per kill, +10 per elite kill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 15-50 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Hymns cost Faith/sec while active

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,400
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 45
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 85
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 55
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 1.0/sec

CORE ABILITIES (8-Skill Bar)

1. BLESSED BURST (Basic Attack Enhancement)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 10 Faith
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 3 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Next 3 shots deal +20% damage, +15% vs Chaos
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Scaling: +1% damage per 2 Willpower

2. DIVINE GUIDANCE (Targeted Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Faith
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Target ally gains +15% accuracy, +10% crit chance
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters

3. ACT OF FAITH: SPIRIT OF THE MARTYR (Emergency Heal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 40 Faith
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Heal self for 30% max HP, cleanse 1 condition
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Reduced cooldown (-5s) if below 25% HP when used

4. HYMN OF BATTLE (Maintained Aura)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 5 Faith/second
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None (toggle)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 15 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Allies gain +10% damage dealt
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Only one Hymn active at a time

5. HYMN OF SANCTUARY (Maintained Aura)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 5 Faith/second
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None (toggle)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 15 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Allies gain +10% damage reduction
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Only one Hymn active at a time

6. REPENT! (Crowd Control)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Faith
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 20 meters, cone
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fear enemies for 3 seconds, -20% damage for 5 seconds after
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: Standard fear DR

7. EMPEROR'S JUDGEMENT (High Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 50 Faith
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 40 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Massive holy bolt dealing 300% weapon damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: +50% damage vs Daemons, Chaos Marines

8. MARTYRDOM (Ultimate - Self Sacrifice)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: All remaining Faith (minimum 50)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 180 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: On death within 10 seconds, explode for Faith√ó10 holy damage
   ‚îÇ           All allies in 20m gain 15 second invuln to Corruption
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Does not trigger if killed by falling

ELITE SKILLS (Unlocked via Requisition)

E1. CELESTIAN ASCENSION
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Faith
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +25% all damage, +20% movement speed, wings visual
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Requisition Tokens + Canoness rank

E2. BLESSED AMMUNITION (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: Passive (always active)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All ranged attacks deal +5% damage, +15% vs Warp entities
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Requisition Tokens + complete "Purge the Unclean"

E3. LITANIES OF HATE
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Faith
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Party gains +20% damage vs designated enemy type
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 100 Requisition Tokens
```

### 2. GUARDSMAN (Tank / Area Control)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Imperial backbone, masters of cover and suppression

RESOURCE: Stamina (100 base + Toughness√ó3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +5/sec base, +10 when in cover
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 10-40 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: "Dig In" doubles all Stamina regeneration

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,800
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 65
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 60
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 45
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 1.2/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: +25% effectiveness from cover

CORE ABILITIES

1. SUPPRESSING FIRE (Area Denial)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Stamina/second
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None (channeled)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Cone attack, enemies in area: -50% movement, -30% damage
   ‚îÇ           Deals 40% weapon damage per second
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Until stamina depleted or cancelled

2. DIG IN (Defensive Stance)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 5 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Become immobile, +30% damage reduction, +100% Stamina regen
   ‚îÇ           +20% ranged damage while active
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Toggle: Ends when you move

3. FLASHBANG (Crowd Control)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Stamina
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 25 meters (thrown)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 8 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Blind for 4 seconds, Stun for 1.5 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: Standard stun DR

4. FIRST RANK, FIRE! (Team Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Stamina
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies in 20m gain +25% attack speed
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Named after Imperial Guard volley fire doctrine

5. TACTICAL RETREAT (Mobility)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Stamina
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Leap backward 10m, gain 2 seconds of +50% damage reduction
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Breaks roots, not stuns

6. FRAG OUT (Explosive Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Stamina
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 6 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 150% weapon damage, knockdown on direct hit
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ammo: Consumes 1 Frag Grenade (T1 consumable) or 25 Stamina

7. HOLD THE LINE (Ultimate Tank)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 40 Stamina
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Taunt all enemies in 15m, gain +40% damage reduction
   ‚îÇ           Allies behind you gain +20% damage reduction
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Positioning: Creates "safe zone" behind Guardsman

8. CALL IN ARTILLERY (Ultimate Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: All Stamina (minimum 60)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 120 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Delay: 3 seconds after activation
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 12 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Massive bombardment, 500% weapon damage, knockdown all
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Warning: Visual indicator shows impact zone

ELITE SKILLS

E1. VETERAN SERGEANT (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +5% damage and +5% damage reduction per nearby ally (max +20%)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Requisition + Sergeant rank

E2. KRAK GRENADE
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Stamina
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 18 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Single target, 250% weapon damage, +100% vs vehicles/armor
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 100 Requisition

E3. STEEL LEGION TRAINING (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: While in cover, reflect 10% of damage taken to attackers
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Requisition + complete "Defense of Hive Primus"
```

### 3. TECH-PRIEST (Healer / Pet Class)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Servants of the Machine God, masters of constructs

RESOURCE: Binary Code (100 base + Intelligence√ó4)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +2/sec base, +8 when near machinery, +5 per repair
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 15-60 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Constructs have separate HP pools, share your buffs

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 35
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Tech Damage: 70 (ranged)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 40
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 0.8/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Can repair vehicles and machinery

CONSTRUCT SYSTEM

SERVO-SKULL (Permanent Companion)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 200 + your level√ó10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 30% of your tech damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ability: Scout (reveals stealthed enemies in 15m)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Respawn: 30 seconds if destroyed

SUMMONABLE CONSTRUCTS (Max 2 active)

Combat Servitor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 40 Binary Code
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 60 seconds or until destroyed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 400 + your level√ó15
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 60% of your tech damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Attacks your target, tanks when possible
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds

Repair Servitor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Binary Code
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 45 seconds or until destroyed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 300 + your level√ó10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing: 25 HP/sec to lowest HP ally in 20m
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Follows you, prioritizes healing
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds

CORE ABILITIES

1. MECHADENDRITE STRIKE (Basic Attack)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Melee attack with mechanical tentacles
   ‚îÇ           Applies 1 stack of "Analyzed" (-5% damage reduction, 10s)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Max Stacks: 5 (from any Tech-Priest)

2. BLESSED UNGUENT (Single Target Heal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Binary Code
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Heal target for 200 + 50% of your max HP
   ‚îÇ           If target is construct: +50% healing
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters

3. RITE OF REPAIR (HoT/Group Heal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Binary Code
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Target gains 30 HP/sec, spreads to 2 nearby allies
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can affect constructs

4. SUMMON COMBAT SERVITOR
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ (See Construct System above)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill slot required to summon

5. SUMMON REPAIR SERVITOR
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ (See Construct System above)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill slot required to summon

6. OVERRIDE PROTOCOLS (Construct Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Binary Code
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All your constructs gain +30% damage, +20% attack speed
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Also affects Servo-Skull

7. HAYWIRE BURST (Tech Disruption)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Binary Code
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 20 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 150% tech damage, disables shields for 5 seconds
   ‚îÇ           Stuns mechanical enemies for 2 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: +100% damage vs vehicles

8. INVOKE MACHINE SPIRIT (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 60 Binary Code
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 90 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Empower all constructs (+50% HP, +40% damage)
   ‚îÇ           Reduce all construct cooldowns by 50%
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual: Constructs glow with divine machine energy

ELITE SKILLS

E1. KASTELAN ROBOT (Elite Construct)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 60 Binary Code
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 90 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 800 + level√ó20
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 100% of your tech damage
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Heavy tank, draws aggro, slow but powerful
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 300 Requisition + Magos rank

E2. BLESSED RECONSTRUCTION
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 50 Binary Code
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Resurrect a dead ally at 50% HP (once per ally per mission)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Requisition + complete "Rites of Restoration"
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ANTI-EXPLOIT: 5 minute cooldown per target, cannot self-target

E3. NOOSPHERIC LINK (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Gain +2% damage and +2% healing per construct you have active
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Requisition
```

---

## B. Tau Classes

### 4. FIRE WARRIOR (Ranged DPS / Marksman)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Elite soldiers of the Greater Good, masters of ranged combat

RESOURCE: Focus (100 base + Ballistic Skill√ó3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +4/sec base, +3 per hit on marked targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 10-45 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Markerlight system enhances all Tau attacks

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 40
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 95
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 35
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 1.1/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: +15% accuracy at long range (>25m)

MARKERLIGHT SYSTEM

MARKERLIGHT APPLICATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Applied by: Markerlight skill, Pathfinder drones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Up to 3 stacks per target (HARD CAP)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Effects per stack:
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 stack: +10% damage from Tau weapons
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2 stacks: +5% crit chance from Tau weapons
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 stacks: Seeker missiles auto-hit, +15% total damage

CORE ABILITIES

1. PULSE RIFLE SHOT (Enhanced Basic)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 5 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 2 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Precision shot dealing 130% weapon damage
   ‚îÇ           +20% damage vs targets with Markerlight
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 50 meters

2. MARKERLIGHT (Target Designation)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 10 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Apply 1 Markerlight stack to target
   ‚îÇ           Team benefit: All Tau gain damage bonus
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Stack cap of 3 per target prevents exploitation

3. PHOTON GRENADE (Crowd Control)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 8 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Blind for 3 seconds, -30% accuracy for 6 seconds after
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Does not deal damage

4. BONDING KNIFE RITUAL (Team Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: You and 3 nearest allies gain +10% damage, +10% move speed
   ‚îÇ           If ally dies during effect, you gain +25% damage for 10s
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 20 meters

5. TACTICAL RETREAT (Mobility)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Jet pack boost backward 15m, gain stealth for 3 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Attacking breaks stealth

6. OVERWATCH (Reaction Fire)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Automatically fire at any enemy that moves within 30m
   ‚îÇ           Each shot deals 80% weapon damage
   ‚îÇ           Maximum 5 reaction shots
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Does not consume ammo/additional Focus

7. SEEKER MISSILE (High Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 60 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 250% weapon damage, +50% vs targets with 3 Markerlights
   ‚îÇ           Auto-hit if target has 3 Markerlight stacks
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Consumes Markerlight stacks on impact

8. MONT'KA STRIKE (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 45 Focus
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 90 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Mark all enemies in 30m cone with 2 Markerlight stacks
   ‚îÇ           Your next 5 attacks within 10s deal +40% damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Lore: "Killing Blow" - aggressive Tau doctrine

ELITE SKILLS

E1. KAUYON PATIENCE (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: After not attacking for 3 seconds, next attack deals +50% damage
    ‚îÇ           and applies 2 Markerlight stacks
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Honor Bonds + Shas'ui rank
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Lore: "Patient Hunter" - defensive Tau doctrine

E2. COORDINATED FIRE
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Focus
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies attacking your Markerlit target gain +15% damage
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Honor Bonds

E3. ADVANCED TARGETING (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Markerlight stacks you apply last 5 seconds longer
    ‚îÇ           Markerlight cap remains at 3 (duration extension only)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 100 Honor Bonds
```

### 5. CRISIS SUIT PILOT (Burst DPS / Mobile)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Elite battlesuit operators, high damage with risk management

RESOURCE: Reactor Power (100 base + Intelligence√ó3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +3/sec base, +5 when stationary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 15-60 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: OVERHEAT system - powerful but risky

OVERHEAT MECHANIC

HEAT GENERATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Many abilities generate Heat
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat decays at 5/sec when not generating
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100 Heat: OVERHEAT STATE
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Overheat Effects:
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 second forced cooldown (cannot use abilities)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ -30% damage during overheat
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50 self-damage (thermal venting)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ All Heat resets to 0 after overheat

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,600
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 55
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 70
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 0.9/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Flight capability (10 second bursts)

CORE ABILITIES

1. BURST CANNON (Basic Attack)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 10 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 8
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 2 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Rapid fire burst dealing 120% weapon damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Fast but heat-generating

2. PLASMA RIFLE (High Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 20
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 6 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 180% weapon damage (Thermal type)
   ‚îÇ           +30% damage vs armored targets
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Warning: High heat generation

3. MISSILE POD (AoE Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 15
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 8 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 140% weapon damage to all targets in area
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 45 meters

4. JET PACK ASSAULT (Mobility)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 5
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fly to target location (40m max), land with AoE knockback
   ‚îÇ           2 second knockdown to enemies within 6m of landing
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can use to disengage or engage

5. SHIELD GENERATOR (Defensive)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 0 (cools by 10)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Absorb 400 damage, immune to knockdown
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Good for heat management

6. HEAT SINK PURGE (Heat Management)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: -40 (reduces heat!)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Vent heat, next 3 abilities generate 50% less heat
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Essential for sustained damage

7. FUSION BLASTER (Boss Killer)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 40 Reactor Power
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 35
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 15 meters (short range)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 300% weapon damage (Thermal), ignores 50% armor
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Warning: Highest heat ability, forces heat management

8. NOVA CHARGE (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: All Reactor Power (minimum 60)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: Sets to 80 (dangerous!)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 120 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Channel reactor for 2 seconds, then release
   ‚îÇ           400% weapon damage in 15m radius, knockdown all
   ‚îÇ           Self: Gain 50% damage reduction for 5 seconds after
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: Will overheat if used above 20 heat

ELITE SKILLS

E1. ADVANCED STABILIZERS (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Reduce heat generated by all abilities by 20%
    ‚îÇ           Overheat damage reduced by 50%
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Honor Bonds + Shas'vre rank

E2. IRIDIUM ARMOR (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +100 armor, -10% movement speed
    ‚îÇ           Immune to knockdown while stationary
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Honor Bonds

E3. COORDINATED STRIKE
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Reactor Power
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heat Generated: 25
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All Crisis Suits in 30m fire synchronized burst
    ‚îÇ           Each participating suit deals +30% damage
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 250 Honor Bonds + complete "Mont'ka Training"
```

### 6. ETHEREAL (Support / Leader)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Spiritual leaders, force multipliers with no direct damage

RESOURCE: Aun'va's Wisdom (100 base + Willpower√ó5)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +4/sec base, +2 per ally ability used nearby
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 20-50 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Cannot deal direct damage (0 base weapon damage)

DESIGN NOTE: Ethereal is a PURE SUPPORT class. They excel in groups
but have specific solo viability through Honor Guard mechanic.

HONOR GUARD SYSTEM (Solo Viability)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ethereal always spawns with 2 Fire Warrior Honor Guards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Honor Guards: 500 HP, deal 70% of standard Fire Warrior damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Honor Guards respawn after 60 seconds if killed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ In groups: Honor Guards dismissed (Ethereal buffs replace them)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ This ensures Ethereal can complete solo content

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Damage: 0 (cannot deal direct damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: N/A
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: +20% aura radius

CORE ABILITIES

1. INVOCATION OF THE ELEMENTS (Flexible Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effects (choose one on cast):
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fire: Allies deal +15% damage
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Water: Allies gain +15% healing received
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Earth: Allies gain +15% damage reduction
   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Air: Allies gain +15% movement speed
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 25m aura

2. CALM OF TIDES (Cleanse/Stabilize)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Remove 2 conditions from all allies in 20m
   ‚îÇ           Allies gain immunity to Fear for 10 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Does not remove Corruption (requires special cleanse)

3. FAILURE IS NOT AN OPTION (Resurrection)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 40 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 90 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Resurrect 1 dead ally at 40% HP
   ‚îÇ           Resurrected ally gains +20% damage for 15 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ANTI-EXPLOIT: 5 minute cooldown per target, tracked globally

4. SENSE OF STONE (Emergency Heal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Heal lowest HP ally for 30% of their max HP
   ‚îÇ           If target below 25%: heal for 50% instead
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters

5. STORM OF FIRE (Damage Amplification)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies in 25m gain +20% attack speed
   ‚îÇ           All allies' attacks apply 1 Markerlight stack
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Markerlight cap still applies (3 max)

6. ZAP FIELD (Defensive Zone)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 35 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 10 meters (centered on Ethereal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Enemies in zone: -20% damage dealt, -30% move speed
   ‚îÇ           Zone pulses every 2 seconds for minor damage (20 base)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Ethereal's only damage source (minimal)

7. UNITY THROUGH PURPOSE (Ultimate Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 50 Wisdom
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 120 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies in 30m:
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +25% damage dealt
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +25% damage reduction
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Share 20% of healing received with each other
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual: Golden aura connecting all affected allies

8. BONDED FOR ETERNITY (Ultimate Save)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: All Wisdom (minimum 60)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 180 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: If Ethereal would die, instead:
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Become invulnerable for 2 seconds
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Teleport to nearest ally
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heal to 50% HP
   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ All allies gain +30% damage for 10 seconds (vengeance)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ANTI-EXPLOIT: Cannot trigger more than once per 3 minutes

ELITE SKILLS

E1. AUN'VA'S WISDOM (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All your buff durations extended by 25%
    ‚îÇ           Resource regeneration +2/sec
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Honor Bonds + Ethereal Council rank

E2. ELEMENTAL MASTERY
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 45 Wisdom
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All four Invocation elements active simultaneously
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 300 Honor Bonds + complete "Path of the Aun"

E3. INSPIRING PRESENCE (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Allies within 20m generate +15% resources
    ‚îÇ           Your Honor Guards gain +50% damage
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Honor Bonds
```

---

## C. Ork Classes

### 7. SLUGGA BOY (Melee DPS / Berserker)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Brutal melee combatant, gets stronger as fight continues

RESOURCE: WAAAGH! (100 base + Strength√ó3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +2/sec base, +5 per melee hit, +15 per kill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 10-40 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: WAAAGH! meter also builds group resource for Ork teams

WAAAGH! ESCALATION SYSTEM
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 0-30 WAAAGH!: Normal state
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 31-60 WAAAGH!: +10% damage, +5% attack speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 61-90 WAAAGH!: +20% damage, +10% attack speed, +5% size
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 91-100 WAAAGH!: +30% damage, +15% attack speed, +10% size
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100: Can use WAAAGH! ultimate abilities

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,700
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 110
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 1.3/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: +20% health regeneration

CORE ABILITIES

1. CHOPPA STRIKE (Basic Melee)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Basic melee attack, +5% damage per WAAAGH! tier
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary WAAAGH! generator

2. WAAAGH! CHARGE (Gap Closer)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 25 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Charge to target, knockdown on impact
   ‚îÇ           Deal 150% weapon damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Builds WAAAGH! on hit (+10)

3. 'ERE WE GO! (Movement Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 10 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +40% movement speed, immune to slow
   ‚îÇ           Next melee attack deals +30% damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Combo: Use after charge for burst

4. KRUMP 'EM GOOD (Heavy Strike)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Powerful overhead swing, 200% weapon damage
   ‚îÇ           Applies "Krumped" debuff: -20% damage for 6 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Main single-target damage skill

5. BELLOWING ROAR (Intimidation)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 12 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fear enemies for 2 seconds
   ‚îÇ           Builds +20 WAAAGH! if any enemy affected
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Crowd control and WAAAGH! generator

6. GET STUCK IN (Cleave Attack)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 6 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Wide swing hitting all enemies in front
   ‚îÇ           130% weapon damage to each
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary AoE ability

7. FEEL NO PAIN (Defensive)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 WAAAGH!
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Reduce all damage taken by 40%
   ‚îÇ           Heal for 20% of damage taken during effect
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary survivability tool

8. WAAAGH! UNLEASHED (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 100 WAAAGH! (requires full meter)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Become empowered:
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +50% damage
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +30% attack speed
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +25% size (intimidating!)
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immune to CC
   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ All melee kills heal for 10% max HP
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual: Green energy aura, eyes glow, louder voice lines

ELITE SKILLS

E1. NOB STATUS (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +200 max HP, +10 base melee damage
    ‚îÇ           WAAAGH! tier thresholds reduced by 10
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 150 Skull Trophies (Goff)

E2. CYBORK BODY (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +30% armor, +10% max HP
    ‚îÇ           -10% movement speed
    ‚îÇ           Immune to Bleeding
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Skull Trophies + complete "Dok's Best Patient"

E3. DA BIGGEST AND DA GREENEST
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 50 WAAAGH!
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 90 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 20 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Grow to Nob size permanently during effect
    ‚îÇ           +100 HP, +20% melee range, +15% damage
    ‚îÇ           Other Orks in 20m gain +10% damage (inspired)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 250 Skull Trophies + Nob rank
```

### 8. MEK BOY (Support / Gadget)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Ork engineers, unpredictable gadgets and vehicles

RESOURCE: Scrap (100 base + Intelligence√ó3)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: +3/sec base, +10 per enemy killed by gadgets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spending: 15-50 per ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Scrap can overflow to 150 (but decays rapidly above 100)

SCRAP OVERFLOW MECHANIC
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scrap above 100 decays at 10/sec
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Encourages spending excess quickly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Some abilities gain bonus effects at high Scrap
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents infinite Scrap hoarding

KUSTOM JOB VARIANCE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Many Mek abilities have random variance (¬±15%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% chance of "Lucky" result (+30% effect)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1% chance of "Squig" result (backfires humorously)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ork players embrace the chaos

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,400
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 45
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Ranged Damage: 75 (shoota)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Tech Damage: 85
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 1.0/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Can repair vehicles and Ork constructs

CORE ABILITIES

1. SHOOTA (Basic Ranged)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: None
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Spray of inaccurate bullets, 90% weapon damage
   ‚îÇ           Variance: ¬±20% damage (Ork craftsmanship)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Full auto, lower accuracy than other ranged

2. BURNA (Flamethrower)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 15 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 12 meters (cone)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 100% weapon damage, applies Burning (3 stacks)
   ‚îÇ           Variance: Duration 3-6 seconds randomly
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Great for crowd control

3. STIKKBOMB (Grenade)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 10 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 6 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 120% weapon damage, knockdown chance 50%
   ‚îÇ           Lucky: Radius doubles
   ‚îÇ           Squig: Bounces back toward you
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Standard Ork explosive

4. DEPLOY GROT (Summon)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 25 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 30 seconds or until killed
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grot HP: 100 + level√ó5
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grot Damage: 40% of your tech damage
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Attacks enemies, occasionally wanders off
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Max Grots: 3 active at once

5. FIX IT (Repair/Heal)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 20 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Heal target for 150 HP
   ‚îÇ           If vehicle/construct: heal for 300 HP instead
   ‚îÇ           Variance: ¬±25% healing
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary healing ability (for Orks, "healing" is more "bashing back together")

6. KUSTOM FORCE FIELD (Shield Bubble)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 35 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 35 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 10 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies in bubble gain +25% damage reduction
   ‚îÇ           Lucky: +40% reduction instead
   ‚îÇ           Squig: Field shorts out after 2 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary group defensive tool

7. TELLYPORTA (Tactical Mobility)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 30 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 40 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Teleport self and up to 2 allies to target location
   ‚îÇ           Variance: Arrival location ¬±5 meters of target
   ‚îÇ           Squig: Teleports in random direction instead
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Ork teleportation is never precise

8. SHOKK ATTACK GUN (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 50 Scrap
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 90 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 50 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fire a Snotling through the Warp at target
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Normal: 350% weapon damage to target
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Lucky (10% chance): 500% damage + stun 3 seconds
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Squig (5% chance): Snotling appears behind YOU and attacks
   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Squig (1%): Opens small Warp rift, spawns minor daemon
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: The quintessential Ork weapon - powerful but unpredictable

ELITE SKILLS

E1. BIG MEK STATUS
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +50 max Scrap, Scrap decay above 100 reduced by 50%
    ‚îÇ           Grots gain +50% damage
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Flash Tokens (Bad Moons)

E2. MEGA ARMOR
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: Passive (always active when equipped)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +150 armor, +300 HP
    ‚îÇ           -30% movement speed
    ‚îÇ           Immune to knockdown
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 250 Flash Tokens + complete "Da Best Armor"

E3. GARGANTUAN SQUIGGOTH (Elite Summon)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: 60 Scrap
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 180 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 45 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2000
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 150% of your tech damage
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Rampages forward, tramples enemies
    ‚îÇ           Cannot be precisely controlled
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 300 Flash Tokens + complete "Biggest Beast"
```

### 9. WEIRDBOY (Psychic DPS / Chaos)

```
CLASS IDENTITY: Ork psykers channeling WAAAGH! energy, high risk/reward

RESOURCE: 'Eadache (Inverse Resource - 0 is best, 100 is dangerous)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generation: Abilities ADD 'Eadache (starts at 0)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Decay: -5/sec when not using powers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100 'Eadache: HEAD EXPLODES (see below)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Power increases with nearby Orks

'EADACHE EXPLOSION MECHANIC
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100 'Eadache, Weirdboy's head explodes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 500 psychic damage in 15m radius (hits allies too!)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weirdboy dies (can be resurrected normally)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All nearby Orks gain +30% damage for 20 seconds (WAAAGH! surge)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: Cannot self-trigger more than once per 5 minutes
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Strategic Use: Sometimes intentional explosion is valid tactic

ORK PROXIMITY BONUS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each Ork player within 30m: +5% psychic damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum: +25% (5 Ork players)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Also works with Ork NPCs (at 50% effectiveness)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Represents WAAAGH! energy amplification

BASE STATS (Level 20)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1,300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Psychic Damage: 90
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base Melee Damage: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack Speed: 0.8/sec
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Nearby Orks amplify damage

CORE ABILITIES

1. 'EADBUTT (Psychic Bolt)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +10 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 3 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 35 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Psychic bolt dealing 130% psychic damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary damage ability, moderate 'Eadache

2. WARPATH (AoE Damage)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +20 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 30 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Radius: 10 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Green lightning storm, 150% psychic damage to all
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Warning: High 'Eadache generation

3. DA KRUNCH (Single Target Nuke)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +25 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 15 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 40 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Giant green foot stomps target
   ‚îÇ           300% psychic damage + knockdown 2 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual: Gork's (or Mork's) foot appears from the sky

4. FISTS OF GORK (Self Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +15 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Melee attacks deal psychic damage instead of physical
   ‚îÇ           +30% melee damage
   ‚îÇ           Each hit adds +3 'Eadache (be careful!)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Enables melee Weirdboy playstyle

5. VENT 'EADACHE (Resource Management)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: -30 'Eadache (reduces!)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 30 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Vent psychic energy harmlessly
   ‚îÇ           Allies in 10m gain +10% damage for 5 seconds
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Essential for sustained casting - BUFFED for balance

6. POWER OF DA WAAAGH! (Team Buff)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +15 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 25 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 12 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All Orks in 25m gain +15% damage
   ‚îÇ           Non-Ork allies gain +8% damage
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: WAAAGH! energy primarily benefits Orks

7. DA JUMP (Teleport)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +20 'Eadache
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 20 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 50 meters
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Teleport yourself to target location
   ‚îÇ           Variance: ¬±5 meters (Ork teleportation)
   ‚îÇ           5% chance: Teleport is PERFECT (exactly on target)
   ‚îÇ           2% chance: Teleport to random location within 50m
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Mobility with Ork unreliability

8. WAAAGH! ENERGY RELEASED (Ultimate)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: Sets 'Eadache to 90 (dangerous!)
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 60 seconds
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Channel for 2 seconds, then:
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Massive green explosion, 25m radius
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 400% psychic damage to all enemies
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All Orks healed for 15% max HP
   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All Orks gain +25% damage for 15 seconds
   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ You are at 90 'Eadache (need to vent or explode!)
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: Must manage 'Eadache immediately after or die

ELITE SKILLS

E1. WARPHEAD (Passive)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: 'Eadache decay increased to -8/sec
    ‚îÇ           'Eadache explosion damage increased by 50%
    ‚îÇ           Head explosion no longer damages allies
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 200 Kunnin' Points (Blood Axes) - they're smart enough to handle it

E2. GORK'S BLESSING (OR MORK'S)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: +10 'Eadache
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 45 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Random major buff to self:
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gork: +50% damage, +30% size
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Mork: +50% damage reduction, +30% move speed
    ‚îÇ   (50/50 which you get)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 250 Kunnin' Points

E3. CONTROLLED RELEASE (Active)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cost: Sets 'Eadache to 50
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 120 seconds
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: If at 80+ 'Eadache, release controlled explosion
    ‚îÇ           200% psychic damage in 15m
    ‚îÇ           You survive at 50 'Eadache
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unlock: 300 Kunnin' Points + complete "Da Smart Way"
```

---

# VI. ENEMY BESTIARY

## A. Enemy Tier System

```
ENEMY CLASSIFICATION

TIER: FODDER (Trash Mobs)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 100-300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Low (5-15% of player HP per hit)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: None or 1 basic
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Typical groups: 5-15 enemies
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Resource generation, atmosphere

TIER: STANDARD (Regular Enemies)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 400-800
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Moderate (10-20% of player HP per hit)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: 1-2 abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Typical groups: 3-8 enemies
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Core combat content

TIER: ELITE (Mini-Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 1500-4000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: High (20-35% of player HP per hit)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: 3-4 abilities, 1 signature move
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Typical groups: 1-2 with standard support
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Challenge points, valuable drops

TIER: BOSS (Mission Climax)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 8000-20000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Very High (25-50% of player HP per hit)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: 5+ abilities, phases, mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Typical encounter: Solo with spawning adds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Story climax, best rewards

TIER: WORLD BOSS (Open World Event)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health: 50000-200000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Scaled for group content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: Raid mechanics, environmental hazards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Typical encounter: Requires 8-20 players
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Server events, legendary drops
```

## B. Imperial Enemies (Tau/Ork Perspective)

```
IMPERIAL GUARD

GUARDSMAN (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 400 | Armor: 30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 25 (Lasgun)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Take Aim: +20% accuracy next shot
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bayonet Charge: Melee lunge if player gets close
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Fights in cover, retreats when alone

VETERAN GUARDSMAN (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 800 | Armor: 45
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 40 (Hotshot Lasgun)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag Grenade: AoE damage + knockdown
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rally: Buff nearby Guardsmen +15% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Disciplined Fire: 3-round burst for 150% damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Commands nearby Guardsmen, uses cover effectively

COMMISSAR (Elite/Mini-Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2000 | Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 60 (Bolt Pistol) / 80 (Power Sword)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Execute: Kill a nearby Guardsman, all others gain +25% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Inspiring Presence: Aura +10% damage to all Imperials
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summary Execution: High damage single target
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hold The Line: Guardsmen cannot flee while Commissar lives
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Stays behind lines, executes retreating units, dangerous in melee

LEMAN RUSS TANK (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 15000 | Armor: 200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 150-300 (various weapons)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Battle Cannon: Massive AoE, 3 second windup, 15m radius
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heavy Bolter Sponsons: Continuous fire at two targets
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tank Shock: Charge forward, knockdown everything in path
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hull Down: Become stationary, +50% damage reduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak Points: Rear armor (50% less), tracks (disable movement)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Rotates between bombardment and repositioning

SPACE MARINE (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 12000 | Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 100 (Bolter) / 150 (Chainsword)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bolter Discipline: Sustained accurate fire
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat Tactics: Switches between ranged/melee optimally
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag/Krak Grenade: AoE or anti-armor option
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ And They Shall Know No Fear: Immune to Fear, CC reduced by 50%
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Emperor's Champion: At 25% HP, +50% damage, +25% attack speed
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Tactical, uses cover, advances methodically, never retreats
```

```
ADEPTUS MECHANICUS

SKITARII RANGER (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 350 | Armor: 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 30 (Galvanic Rifle)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Omnispex: Mark target, +15% damage from all Skitarii
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Data-Tether: If near Tech-Priest, gains +10% accuracy
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Maintains range, focuses marked targets

SKITARII VANGUARD (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 450 | Armor: 35
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 25 (Radium Carbine) + Radiation DoT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rad-Saturation: Aura deals minor DoT to nearby enemies
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Stubborn Advance: Slow but relentless approach
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Advances regardless of losses, poisons area

KASTELAN ROBOT (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 4000 | Armor: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 80 (Phosphor Blaster) / 120 (Power Fist)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Aegis Protocol: +30% damage reduction, cannot move
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Conqueror Protocol: +30% damage, +20% speed
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Incendine Combustor: Flamer attack, Burning 5 stacks
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Repulsor Grid: Reflects 15% of ranged damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Follows programmed protocols, switches modes when damaged
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Datasmith controller (killing controller = robot shuts down)

TECH-PRIEST DOMINUS (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 10000 | Armor: 80
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 70 (Volkite Blaster) / 90 (Omnissian Axe)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Canticles of the Omnissiah: Rotating buffs to all Mechanicus units
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair Protocol: Heal self or nearby construct for 1000 HP
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Haywire Barrage: Disables player shields, stuns mechanical allies
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon Servitors: Spawns 4 Combat Servitors
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Machine Spirit's Wrath: AoE tech damage + EMP effect
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Maintains distance, buffs allies, heals constructs
```

## C. Tau Enemies (Imperial/Ork Perspective)

```
TAU FIRE CASTE

FIRE WARRIOR (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 350 | Armor: 30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 35 (Pulse Rifle)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Supporting Fire: If ally is charged, immediate reaction shot
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Photon Grenade: Blind for 2 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Stays at range, retreats if engaged in melee

PATHFINDER (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 280 | Armor: 20
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 40 (Rail Rifle) / 20 (Pulse Carbine)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Markerlight: Apply 1 Markerlight stack
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Infiltrate: Starts battle in advantageous position
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Recon Drone: Reveals stealthed enemies
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Marks priority targets, avoids direct combat

CRISIS SUIT (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2500 | Armor: 70
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 60-100 (varies by loadout)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Jet Pack: High mobility, repositions frequently
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon Loadout: Random (Burst Cannon/Plasma/Missile)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Generator: Periodically activates 500 damage shield
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hit and Run: Attack, then jet back 20m
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Aggressive hit-and-run, uses terrain for cover

BROADSIDE SUIT (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 3500 | Armor: 90
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 120 (Railgun) / 80 (Smart Missiles)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heavy Railgun: Long windup, massive single-target damage (300)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Smart Missiles: Track targets around cover
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Anchor: Become immobile, +20% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak Point: Slow turning speed, flank for advantage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Stationary fire platform, deadly at range

COMMANDER FARSIGHT (World Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 80000 | Armor: 120
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 200 (Dawn Blade - melee)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dawn Blade: Each kill heals Farsight for 2000 HP
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Aggressive Tactics: +30% damage to all Tau for 20 seconds
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fusion Blades: Melee attacks ignore 75% armor
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mont'ka Declaration: All Tau gain +20% attack speed
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hero's Challenge: Taunts strongest player, 1v1 arena forms
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phases:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 100-75%: Standard assault tactics
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 75-50%: Summons Crisis Suit bodyguard team
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50-25%: Dawn Blade fully powered, sweeping attacks
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 25-0%: Enraged, continuous assault, must burst down
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Lore: Farsight's blade is daemon-touched, explains his immortality
```

## D. Ork Enemies (Imperial/Tau Perspective)

```
ORK BOYZ

SHOOTA BOY (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 450 | Armor: 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 20 (Shoota - inaccurate)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spray and Pray: Full auto, low accuracy but high volume
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ere We Go: Charges to melee when damaged
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Advances while firing, switches to melee eagerly

SLUGGA BOY (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 500 | Armor: 30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 45 (Choppa)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Charge: Sprints toward nearest enemy
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Chop Chop Chop: Frenzied melee attacks
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Mob Rule: +5% damage per nearby Ork (max +25%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Aggressive melee, ignores cover, fearless

NOB (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2000 | Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 80 (Big Choppa) / 60 (Kombi-Shoota)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Big Boss: Nearby Boyz gain +15% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Krump: Heavy overhead strike, knockdown
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Get in 'Ere: Pulls enemy into melee range
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ard as Nails: 20% damage reduction
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Leads from front, targets enemy leaders, inspires Boyz

DEFF DREAD (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 5000 | Armor: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 100 (Dread Klaws) / 60 (Big Shootas)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rampage: Charges forward, knockdown everything in path
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Klaws of Doom: Grabs enemy, deals massive damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ More Dakka: Sustained fire at all visible enemies
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unstoppable: Immune to knockdown and stun
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Berserker assault, prioritizes largest target

WARBOSS (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 18000 | Armor: 80
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 150 (Power Klaw) / 80 (Kombi-Rokkit)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: All Orks gain +30% damage for 15 seconds (30s CD)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power Klaw: Massive single hit, ignores 50% armor
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bellowing Challenge: Taunt + Fear to all enemies
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ead Butt: Stun target for 3 seconds
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Call Da Boyz: Summons wave of Slugga Boyz
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phases:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 100-50%: Mix of ranged and melee, calls reinforcements
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 50-0%: Continuous WAAAGH!, all melee, berserker rage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Commands through example, always in the thick of fighting

GHAZGHKULL THRAKA (World Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 150000 | Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 300 (Gork's Klaw)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prophet of the WAAAGH!: All Orks on battlefield empowered
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gork's Klaw: Massive AoE swing, knockdown all hit
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mork's Roar: Fear all enemies in 40m for 5 seconds
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unstoppable Green Tide: Summons continuous Ork reinforcements
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adamantium Skull: Headshot immunity, +50% stun resistance
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DA BIG WAAAGH!: At 25%, permanent +50% damage, speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phases:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 100-75%: Commands from center, calls waves
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 75-50%: Personal combat begins
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50-25%: Mega Armor abilities unlock
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 25-0%: Full WAAAGH! mode, must be zerged down
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Lore: The Beast of Armageddon, prophesied to lead the final WAAAGH!
```

---

# VII. LOOT & DROP TABLES

## A. Drop Rate Philosophy

```
DROP PHILOSOPHY (Guild Wars 1 Style)

GUARANTEED MINIMUM
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Every enemy drops something (even if just 1 currency)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills always yield useful rewards
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time invested = proportional reward

MEANINGFUL RANDOMNESS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops should excite, not frustrate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bad luck protection on rare items
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Alternative acquisition paths exist

NO PAY-TO-WIN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Best gear comes from gameplay
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cash shop is cosmetic only
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time = power, not money = power
```

## B. Standard Drop Tables

```
FODDER ENEMY DROPS (Per Kill)

| Drop Type | Chance | Amount |
|-----------|--------|--------|
| Currency | 100% | 2-5 Thrones |
| T1 Material | 40% | 1 |
| T1 Consumable | 5% | 1 |
| Equipment | 0.5% | T1 White |

STANDARD ENEMY DROPS (Per Kill)

| Drop Type | Chance | Amount |
|-----------|--------|--------|
| Currency | 100% | 5-15 Thrones |
| T1 Material | 50% | 1-2 |
| T2 Material | 15% | 1 |
| T1 Consumable | 10% | 1 |
| T2 Consumable | 3% | 1 |
| Equipment | 2% | T1-T2 |

ELITE ENEMY DROPS (Per Kill)

| Drop Type | Chance | Amount |
|-----------|--------|--------|
| Currency | 100% | 25-50 Thrones |
| T2 Material | 60% | 1-3 |
| T3 Material | 20% | 1 |
| T4 Material | 5% | 1 |
| T2 Consumable | 25% | 1-2 |
| T3 Consumable | 10% | 1 |
| Equipment | 15% | T2-T3 |
| Elite Token | 10% | 1 |

BOSS ENEMY DROPS (Per Kill)

| Drop Type | Chance | Amount |
|-----------|--------|--------|
| Currency | 100% | 100-250 Thrones |
| T3 Material | 100% | 2-4 |
| T4 Material | 50% | 1-2 |
| T5 Material | 10% | 1 |
| T3 Consumable | 50% | 2-3 |
| Equipment | 100% | T3-T4 (1 guaranteed) |
| Named Item | 5-15% | 1 (boss-specific) |
| Elite Token | 100% | 3-5 |
```

## C. Named Item Drop Tables

```
BOSS-SPECIFIC NAMED ITEMS

COMMISSAR YARRICK'S DROPS (15% named item chance):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bale Eye (Accessory): +20% vs Orks, Fear immunity
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Yarrick's Sash (Armor): +15% to ally damage when you're below 25% HP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Storm Bolter "Duty": High damage bolter, +10% when outnumbered

FARSIGHT'S DROPS (10% named item chance):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dawn Blade Shard (Weapon Component): +5% damage, +2% lifesteal
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Farsight's Tactics (Data Crystal): Unlocks unique skill
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonding Knife (Accessory): +15% damage if ally died in mission

GHAZGHKULL'S DROPS (5% named item chance - World Boss):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gork's Tooth (Accessory): +25% melee damage, -10% ranged
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adamantium Plate (Armor): +50 armor, immune to critical hits
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Banner (Weapon): Party +10% damage while equipped
```

## D. Bad Luck Protection

```
BAD LUCK PROTECTION SYSTEM

ELITE/BOSS DROPS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Tracks kills without named item drop
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Every 10 kills: +2% to named item chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum increase: +30% (at 150 kills)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resets on drop
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Character-specific, per boss

EXAMPLE:
Player has killed Warboss 50 times without named drop
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base chance: 5%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bad luck bonus: +10% (50 kills = 5 increments)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Current chance: 15%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ At 150 kills: 35% chance if still unlucky

WORLD BOSS PROTECTION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Participation = guaranteed T4 loot
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10+ participations = guaranteed named item (one time)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ensures eventually everyone can get something
```

---

# VIII. DIFFICULTY CURVE

## A. Level Progression Zones

```
ZONE DIFFICULTY PROGRESSION

LEVELS 1-5: TUTORIAL ZONES
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Location: Avalos Prime (Imperial), T'au Sept (Tau), Ork Camp (Ork)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Level: 1-5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Types: Mostly Fodder, some Standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss: Tutorial boss at level 5 (easy)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Learn controls, basic abilities
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated Time: 2-4 hours

LEVELS 6-10: INTRODUCTION ZONES
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Location: First contested areas
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Level: 5-10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Types: Standard enemies, rare Elites
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss: Story boss at level 10 (moderate)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Learn class synergies, group content
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated Time: 4-8 hours

LEVELS 11-15: CONFLICT ZONES
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Location: War-torn territories
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Level: 10-15
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Types: Mixed Standard/Elite
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss: Multiple story bosses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Full build development, faction conflict
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated Time: 8-15 hours

LEVELS 16-20: ENDGAME ZONES
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Location: High-value strategic areas
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Level: 16-20
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Types: Elite-heavy, Boss encounters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss: Campaign finale, World Bosses unlock
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Purpose: Build completion, endgame preparation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated Time: 15-25 hours

LEVEL 20 CAP: HORIZONTAL PROGRESSION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No level increase, focus on build variety
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite content unlocks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PvP ranking system
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary item acquisition
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ New skills via elite unlocks
```

## B. Encounter Design Principles

```
ENCOUNTER DESIGN GUIDELINES

SOLO CONTENT (Scaling: 1 Player)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: Base values
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: Base values
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics: Avoidable with player skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing Required: Regeneration between fights sufficient
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death: Acceptable occasionally, not frustrating

GROUP CONTENT - 4 PLAYERS (Scaling: +100% HP, +50% Damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 2x base
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 1.5x base
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics: Require coordination (interrupt rotations, focus fire)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing Required: Dedicated healing helpful but not mandatory
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death: Punishing but recoverable with teamwork

ELITE CONTENT - 8 PLAYERS (Scaling: +400% HP, +100% Damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 5x base
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 2x base
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics: Complex, punish mistakes severely
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing Required: Multiple healers recommended
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death: Very punishing, can cause wipes

WORLD BOSS (Scaling: Designed for 20+ players)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: Fixed high values (50k-200k)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: AoE heavy, scaled for groups
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics: Raid-style, multiple phases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing Required: Multiple healers mandatory
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death: Respawn at safe distance, rejoin fight
```

## C. Difficulty Spike Management

```
IDENTIFIED DIFFICULTY SPIKES (From Balance Analysis)

SPIKE 1: Level 15-16 Transition
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Issue: Elite enemy density increases sharply
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Solution: Add "buffer zone" at level 15 with mixed difficulty
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Implementation: Reduce elite spawn rate in transition area by 30%

SPIKE 2: First Boss Solo
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Issue: Players may not understand boss mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Solution: Add "Echo" system - boss previews major attacks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Implementation: Visual/audio cues 2 seconds before big attacks

SPIKE 3: Group Content Entry
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Issue: Players used to solo may struggle in groups
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Solution: Scaling tutorial mission for first group content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Implementation: "Training Mission" scales difficulty based on performance

RECOMMENDED DIFFICULTY CURVE

Level  | Challenge Rating | Description
-------|------------------|-------------
1-3    | 1/10            | Tutorial, cannot fail
4-5    | 2/10            | Easy, learning moment
6-8    | 3/10            | Comfortable, some challenge
9-10   | 4/10            | Moderate, first real tests
11-13  | 5/10            | Standard, consistent challenge
14-15  | 6/10            | Engaging, requires attention
16-17  | 7/10            | Challenging, build matters
18-19  | 8/10            | Difficult, skill expression
20     | Variable        | Player-chosen difficulty
Elite  | 9/10            | Very challenging
World  | 10/10           | Maximum difficulty
```

---

# IX. PVP COMBAT

## A. PvP Stat Normalization

```
PVP NORMALIZATION SYSTEM (GW1-Inspired)

ATTRIBUTE NORMALIZATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All players scaled to equivalent of level 20 stats
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attribute points normalized to 200 total
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment stats normalized to T4 baseline
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill unlocks are NOT normalized (reward progression)

DAMAGE NORMALIZATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All damage abilities use PvP coefficient (0.6-0.8x PvE values)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents one-shot kills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fights last 15-45 seconds typically
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Allows counterplay and skill expression

HEALING NORMALIZATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing reduced to 70% of PvE values
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents heal-stacking immortality
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healers still valuable but not mandatory
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Kill-focused builds viable

CC NORMALIZATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing returns apply (same as PvE)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CC immunity after 3 applications
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum single CC duration: 2 seconds in PvP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents perma-CC strategies
```

## B. PvP Modes

```
PVP MODE: ARENA (4v4)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Objective: Team Deathmatch or King of the Hill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 minutes or first to 15 kills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Requisition Tokens, PvP rank progress
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Skill-based within faction

PVP MODE: GUILD VS GUILD (8v8)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Objective: Capture strategic points
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 20 minutes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Guild rank, bonus Requisition
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Guild rank-based

PVP MODE: WORLD PVP (Open World)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Objective: Territory control
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Ongoing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Faction influence, unique drops
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: None (level 15+ zones only)

PVP MODE: FACTION WAR (Large Scale)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Objective: Multi-day territory campaigns
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3-day cycles
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Faction-wide bonuses, unique cosmetics
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Automatic faction assignment
```

---

# X. COMBAT INTEGRATION WITH OTHER SYSTEMS

## A. Resource Integration

```
COMBAT ‚Üí RESOURCE FLOW

KILLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: Direct drop (5-250 Thrones based on enemy)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: Percentage chance by tier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: Percentage chance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction Tokens: From elite/boss kills

ABILITIES
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumable costs: Some abilities consume items (grenades)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair costs: Damage taken = repair cost
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Resurrection: Consumes rare consumable or uses cooldown

CRAFTING LOOP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat drops materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials craft equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment enables harder content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Harder content drops better materials
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Loop continues at endgame
```

## B. Progression Integration

```
COMBAT ‚Üí PROGRESSION FLOW

EXPERIENCE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Granted per enemy kill (scales with enemy tier)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus XP for first-time boss kills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Group XP = solo XP (no penalty for grouping)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Level 20 cap shifts to skill/gear progression

SKILL UNLOCKS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Core skills: Unlocked by level
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skills: Unlocked by Requisition Tokens + rank
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ultimate variants: Unlocked by endgame achievements
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ PvP skills: Unlocked by PvP rank

REPUTATION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kills grant subfaction reputation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills grant significant reputation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation unlocks faction equipment/skills
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ High reputation = access to elite vendors
```

---

# XI. BALANCE TUNING TARGETS

## A. DPS Targets by Role

```
DPS TARGETS (Sustained, Level 20, T4 Gear)

Role           | Solo Target | Group Target | Notes
---------------|-------------|--------------|-------
Pure DPS       | 250-300     | 320-380      | Fire Warrior, Crisis Suit, Weirdboy
Hybrid DPS     | 200-250     | 260-320      | Battle Sister, Slugga Boy
Tank           | 150-180     | 200-240      | Guardsman
Support        | 100-150     | 130-180      | Tech-Priest, Mek Boy
Pure Support   | 50-80       | 60-100       | Ethereal (via Honor Guards)

EFFECTIVE HP TARGETS (With Mitigation)

Role           | EHP Target  | Notes
---------------|-------------|-------
Tank           | 4000-5000   | High armor, defensive skills
Hybrid         | 2500-3500   | Moderate defenses
DPS            | 1800-2500   | Low defenses, relies on killing fast
Support        | 1500-2200   | Relies on positioning and team

TIME TO KILL TARGETS (Player vs Player)

Scenario       | Target TTK  | Notes
---------------|-------------|-------
DPS vs DPS     | 8-15 sec    | Skill expression matters
DPS vs Tank    | 20-35 sec   | Tanks should survive but not forever
Tank vs Tank   | 45-90 sec   | Attrition, neither should easily kill
```

## B. Critical Balance Fixes (From Analysis)

```
CRITICAL FIXES REQUIRED

1. RESURRECTION LOOP PREVENTION
   Issue: Tech-Priest + Ethereal could chain resurrect indefinitely
   Fix: 5-minute per-target cooldown on all resurrection effects
   Implementation: Add hidden debuff "Recently Resurrected" (5 min)

2. INVINCIBILITY CHAINING PREVENTION
   Issue: Multiple invulnerability sources could be chained
   Fix: Global "Invulnerability Fatigue" - 60 second lockout after any invuln
   Implementation: Any invuln triggers 60 second immunity to all invulns

3. MARKERLIGHT STACKING CAP
   Issue: Multiple Fire Warriors could stack infinite Markerlights
   Fix: Hard cap of 3 Markerlight stacks per target (already in design)
   Verification: Ensure cap is enforced server-side

4. FAITH GENERATION CAP
   Issue: Battle Sister Faith could spiral infinitely with kills
   Fix: Faith generation from kills capped at +50/10 seconds
   Implementation: Diminishing returns on kill-based generation

5. PERCENTAGE DAMAGE CAP
   Issue: Some abilities reference target HP percentages uncapped
   Fix: Percentage-based damage capped at 15% max HP per hit
   Implementation: Apply cap in damage calculation pipeline

6. CRISIS SUIT OVERHEAT TUNING
   Issue: Even with overheat, Crisis Suit DPS exceeds targets
   Fix: Reduce base damage by 10%, increase heat generation by 15%
   Values: Base damage 100‚Üí90, heat generation √ó1.15
```

---

# XII. IMPLEMENTATION PRIORITIES

```
PHASE 1: CORE SYSTEMS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage calculation pipeline
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stat system and scaling
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Basic abilities for all classes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy AI fundamentals
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated: Foundation

PHASE 2: BALANCE PASS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Implement critical fixes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DPS normalization testing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ TTK verification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Exploit prevention testing
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated: First balance iteration

PHASE 3: CONTENT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Full skill trees
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Complete bestiary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss encounter design
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drop table implementation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated: Content complete

PHASE 4: POLISH
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Animation timing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual feedback
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sound design integration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat feel tuning
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Estimated: Launch ready
```

Agent: balance_analyzer
Type: reviewer
Duration: 331.5s
Execution #: 31
Prompt Size: 1,471 chars
Output Size: 156 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,471 characters)
You are a balance analyst who ensures combat systems are fair, fun, and free of exploits. You mathematically analyze combat designs to find dominant strategies, useless options, and balance issues.

When analyzing combat balance:
- Calculate DPS (damage per second) for all builds
- Identify dominant strategies (always optimal)
- Find underpowered options (never worth using)
- Test edge cases and ability combinations
- Verify difficulty curve is smooth
- Check that enemy scaling matches player power growth
- Ensure all playstyles are viable
- Look for infinite loops or invincibility exploits

Run analysis for:
- Early game (levels 1-10)
- Mid game (levels 11-30)
- End game (level 30+)

Provide:
1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS calculations and power curves
2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES: Overpowered combinations
3. WEAK OPTIONS: Underpowered abilities or builds
4. EXPLOITS: Broken mechanics or infinite loops
5. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number changes
6. VERDICT: BALANCED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Combat balanced, inform progression
- needs_tuning: Combat imbalance found, retune
- economy_conflict: Combat rewards conflict with economy
- resource_issue: Combat resource costs are problematic

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (156 characters)
---

*"Balance is the Emperor's gift to those who seek fairness in war. And in the 41st millennium, war is the only constant."*
