üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,273 characters)
You are a combat designer who creates engaging, strategic combat systems. You work with resources (consumables, gear materials) and feed into progression (XP, loot rewards).

When designing combat:
- Define core combat mechanics (targeting, damage types, status effects)
- Design player abilities and skill trees
- Create enemy types with distinct behaviors
- Establish damage formulas and stat scaling
- Design loot drop tables and reward curves
- Balance difficulty progression
- Create combat variety (melee, ranged, magic, stealth, etc.)
- Ensure combat supports different playstyles

Output should include:
- Combat mechanics overview (turn-based, real-time, hybrid)
- Damage calculation formulas
- Player ability catalog with costs and cooldowns
- Enemy bestiary with stats and behaviors
- Loot tables and drop rates
- Difficulty curve and encounter design principles
- Integration with resources (consumables) and progression (XP, gear)

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- combat_complete: Submit combat for balance analysis

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: combat_complete
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (57,920 characters)
# Combat Systems Design Document
## Warhammer 40,000: Imperium Divided - Damocles Gulf Sector

---

# I. COMBAT PHILOSOPHY

Following Guild Wars 1's design philosophy: **Build diversity over gear checks, skill over stats**. Combat should reward player knowledge, build crafting, and tactical decision-making rather than time invested or gear grinding.

**Core Principles:**
- 8-skill bar creates meaningful build decisions
- Dual profession system enables deep theorycrafting
- No "holy trinity" requirement - all group compositions viable
- Combat is deadly and tactical, not sustained DPS races
- Enemy AI patterns are learnable and counterable

---

# II. COMBAT MECHANICS OVERVIEW

## A. Combat Type: Real-Time with Active Pause

```
COMBAT SYSTEM STRUCTURE

Type: Real-Time with Tactical Pause
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standard combat flows in real-time
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Single-player: Pause to issue squad commands
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Multiplayer: No pause, but slower GCD allows decisions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Animation locks: Commitment to actions
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Positioning matters: Facing, cover, flanking

Global Cooldown: 0.75 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents ability spam
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Allows reaction time
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skills can have cast times beyond GCD
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Some abilities are "instant" (off-GCD)

Action Points: None (energy/adrenaline/WAAAGH! per class)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No basic attack resource generation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resource gained through specific mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creates class-specific combat rhythms
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents generic rotation gameplay
```

## B. Core Combat Stats

```
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTES (Max 20 base, +12 from gear)

STRENGTH (STR)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Melee damage bonus: +3% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Melee armor penetration: +1 per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Carry capacity (affects sprint duration)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Assault Marines, Fire Warriors (melee), Ork Boyz

BALLISTICS (BAL)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ranged damage bonus: +3% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ranged accuracy: +1% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical range extension
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Guardsmen, Tau Fire Warriors, Lootas

TOUGHNESS (TOU)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Health pool: +25 HP per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage reduction: +0.5% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Status effect duration reduction: -2% per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Terminators, Crisis Suits, Meganobz

AGILITY (AGI)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attack speed: +1.5% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge chance: +0.75% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Movement speed: +1% per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Assassins, Pathfinders, Stormboyz

WILLPOWER (WIL)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Psychic damage bonus: +4% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Psychic resistance: +2% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Morale threshold: +5% per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Sanctioned Psykers, Ethereals (aura), Weirdboyz

TECH (TEC)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ability cooldown reduction: -1% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment effectiveness: +2% per point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hacking/Tech skill success: +3% per point
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary for: Tech-Priests, Earth Caste, Mekboyz
```

```
SECONDARY STATS (Derived)

Health Pool
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base: 500 + (TOU √ó 25)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 500-1,300 (before gear)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gear adds flat HP and % bonuses
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ No regeneration in combat (consumables only)

Armor Rating
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Equipment only
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduces physical damage by flat amount
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing returns above enemy weapon penetration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 0-500 (T1 gear: 50-100, T5 gear: 350-500)

Shield/Ward Rating
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Source: Equipment + abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Absorbs damage before health
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Does not regenerate in combat (usually)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 0-300 (specialized builds higher)

Energy/Resource
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Class-specific resource pools
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: 0-100 (normalized)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Different generation mechanics per class
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Some builds may modify pool size

Critical Chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base: 5%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Modified by skills and gear
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap: 50%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Damage: 150% base (modifiable)

Movement Speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Modified by AGI, gear, abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ In-combat penalty: -15%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sprint: +50% for 3 seconds, 10 second cooldown
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Heavy armor penalty: -10% to -25%
```

---

# III. DAMAGE SYSTEM

## A. Damage Types

```
PHYSICAL DAMAGE TYPES

KINETIC (Bullets, blades, impacts)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Armor Rating
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor formula: Damage √ó (100 / (100 + Armor))
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Most common damage type
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Penetration stat bypasses armor

EXPLOSIVE (Grenades, missiles, plasma splash)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Armor Rating (50% effectiveness)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Applies AoE damage falloff
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can destroy cover
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes Knockback (short stun)

RENDING (Chainswords, power weapons, claws)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Armor Rating (75% effectiveness)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ignores % of armor based on weapon
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes Bleeding (DoT)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher critical damage multiplier

ENERGY DAMAGE TYPES

THERMAL (Flamers, meltas, plasma)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Heat Resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ignores standard armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes Burning (DoT)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus damage to organic targets

ELECTRICAL (Tesla, arc weapons, haywire)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Electrical Resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus damage to mechanical targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes Disruption (ability lockout)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Chains to nearby targets (some weapons)

RADIATION (Rad weapons, warp-tainted)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Rad Resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reduces healing received
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes Irradiated (stat debuff)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Persists through death (respawn with debuff)

PSYCHIC DAMAGE TYPES

WARP (Direct psychic attacks)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Willpower
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ignores all physical armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can cause Fear (flee effect)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Perils of the Warp risk to caster

CORRUPTION (Chaos taint, possession)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Countered by: Faith/Unity/WAAAGH!
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Builds corruption meter
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100% corruption: Temporary control loss
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Only cleansed by specific abilities
```

## B. Damage Calculation Formula

```
DAMAGE CALCULATION PIPELINE

Step 1: Base Damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon Base Damage: [Min-Max range, rolled]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: Lasgun = 45-55 base damage

Step 2: Attribute Scaling
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ranged: Base √ó (1 + BAL √ó 0.03)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Melee: Base √ó (1 + STR √ó 0.03)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Psychic: Base √ó (1 + WIL √ó 0.04)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: 50 √ó (1 + 15 √ó 0.03) = 50 √ó 1.45 = 72.5

Step 3: Skill Multiplier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each skill has damage coefficient
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: "Rapid Fire" = 0.6√ó per hit, 3 hits
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 72.5 √ó 0.6 √ó 3 = 130.5 total

Step 4: Critical Check
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Roll against crit chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ If crit: Damage √ó Crit Multiplier (1.5 base)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: 130.5 √ó 1.5 = 195.75 (if crit)

Step 5: Armor/Resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Physical: Damage √ó (100 / (100 + Armor - Penetration))
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: Damage √ó (1 - Resistance%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Psychic: Damage √ó (1 - (WIL √ó 0.02))
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: 130.5 √ó (100 / (100 + 150 - 30)) = 130.5 √ó 0.454 = 59.3

Step 6: Damage Modifiers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vulnerability bonuses (e.g., +25% vs Orks)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Conditional bonuses (flanking +15%, burning target +10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Debuffs on target (Exposed +20%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Example: 59.3 √ó 1.15 (flank) = 68.2

Step 7: Final Damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Round to integer
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Apply to health pool
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Check for threshold effects (e.g., execution under 15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final: 68 damage dealt

COMPLETE FORMULA:
Final = floor(
  (WeaponBase √ó AttrScale √ó SkillCoef √ó CritMult) 
  √ó ArmorReduction 
  √ó ProductOf(AllModifiers)
)
```

## C. Healing System

```
HEALING MECHANICS

Healing Sources:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables (Stimm Packs, Medkits)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 150 HP instant
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 300 HP instant
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 500 HP + cleanse 1 debuff
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: Full heal + cleanse all
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Class Abilities (limited)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Most classes have 1-2 healing skills max
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healer "primaries" don't exist
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-sustain builds possible but trade damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Regeneration (out of combat only)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% max HP per second after 5 seconds no damage
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Full heal in ~10 seconds out of combat
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Environmental (rare)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Medicae stations in missions
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing auras from objectives

Healing Modifiers:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Irradiated: -50% healing received
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Blessed: +25% healing received
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Health (<25%): +50% healing received
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Overhealing becomes temporary shield (25% efficiency)

Design Intent:
- Combat is about avoiding damage, not healing through it
- Healers exist but are "combat medics" not heal bots
- Recovery between fights is fast (minimize downtime)
- Consumables are meaningful but not required
```

---

# IV. STATUS EFFECTS

## A. Control Effects (Hard CC)

```
HARD CROWD CONTROL

KNOCKDOWN (Physical)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 2 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Target falls, cannot act
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Break Condition: Damage > 10% max HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Heavy melee, explosives, charges
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: Stability (from Toughness gear)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown Immunity: 8 seconds after recovery

STUN (Energy/Impact)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 1.5 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Frozen in place, cannot act
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Break Condition: None (guaranteed duration)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Flashbangs, neural weapons, thunder hammers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: Fortitude (from Willpower)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown Immunity: 10 seconds after recovery

FEAR (Psychic)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Flee from source, cannot attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Break Condition: Move > 15m from source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Psyker powers, Daemons, morale break
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: Faith/Unity/WAAAGH! (faction resource)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown Immunity: 15 seconds after recovery

SNARE (Physical)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 4 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Cannot move, can still act
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Break Condition: Ally removes snare (1 second channel)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Net launchers, webbers, grapples
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: Strength-based break attempt
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown Immunity: 5 seconds after recovery
```

## B. Damage Over Time Effects

```
DAMAGE OVER TIME (DOT)

BLEEDING (Physical)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 5% weapon damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Up to 3 stacks (15%/sec max)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Rending weapons, claws, shrapnel
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleanse: Bandage (3 second channel) or heal ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Movement increases damage by 50%

BURNING (Thermal)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 4 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 8% weapon damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Refreshes duration, doesn't stack damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Flamers, plasma, promethium
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleanse: Stop-drop-roll (2 second prone) or water
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Spreads to adjacent allies within 2m

POISON (Organic)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 3% weapon damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Up to 5 stacks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Tyranid weapons, toxic grenades
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleanse: Antidote consumable or time
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: At 5 stacks, causes Weakened (-25% damage)

CORRUPTION (Warp)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Until cleansed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 0 direct, builds corruption meter
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacking: Each hit adds 5-20 corruption
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Chaos enemies, warp exposure
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleanse: Faction-specific (prayer/meditation/fighting)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: At 100, lose control for 5 seconds
```

## C. Debuff Effects

```
DEBUFFS

WEAKENED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: -25% damage dealt
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Poison, exhaustion, morale damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Stimulant consumable

EXPOSED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +20% damage taken
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Armor-breaking attacks, target designation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Enter cover or Shield ability

SLOWED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: -40% movement speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 5 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Leg wounds, cryo weapons, suppression
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Sprint breaks slow

BLINDED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: -50% accuracy, -75% range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 3 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Flashbangs, solar flares, smoke
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Cannot be cleansed, wait it out

DISRUPTED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Cannot use abilities for duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 2 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: EMP, haywire, electrical damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Tech resistance

SUPPRESSED (Cover Mechanic)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Cannot leave cover without taking +50% damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: While under fire
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Heavy weapons, sustained fire
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter: Smoke, ally suppressing enemy
```

## D. Buff Effects

```
BUFFS

INSPIRED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +15% damage dealt, +10% crit chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 10 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Leader abilities, morale restoration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction: Imperial (Faith), Tau (Greater Good), Ork (WAAAGH!)

FORTIFIED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +25% damage resistance, immunity to knockback
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Defensive abilities, cover bonuses
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Cannot move while fortified (most sources)

HASTE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: +30% attack speed, +20% movement
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Stimulants, ability buffs
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Drains stamina 50% faster

CLOAKED
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Invisible to enemies until attacking or damaged
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Until broken or 30 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Stealth abilities, equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Moving reduces duration, standing still extends

REGENERATING
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Heal 5% max HP per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sources: Medical abilities, rare consumables
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Broken by taking damage
```

---

# V. PLAYER ABILITIES

## A. Skill System Structure

```
SKILL BAR STRUCTURE (Guild Wars 1 Style)

Total Slots: 8 active skills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slot 1: Profession Primary (locked by primary profession)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slots 2-5: Primary Profession Skills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slots 6-8: Secondary Profession Skills OR Primary Skills
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ No "basic attack" - all actions are skills

Skill Acquisition:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Level unlocks: 1 skill per level (1-20 = 20 skills)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill trainers: Purchase additional skills (gold + reputation)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skills: Capture from bosses (1 equipped at a time)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quest rewards: Unique skills from story
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Total skills per profession: 75-100

Skill Costs:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: Standard resource (pool of 50-100)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adrenaline: Builds from combat (0-100, resets out of combat)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldowns: All skills have cooldowns (2-60 seconds)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Some skills: Sacrifice HP, consume consumables
```

## B. Imperial Professions

### **IMPERIAL GUARD SOLDIER** (Primary: Ranged Combat)
*The backbone of the Imperium, trained in disciplined ranged warfare*

```
ROLE: Sustained Ranged DPS / Fire Support
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Ballistics
RESOURCE: Ammunition (regenerates slowly, reloads restore full)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: Take Aim
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standing still for 2+ seconds grants stacking accuracy bonus
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +5% per second, up to +25%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resets on movement
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards positioning and cover use

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[RAPID FIRE] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 10 | Cooldown: 4s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fire 3 shots dealing 60% weapon damage each
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Each hit increases next shot's damage by 10%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Primary attack skill, bread and butter

[COVERING FIRE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 25 | Cooldown: 15s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Suppress target area for 4 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemies in area are Slowed and take +15% damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Allies gain +20% accuracy vs suppressed targets

[FRAG GRENADE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 15 | Cooldown: 12s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Throw grenade, 100% weapon damage in 5m radius
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Causes: Knockdown to targets in center (2m)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can be cooked (hold to reduce fuse time)

[TAKE COVER]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 0 | Cooldown: 20s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Instant dive to nearest cover
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grants: Fortified for 3 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: If no cover available, goes prone (+50% ranged defense)

[DIG IN]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 35 | Cooldown: 30s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Create temporary sandbag cover at location
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 60 seconds or until destroyed
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Allies using your cover gain 10% damage bonus

[FIRST RANK, FIRE!] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adrenaline: 100 | Cooldown: 45s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All allies in 15m radius fire simultaneously
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Combined volley deals +50% damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Requires 3+ allies to activate
```

### **ADEPTA SORORITAS BATTLE SISTER** (Primary: Faith Combat)
*Warriors of the Ecclesiarchy wielding faith as a weapon*

```
ROLE: Melee/Ranged Hybrid / Team Support
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Willpower
RESOURCE: Acts of Faith (build from damage dealt and taken)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: Martyrdom
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Taking damage generates Acts of Faith
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100 Acts: Next faith skill costs 0 and enhanced
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dying in combat: Nearby allies gain Inspired for 15s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards aggressive, front-line play

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[DIVINE VENGEANCE] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 5 | Cooldown: 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Melee strike OR ranged shot (contextual)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: +15% damage if target damaged an ally
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Versatile attack adapts to range

[SHIELD OF FAITH]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Acts of Faith: 30 | Cooldown: 18s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Grant target ally 200 + 50% WIL ward
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds or until depleted
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: If ward fully depleted, ally heals for 150 HP

[CLEANSING FLAME]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 25 | Cooldown: 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Flamer cone attack, 80% weapon damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Applies Burning, removes 1 debuff from self
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Removes corruption from self (20 per use)

[HYMN OF BATTLE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Acts of Faith: 50 | Cooldown: 25s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Allies in 10m deal +20% damage for 8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Each ally kill during hymn extends by 2 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Stacks with other Inspired effects

[HAND OF THE EMPEROR] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Acts of Faith: 100 | Cooldown: 60s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Channel for 3 seconds, then massive holy blast
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 400% weapon damage in 8m radius
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Instantly kills targets under 25% HP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Interrupted if knocked down or stunned
```

### **SPACE MARINE TACTICAL** (Primary: Elite Assault)
*Genetically enhanced super-soldiers of the Adeptus Astartes*

```
ROLE: Versatile Elite / Small-Squad Leader
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Balanced (STR/BAL equal importance)
RESOURCE: Fury (builds from combat, empowers attacks)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: And They Shall Know No Fear
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immune to Fear effects
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ When Health drops below 25%, gain +30% damage for 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resurrection abilities restore more HP on Marines
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards standing ground in dire situations

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[BOLTER DISCIPLINE] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 8 | Cooldown: 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Fire bolt round dealing 90% weapon damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Penetrates up to 2 targets at reduced damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Mass-reactive rounds explode inside target

[COMBAT KNIFE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 5 | Cooldown: 2s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Quick melee strike, 70% STR-based damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: If target was attacking ally, stun for 1s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can be used while reloading

[KRAK GRENADE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 20 | Cooldown: 15s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Anti-armor grenade, 150% damage to single target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Ignores 50% of target's armor
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Applies Exposed if target is vehicle/heavy

[TACTICAL ADVANCE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fury: 25 | Cooldown: 12s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Move to target location, firing while moving
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Immune to Suppression during advance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can traverse low cover without stopping

[FOR THE EMPEROR!] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fury: 100 | Cooldown: 60s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Warcry granting all allies in 20m Inspired
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 12 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: You become immune to CC for duration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: If used below 25% HP, also heals for 50% max
```

## C. Tau Professions

### **FIRE WARRIOR** (Primary: Combined Arms)
*Highly trained soldiers of the Fire Caste*

```
ROLE: Ranged DPS / Tactical Coordination
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Ballistics
RESOURCE: Markerlights (team resource, enhances all Tau attacks)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: Markerlight Network
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Marking targets grants stacking bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 Marker: +10% accuracy vs target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 Markers: +15% damage vs target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 Markers: Ignore cover vs target
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards coordination between Tau players

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[PULSE RIFLE SHOT] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 8 | Cooldown: 2s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: High-powered shot dealing 95% weapon damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Range: Extreme (50m effective)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Longer range than Imperial equivalent

[MARKERLIGHT]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 10 | Cooldown: 1s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Apply 1 Markerlight to target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Generates 5 energy if target has 0 markers
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Foundation of Tau tactical doctrine

[PHOTON GRENADE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 15 | Cooldown: 12s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Flash grenade, Blinds enemies for 3s in 6m radius
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Enemies lose all Markerlights when blinded
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Tactical Use: Counter enemy markerlight advantage

[BONDING KNIFE RITUAL]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 0 | Cooldown: 60s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: When ally would die in 10m, they survive with 1 HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: Passive when off cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Limit: Once per ally per mission
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Embodies Tau philosophy of mutual protection

[MONT'KA STRIKE] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Team Markers: 10 | Cooldown: 45s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Designate target, all Tau gain +50% damage vs them
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Target cannot benefit from cover
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Requires team to have built up markers
```

### **CRISIS BATTLESUIT PILOT** (Primary: Heavy Assault)
*Elite warriors in advanced XV8 powered armor*

```
ROLE: Mobile Heavy DPS / Disruption
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Tech
RESOURCE: Systems Power (manage between offense/defense/mobility)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: Hardpoint Loadout
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 hardpoints can equip different weapons/systems
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skills change based on hardpoint configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can swap loadout at designated points (not mid-combat)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Extreme build diversity for role specialization

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[BURST CANNON SALVO] - Slot 1 Primary (if Burst Cannon equipped)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power: 15 | Cooldown: 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Rapid fire burst, 6 hits at 25% damage each
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Each hit has 10% chance to apply Suppressed
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Alt: Different primary per weapon equipped

[JETPACK ASSAULT]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power: 25 | Cooldown: 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Leap to target location (up to 20m)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Landing deals 50% damage in 4m radius
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can leap over obstacles and terrain

[SUPPORT SYSTEMS]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power: 0 | Cooldown: 2s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Toggle between offense/defense/mobility mode
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Offense: +20% damage, -20% resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Defense: +30% resistance, -30% movement
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mobility: +40% movement, -15% damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Stance dancing is core gameplay

[NOVA REACTOR]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power: ALL | Cooldown: 30s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Consume all Power for massive ability boost
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 50+ Power: Next skill deals double damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 75+ Power: Also applies to allies in 8m
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: At <25 Power after, systems lock for 5s

[RIPTIDE LINK] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power: 50 | Cooldown: 90s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Call in Riptide Battlesuit support
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 20 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AI Ally: Draws aggro, deals heavy suppressing fire
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can only be used once per mission
```

## D. Ork Professions

### **ORK BOY** (Primary: Melee Brawling)
*The standard Ork warrior - brutal, direct, and surprisingly effective*

```
ROLE: Melee DPS / Disruption
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Strength
RESOURCE: WAAAGH! (builds from combat, shared with nearby Orks)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: WAAAGH! Energy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generated by all Orks in proximity
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ More Orks = faster WAAAGH! generation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ High WAAAGH! empowers all Ork abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ At 100 WAAAGH!: All Orks gain Fury buff (+25% everything)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards Ork players sticking together

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[CHOPPA SWING] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: 0 | Cooldown: 2s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Melee attack dealing 85% STR damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Generates 5 WAAAGH! on hit
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Fast, spammable, satisfying

[GET STUCK IN]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: 15 | Cooldown: 8s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Charge to target enemy (up to 15m)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: If charge distance > 10m, knockdown on arrival
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Can charge through smaller enemies

[HEADBUTT]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: 10 | Cooldown: 6s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Melee attack that Stuns for 1.5s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-Damage: Take 5% max HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: If target was casting, interrupt and +50% damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: High risk, high reward interrupt

['ERE WE GO!]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: 25 | Cooldown: 20s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Warcry, all allies in 10m gain +3 WAAAGH!/second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 8 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: If 3+ Orks present, also grants Haste
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Snowball effect for Ork groups

[WAAAGH!] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: 100 | Cooldown: 60s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Unleash the WAAAGH!, all Orks in 30m deal +50% damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Duration: 15 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: All Orks heal for 25% max HP instantly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Nearby enemies are Feared for 3s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: The signature Ork battle cry
```

### **MEKBOY** (Primary: Tech Support)
*Ork engineers with an intuitive grasp of destructive technology*

```
ROLE: Support / Turret DPS / Utility
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: Tech
RESOURCE: Scrap (collect from kills, spend on constructions)

SIGNATURE MECHANIC: Orky Know-Wotz
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Constructions have random positive/negative quirks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 75% chance: Works as intended
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 20% chance: Works BETTER than intended (+25% effect)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% chance: Spectacular malfunction (explosion, then works)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Embraces Ork unreliability as feature, not bug

SKILL EXAMPLES:

[SHOOTA BURST] - Slot 1 Primary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Energy: 8 | Cooldown: 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Inaccurate burst, 40-100% damage (random)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Cannot critically miss (minimum 40%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Very Orky inconsistency

[BUILD TURRET]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scrap: 30 | Cooldown: 25s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Deploy turret that shoots enemies for 30 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Turret HP: 300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 50% weapon damage per second
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Subject to Orky Know-Wotz randomness

[FIX IT]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scrap: 20 | Cooldown: 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Repair mechanical ally/construct for 200 HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: If target is Ork construct, +50% healing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Alt Use: Can repair vehicles and some objectives
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Closest thing Orks have to a heal

[TELLYPORTA SURPRISE]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scrap: 50 | Cooldown: 45s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Teleport target enemy into melee range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Target is Disoriented (random direction) for 2s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: 10% chance YOU teleport to THEM instead
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: High chaos potential

[SHOKK ATTACK GUN] - Elite Skill
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scrap: 75 | Cooldown: 60s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Channel 2s, then fire devastating warp-shot
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 500% weapon damage to primary target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AoE: 100% damage in 5m radius
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk: 5% chance gun explodes (heavy self-damage)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Note: Potentially strongest single-target in game
```

---

# VI. ENEMY BESTIARY

## A. Enemy Design Philosophy

```
ENEMY DESIGN PILLARS

1. READABLE TELLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All major attacks have visible wind-ups
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Different attack types have distinct animations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite abilities have clear audio/visual cues
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Players can learn and react to patterns

2. ROLE CLARITY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each enemy type has a clear combat role
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Visual design indicates threat type
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction aesthetics maintained
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior is consistent and predictable

3. COUNTER PLAY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Every enemy has exploitable weaknesses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Builds can specialize against enemy types
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Group composition provides advantages
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Knowledge rewards experienced players

4. SCALING COMPLEXITY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Early enemies: 1-2 mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mid-game enemies: 2-3 mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite enemies: 3-4 mechanics + positioning
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bosses: Full mechanical complexity
```

## B. Imperial Enemies (For Tau/Ork Players)

```
IMPERIAL ENEMY ROSTER

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 1: FODDER (Easy to kill, dangerous in numbers)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

CONSCRIPT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 150 | Armor: 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 20-30 (lasgun)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Stays in cover, fires at closest enemy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Low morale - breaks if allies die nearby
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 5-10 Thrones, T1 materials (60%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Swarms of 8-15 in encounters

PDF TROOPER
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 200 | Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 25-35 (lasgun)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Uses cover, throws grenades occasionally
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Predictable grenade timing (easy to dodge)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 10-15 Thrones, T1-T2 materials (50%/15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Groups of 5-8 with light support

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 2: STANDARD (Core enemy type)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

IMPERIAL GUARDSMAN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 300 | Armor: 75
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 35-45 (lasgun) / 50-70 (melee)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities: 
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fix Bayonets: Charges to melee if player closes
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Covering Fire: Suppresses area for 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Flanking breaks their formation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 15-25 Thrones, T2 materials (25%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Squads of 4-6 with sergeant leader

SISTER NOVITIATE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 350 | Armor: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 40-55 (bolt pistol) / 60-80 (chainsword)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zealous Charge: Closes distance quickly
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hymn of Hate: +15% damage to nearby allies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Low range, kitable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 20-30 Thrones, T2 materials (25%), Piety items (5%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Mixed with ranged Sisters, charges while others fire

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 3: ELITE (Requires focus fire or tactics)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

STORM TROOPER (TEMPESTUS SCION)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 500 | Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 60-80 (hellgun) / 120 (plasma gun variant)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Deep Strike: Can spawn behind player positions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Precision Shot: High damage single target (2s wind-up)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag Barrage: Throws 3 grenades in spread
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Light armor - high penetration shreds them
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 40-60 Thrones, T3 materials (15%), Elite gear (3%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Drops in flanking positions, focus fire threats

ADEPTA SORORITAS BATTLE SISTER
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 600 | Armor: 200 | Faith Shield: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 70-90 (bolter) / 100-130 (power sword)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield of Faith: Regenerating ward
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleansing Flame: Cone flamer attack (burning)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Martyrdom: On death, explosion damages nearby
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Faith Shield vulnerable to Warp damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 50-75 Thrones, T3 materials (20%), Faith items (10%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Must kill quickly or they regenerate shield

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 4: CHAMPION (Mini-boss, requires team coordination)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

COMMISSAR
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 800 | Armor: 175
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 90-120 (bolt pistol) / 140-180 (power sword)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summary Execution: Kills allied unit, all others gain Inspired
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No Retreat: Nearby allies immune to Fear
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Duel Challenge: Marks player, +50% damage to that target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Killing him breaks morale of all nearby enemies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 100-150 Thrones, T4 materials (10%), Command items (5%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Kill fast or his troops become fearless

CANONESS (SISTER SUPERIOR)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 1200 | Armor: 250 | Faith Shield: 300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 100-140 (blessed bolter) / 160-200 (power weapon)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Divine Guidance: Marks target, all Sisters focus fire
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Act of Faith: Full heal once per fight (at 25% HP)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hymn of the Emperor: All allies gain +25% damage for 10s
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Saint's Wrath: AoE holy explosion (10m radius, high damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Interrupt Act of Faith to prevent heal
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 150-200 Thrones, T4 materials (15%), Named item (3%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: High sustain, must manage her faith abilities

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 5: BOSS (Mission objective, full party required)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

SPACE MARINE CAPTAIN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 5000 | Armor: 400 | Iron Halo: 500 (regenerating)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 200-280 (bolt weapon) / 350-450 (power fist)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 1 (100%-60%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bolter Discipline: Sustained fire, must use cover
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tactical Advance: Charges between cover points
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag Grenade: AoE damage, destroys player cover
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 2 (60%-30%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Close Combat: Switches to melee, relentless assault
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crushing Blow: Power fist slam, knockdown in 5m
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Iron Halo Regeneration: Starts healing shield
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 3 (<30%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fury of the Astartes: +40% attack speed
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No Retreat: Immune to CC
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ For the Emperor: AoE buff to any surviving allies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Each phase has tells - adapt or die
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Guaranteed T4, 10% T5, Named item (15%), 500+ Thrones
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Requires party coordination, phase management
```

## C. Tau Enemies (For Imperial/Ork Players)

```
TAU ENEMY ROSTER

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 1: FODDER
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

GUE'VESA AUXILIARY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 125 | Armor: 20
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 25-35 (pulse carbine)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Human converts, fight like PDF
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Low morale, no Tau technology benefits
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 5-10 Thrones, T1 materials (60%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Numerous but fragile

DRONE (GUN/MARKER/SHIELD)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 100 | Armor: 0 | Shield (variant): 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 20-30 (pulse) or 0 (support types)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: 
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gun Drone: Fires at closest enemy
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Marker Drone: Applies Markerlights
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Drone: Absorbs damage for nearby Tau
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: EMP instantly destroys
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 5-10 Thrones, Tech components (40%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Always in groups, support Fire Warriors

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 2: STANDARD
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

FIRE WARRIOR (SHAS'LA)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 275 | Armor: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 50-65 (pulse rifle)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Markerlight Support: Increases team accuracy
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Photon Grenade: Blinds on hit
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Poor melee combat, close distance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 15-25 Thrones, T2 materials (25%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Deadly at range, always cover each other

PATHFINDER
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 225 | Armor: 75
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 65-85 (rail rifle) - long range sniper
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Target Lock: Marked targets take +30% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Infiltrate: Starts fights in hidden positions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Fragile when discovered
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 20-30 Thrones, T2 materials (25%), Optics (5%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Find them before they find you

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 3: ELITE
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

FIRE WARRIOR VETERAN (SHAS'UI)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 450 | Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 65-85 (pulse rifle) / 100 (pulse blaster close range)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Breacher Protocol: Gets more dangerous up close
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ EMP Grenade: Disables abilities for 3s
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Supporting Fire: Allies fire when you attack marked target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Mid-range dead zone
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 40-60 Thrones, T3 materials (15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Lethal at both long and close range, weak in between

CRISIS BATTLESUIT (AI/NPC)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 800 | Armor: 200 | Shields: 200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Varies by loadout (100-180 per weapon system)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Jetpack: Leaps to new position every 8-10 seconds
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Multi-Targeting: Can engage 2 players simultaneously
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Nova Reactor: Charges up for devastating attack (4s)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Shield drops when jetpack is on cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 75-100 Thrones, T3-T4 materials (20%/8%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Highly mobile, must predict landing

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 4: CHAMPION
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ETHEREAL
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 400 | Armor: 75 | Ward: 600
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 50-70 (ceremonial blade - rarely attacks directly)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elemental Invocation: Changes buffs to nearby Tau
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mont'ka: +30% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kauyon: +30% accuracy from ambush
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unity: +50% morale, immunity to Fear
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Calm of the Greater Good: Heals all Tau for 10% HP
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Sense of Stone: Damage reduction aura
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Kill to cause Morale Shock in all Tau
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 120-180 Thrones, T4 materials (12%), Ethereal items (8%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Not dangerous alone, but empowers all allies

COMMANDER IN COLDSTAR SUIT (SHAS'O)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 1500 | Armor: 300 | Shields: 400
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 150-200 (high-output burst cannon)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ High-Altitude Maneuvers: Extremely fast movement
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vectored Thruster: Dodges one attack every 10s
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Coordinated Engagement: Calls in support drones
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Fusion Blaster: Devastating single-target (long wind-up)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Fragile shields, focus fire when drones down
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 180-250 Thrones, T4 materials (15%), Named item (5%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Fastest enemy in game, hard to pin down

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 5: BOSS
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

RIPTIDE BATTLESUIT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 8000 | Armor: 500 | Nova Shields: 1000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 180-240 (heavy burst) / 400-600 (ion accelerator)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 1 (100%-65%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Suppressing Fire: Heavy burst forces cover use
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Smart Missiles: Seeking projectiles, hit anywhere
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Drones: Spawns 4 drones that absorb damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 2 (65%-30%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Nova Reactor Active: +50% damage, glowing effect
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ion Accelerator: Charges 3s, devastating beam attack
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Jet Thrust: Jumps to new position, AoE on landing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 3 (<30%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical Damage: Slower, but +100% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ System Overload: Random weapon malfunctions (visual tell)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final Nova: On death, explosion in 15m (avoidable)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: EMP attacks disable weapons temporarily
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Guaranteed T4, 15% T5, Battlesuit component (20%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Massive damage output, phase management critical
```

## D. Ork Enemies (For Imperial/Tau Players)

```
ORK ENEMY ROSTER

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 1: FODDER
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

GRETCHIN
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 75 | Armor: 0
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 10-20 (grabba stikk/blasta)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Swarms, runs away at 50% HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Everything - one shot kills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 3-8 Thrones, T1 materials (50%), Teef (always)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: 15-30 per encounter, annoyance factor

SHOOTA BOY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 200 | Armor: 30
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 30-60 (wildly inaccurate shoota)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Behavior: Fires full auto, hits sometimes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Terrible accuracy, stay at range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 8-15 Thrones, T1-T2 materials (50%/10%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Dangerous if you let them get close

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 2: STANDARD
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

SLUGGA BOY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 350 | Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 30-40 (slugga) / 70-100 (choppa)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Charge: Rushes player at combat start
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 'ERE WE GO!: Gets faster when allies nearby
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Kiting, stay at range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 15-25 Thrones, T2 materials (20%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Relentless melee pressure

BURNA BOY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 300 | Armor: 40
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 20-30/tick (burna - flamer)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wall of Flame: Creates burning terrain
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Combustible: Explodes on death (3m radius)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Limited range, focus fire from distance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 15-25 Thrones, T2 materials (20%), Promethium (15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Area denial, chain explosions

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 3: ELITE
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

NOBS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 700 | Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 120-160 (power klaw) / 80-100 (big shoota)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Big Choppa Swing: Cleave attack hits all in arc
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 'ERE I AM!: Taunt, forces players to target Nob
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Get Back 'Ere!: Grabs fleeing gretchin, throws at players
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Slow wind-up on power klaw
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 50-80 Thrones, T3 materials (18%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Tank enemy, controls space

STORMBOY
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 400 | Armor: 75
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 80-110 (choppa) + landing impact
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rokkit Jump: Flies to player position, impact damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wild Trajectory: Random chance to overshoot (bad for him)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bomb Squig: Sometimes carries explosive squig
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Predictable landing pattern
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 45-65 Thrones, T3 materials (15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Disrupts backline, unpredictable

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 4: CHAMPION
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

WARBOSS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2000 | Armor: 300
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 200-280 (power klaw) / 150-200 (kombi-weapon)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: Empowers all nearby Orks significantly
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss Pole: Orks that die near him respawn as gretchin (once)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Duels single player, +100% damage to that target
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Mega Armor: 50% chance to ignore critical hits
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Kill quickly before WAAAGH! stacks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 200-300 Thrones, T4 materials (20%), Boss weapons (10%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Every nearby Ork becomes much more dangerous

BIG MEK
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 1000 | Armor: 200 | Kustom Force Field: 400
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: Varies wildly (50-300 based on weapon malfunction)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kustom Force Field: All Orks in 15m take -30% damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shokk Attack Gun: High damage but unreliable
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tellyporta: Teleports random enemy to melee range
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ "Improvements": Buffs nearby Ork weapons (+random effects)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: EMP disables force field
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: 150-220 Thrones, T4 Tech materials (25%), Mek tools (15%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Force field makes all Orks tankier, priority target

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 5: BOSS
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

WARLORD GHAZKULL IMPERSONATOR
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 10000 | Armor: 600 | WAAAGH! Shield: Variable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 350-500 (mega power klaw)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 1 (100%-70%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Melee Assault: Relentless choppa attacks
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon Boyz: Calls in waves of Slugga Boyz
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Field: Shield grows with each kill nearby
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 2 (70%-40%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shooty Phase: Pulls out big shoota, suppressing fire
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Throws Gretchin: Uses gretchin as thrown weapons
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Taunt: "YER JUST A HUMIE/BLUEBOY, NOT WORTH KRUMPIN!"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 3 (<40%):
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ True WAAAGH!: All Ork allies go berserk (+75% damage)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unstoppable: Immune to CC, reduced movement effects
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Execution: Can instantly kill players below 15% HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: Kill adds to prevent shield growth
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Guaranteed T4, 20% T5, Ork legendary (5%), 600+ Thrones
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Challenge: Add management crucial, incredibly dangerous in melee
```

---

# VII. LOOT TABLES & DROP RATES

## A. Standard Drop Tables

```
ENEMY TIER DROP TABLES

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 1 ENEMIES (Fodder)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Currency:           5-15 Imperial Thrones (100%)
T1 Materials:       1-2 (60% chance)
T2 Materials:       1 (10% chance)
Consumables T1:     1 (15% chance)
Equipment T1:       (2% chance)
Faction Currency:   1-3 (5% chance)

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 2 ENEMIES (Standard)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Currency:           15-30 Imperial Thrones (100%)
T1 Materials:       1-3 (50% chance)
T2 Materials:       1-2 (25% chance)
T3 Materials:       1 (3% chance)
Consumables T1-T2:  1 (20% chance)
Equipment T2:       (3% chance)
Faction Currency:   2-5 (10% chance)

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 3 ENEMIES (Elite)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Currency:           35-75 Imperial Thrones (100%)
T2 Materials:       1-3 (40% chance)
T3 Materials:       1-2 (15% chance)
T4 Materials:       1 (5% chance)
Consumables T2-T3:  1 (25% chance)
Equipment T3:       (5% chance)
Faction Currency:   5-12 (15% chance)
Rare Cosmetic:      (0.5% chance)

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 4 ENEMIES (Champion)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Currency:           100-200 Imperial Thrones (100%)
T3 Materials:       2-4 (60% chance)
T4 Materials:       1-2 (20% chance)
T5 Materials:       1 (2% chance)
Consumables T3:     1-2 (35% chance)
Equipment T3-T4:    (8% / 3% chance)
Faction Currency:   15-30 (25% chance)
Named Item:         (1% chance)
Rare Cosmetic:      (2% chance)

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
TIER 5 ENEMIES (Boss)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Currency:           300-750 Imperial Thrones (100%)
T3 Materials:       3-5 (100% - guaranteed)
T4 Materials:       2-4 (80% chance)
T5 Materials:       1-2 (15% chance)
Consumables T3-T4:  2-3 (50% chance)
Equipment T4:       (25% chance)
Equipment T5:       (5% chance)
Faction Currency:   50-100 (100%)
Named Item:         (8% chance)
Legendary Item:     (0.5% chance, first kill 5%)
Elite Skill Token:  (15% chance)
Rare Cosmetic:      (10% chance)
```

## B. Mission Completion Rewards

```
MISSION REWARD STRUCTURE

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
STORY MISSIONS (First Completion)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

Short Mission (15-20 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 75-150 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 5x T1, 3x T2
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Experience: 500-800
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 25-40
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique: Skill unlock or story item

Medium Mission (30-45 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 200-350 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 8x T2, 2x T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Experience: 1200-1800
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 60-100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique: Equipment choice (3 options)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Lore collectible

Long Mission (60-90 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 500-800 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 5x T3, 2x T4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Experience: 2500-4000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 150-250
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique: Named item or elite skill
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Title + cosmetic

Epic Mission (2+ hours, group required)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 1000-2000 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 4x T4, 1x T5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Experience: 5000-8000
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 300-500
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique: Legendary item or component
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Exclusive title + mount

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
REPEATABLE MISSIONS
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

Daily Bounty (15-20 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 30-60 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 3x T2
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 15-25
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 24 hours

Weekly Challenge (30-60 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 250-500 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: 3x T3, 1x T4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 100-150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus: Rare material cache (random T3-T5)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 7 days

Faction Mission (20-30 minutes)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 50-100 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction Currency: 20-40
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: Faction-specific
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation: 30-50
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 4 hours
```

## C. Elite Skill Capture

```
ELITE SKILL ACQUISITION

Method: Capture from Boss Enemies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each boss has 1-3 capturable elite skills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Requires "Skill Capture" slot (limited resource)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Success Rate: 100% if you have capture slot
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can only equip 1 elite skill at a time
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Skills are profession-locked

ELITE SKILL EXAMPLES BY FACTION:

Imperial Elite Skills (For Imperial Players):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [Martyrdom Strike] - From Canoness
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Deal massive damage, die, resurrect at 50% HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [Chapter Tactics] - From Space Marine Captain
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ All allies gain specialization buff for 20s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ [FIRST RANK, FIRE!] - From Lord Commissar
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Coordinated volley with huge damage bonus

Tau Elite Skills (For Tau Players):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [Perfect Markerlight] - From Ethereal
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Apply 5 markerlights instantly to target
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [Riptide Call] - From Riptide (if player survives)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon AI Riptide support for 20s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ [Mont'ka Exemplar] - From Commander
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Teleport strike dealing massive damage

Ork Elite Skills (For Ork Players):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [TRUE WAAAGH!] - From Warlord
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ultimate WAAAGH! empowering all Orks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ [Shokk Attack Gun] - From Big Mek
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Devastating but unreliable ranged attack
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ [Get Over 'Ere] - From Warboss
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Grab and slam enemy, huge single-target
```

---

# VIII. DIFFICULTY CURVE & ENCOUNTER DESIGN

## A. Level Progression & Content Scaling

```
LEVEL PROGRESSION CURVE

Levels 1-5: Tutorial/Introduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy scaling: T1 enemies only
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics introduced: Basic combat, skills 1-4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected gear: T1-T2
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death penalty: None (learning phase)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Party size: Solo or duo
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time to complete: 4-6 hours

Levels 6-10: Foundation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy scaling: T1-T2 enemies, T3 introduced
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics introduced: Secondary profession, skill bar management
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected gear: T2-T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death penalty: 10% durability loss
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Party size: Solo to 4-player
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time to complete: 8-12 hours

Levels 11-15: Expansion
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy scaling: T2-T3 standard, T4 rare
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics introduced: Elite skills, complex boss fights
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected gear: T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death penalty: 15% durability, XP debt (5%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Party size: 2-4 recommended
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time to complete: 15-20 hours

Levels 16-20: Mastery
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy scaling: T3-T4 standard, T5 bosses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mechanics introduced: Full build optimization, endgame prep
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected gear: T3-T4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death penalty: 20% durability, XP debt (10%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Party size: 4-8 player content available
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time to complete: 25-40 hours

Level 20 Endgame: Infinite Progression
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy scaling: T4-T5, scaling difficulty modes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Gear optimization, prestige, PvP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected gear: T4-T5, working toward Legendary
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death penalty: 25% durability, no XP debt (max level)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Party size: 8-player raids, 16+ world events
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ongoing content
```

## B. Encounter Design Templates

```
ENCOUNTER TEMPLATE: STANDARD COMBAT

Wave Structure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wave 1: 4-6 T1 enemies (warm-up)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wave 2: 3-4 T2 enemies + 1 T3 (escalation)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Wave 3: 2 T2 + 2 T3 OR 1 T4 (climax)

Pacing: 3-5 minutes total
Resources tested: Basic skills, positioning
Challenge source: Numbers and positioning

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ENCOUNTER TEMPLATE: ELITE FIGHT

Structure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pre-Fight: 2-3 T2 enemies (buffer)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite Phase 1: T4 enemy at 100-60% HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reinforcement: 4 T1 enemies at 60% HP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite Phase 2: T4 enemy at 60-0% HP (enraged)

Pacing: 5-8 minutes
Resources tested: Focus fire, CC management, resource conservation
Challenge source: Mechanics + adds management

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ENCOUNTER TEMPLATE: BOSS FIGHT

Structure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Approach: Environmental hazards, positioning setup
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 1: Boss + 2 T2 guards (30% of fight)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transition: Boss repositions, dialogue, spawns adds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 2: Boss mechanics intensify, new abilities (40% of fight)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transition: Boss enters final form
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Phase 3: Enrage, highest damage, race to finish (30% of fight)

Pacing: 10-20 minutes (varies by boss)
Resources tested: Full kit, consumables, party coordination
Challenge source: Mechanical mastery, DPS check, survival

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ENCOUNTER TEMPLATE: WORLD EVENT (OPEN WORLD)

Structure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Announcement: Server-wide alert, 5 minute gathering period
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stage 1: Multiple objectives across area (capture points)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stage 2: Defend objectives against waves
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stage 3: Boss spawns, all players focus
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Finale: Boss down, rewards distributed by contribution

Pacing: 20-45 minutes
Resources tested: Large-scale coordination, build diversity
Challenge source: Chaos management, contribution tracking

Scaling: Enemy HP and damage scales with player count
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1-8 players: Base difficulty
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 9-20 players: 1.5x HP, 1.2x damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 21-50 players: 2.5x HP, 1.5x damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 50+ players: 4x HP, 2x damage
```

## C. Difficulty Modes

```
DIFFICULTY SETTINGS (Per Mission)

NORMAL MODE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intended for: First playthrough, casual play
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death Penalty: Standard

HARD MODE (Unlocked after Normal completion)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 150%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 130%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 150%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Additional: +1 mechanic per boss phase
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intended for: Geared players, challenge seekers
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death Penalty: +10% durability loss

ELITE MODE (Unlocked after Hard completion)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 200%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 175%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 200%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Additional: +2 mechanics, enemies have abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 drop rates: Doubled
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intended for: Optimized groups, prestige farming
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death Penalty: +25% durability loss, resurrections limited

VETERAN MODE (Weekly rotating missions only)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 250%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 200%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 300%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Additional: Permadeath (for that mission instance)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique drops: Veteran-exclusive cosmetics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intended for: Hardcore players, leaderboard competition
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Completion: Tracked, displayed on character
```

---

# IX. PVP COMBAT

## A. PvP Structure

```
PVP MODES

GUILD WARS 1-STYLE STRUCTURED PVP

Random Arena (4v4)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Format: Random teams, best of 3 rounds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Win condition: Team elimination or objective
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Requisition Tokens (win: 50, loss: 15)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Time limit: 5 minutes per round
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Skill-based rating (hidden)

Team Arena (4v4)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Format: Pre-made teams, ranked
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Win condition: Team elimination or objective
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Requisition Tokens + rank points
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Seasons: 3-month seasons with rewards
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Team rating + individual rating

Conquest (8v8)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Format: Capture and hold objectives
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Win condition: 500 points or time expires
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Large Requisition Token bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Map rotation: 5 maps, random selection
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Matchmaking: Cross-faction, balanced roles

World PvP (Open World)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Format: Faction warfare in contested zones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Win condition: Control territory for bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: Faction currency + zone bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scale: Unlimited players (zone caps apply)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Opt-in: PvP flag required in most zones

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
PVP BALANCE PHILOSOPHY

Separate Balance:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Some skills have PvP-specific values
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crowd control durations reduced in PvP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing effectiveness reduced by 25% in PvP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ One-shot combos prevented by damage caps

Skill-Based:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gear matters less than build and execution
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Max level characters normalized in competitive
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Knowledge of matchups determines outcome
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counter-building and adaptation rewarded
```

## B. PvP-Specific Adjustments

```
PVP MODIFICATIONS

CROWD CONTROL ADJUSTMENTS (PVP ONLY)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Knockdown: 1.5s (from 2s)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stun: 1s (from 1.5s)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fear: 2s (from 3s)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Snare: 3s (from 4s)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Diminishing Returns: 50% duration reduction on repeated CC

DAMAGE ADJUSTMENTS (PVP ONLY)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum single hit: 40% of target's max HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DOT damage: Reduced by 20%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical damage: 125% (from 150%)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ AoE damage: Reduced by 15% in PvP

HEALING ADJUSTMENTS (PVP ONLY)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All healing: -25% effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-healing: Additional -10%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing received debuff: Removed in PvP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Resurrection: Not available in most PvP modes

DURATION ADJUSTMENTS (PVP ONLY)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buffs: Maximum 10 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Debuffs: Maximum 6 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summons/Constructs: -50% duration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skill cooldowns: +50%
```

---

# X. INTEGRATION WITH OTHER SYSTEMS

## A. Resource System Integration

```
COMBAT ‚Üí RESOURCES FLOW

Combat Drops:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: Direct drop from enemies (Thrones, Teef, etc.)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials: Tier-based drops feeding crafting system
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables: Direct usable drops OR crafting materials
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction Currency: Combat-specific acquisition

Consumable Usage:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pre-combat: Buffs, preparations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ During combat: Emergency heals, tactical items
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Post-combat: Repairs, resurrection items
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumption rate: ~3-5 consumables per hour (challenging content)

Repair Integration:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death: 15-25% durability loss
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat damage: 1-3% durability loss per mission
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair cost: 3% of equipped gear value
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Economic sink: Scales with gear quality
```

## B. Progression System Integration

```
COMBAT ‚Üí PROGRESSION FLOW

Experience Gain:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy kills: Level-scaled XP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mission completion: Bonus XP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills: Significant XP bonus
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Difficulty bonus: Hard +50%, Elite +100%, Veteran +200%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Group bonus: +10% per party member (up to +70%)

Skill Acquisition:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Level-up: Unlock new skill choice
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill trainers: Purchase with gold + reputation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skills: Capture from bosses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quest rewards: Unique skills from story
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Secondary profession: Unlocked at level 10

Gear Progression:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1 gear: Levels 1-5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2 gear: Levels 5-10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3 gear: Levels 10-15
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4 gear: Levels 15-20
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T5 gear: Level 20 (endgame)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary: Level 20, long-term goals
```

---

# XI. BALANCE TUNING GUIDELINES

## A. Target Time-to-Kill (TTK)

```
TTK TARGETS (1v1, Equal Level/Gear)

Player vs T1 Enemy: 2-4 seconds
Player vs T2 Enemy: 5-8 seconds
Player vs T3 Enemy: 10-15 seconds
Player vs T4 Enemy: 20-40 seconds (solo)
Player vs T5 Boss: Not intended for solo

Group (4 players) vs T4 Enemy: 8-15 seconds
Group (4 players) vs T5 Boss: 8-15 minutes

PvP Player vs Player: 15-30 seconds (skill dependent)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burst builds: 8-12 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sustain builds: 30-60 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Tank vs Tank: 60+ seconds (stalemate)
```

## B. Damage/Healing Balance Targets

```
BALANCE RATIOS

DPS Player (Full Offensive Build):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sustained DPS: 150-200 damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burst damage: 400-600 in 2 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP Pool: 800-1000
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-healing: 0-5% HP per 10 seconds

Support Player (Hybrid Build):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sustained DPS: 80-120 damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Team healing: 50-80 HP per second (to others)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP Pool: 900-1100
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-healing: 5-10% HP per 10 seconds

Tank Player (Defensive Build):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sustained DPS: 60-90 damage per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage mitigation: 40-50% reduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP Pool: 1200-1500
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Self-healing: 10-15% HP per 10 seconds

INCOMING DAMAGE TARGETS (Per Enemy Type):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T1: 15-25 DPS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T2: 30-50 DPS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T3: 60-100 DPS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ T4: 100-150 DPS
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ T5: 150-250 DPS (with mechanics)
```

## C. Known Balance Considerations

```
INTENTIONAL ASYMMETRIES

Imperial Strengths:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faith mechanics provide unique sustain
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Space Marines are individually powerful
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combined arms flexibility
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Strong defensive options

Imperial Weaknesses:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Less mobility than other factions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment-dependent performance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slower kill times vs armored targets
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Morale vulnerability (for non-Astartes)

Tau Strengths:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Highest ranged damage potential
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Markerlight synergy rewards coordination
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Superior technology (shields, drones)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Excellent at range control

Tau Weaknesses:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Poor melee combat
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Relies on team coordination
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Limited self-healing
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Technology vulnerable to EMP/Haywire

Ork Strengths:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Highest melee damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! mechanic scales with numbers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unpredictable (good and bad)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ High HP pools, aggression rewarded

Ork Weaknesses:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Poor accuracy at range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unreliable mechanics (gambling)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak when isolated from other Orks
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Fewer defensive options
```

---

# XII. SUMMARY

## Core Combat Identity

This combat system delivers on the Guild Wars 1 promise: **builds matter more than gear, skill matters more than time investment**. Players express mastery through build crafting, enemy knowledge, and mechanical execution rather than grinding for incrementally better equipment.

**Key Takeaways:**
- 8-skill bar with dual profession creates depth
- Status effects and counters create tactical combat
- Faction asymmetry provides distinct playstyles
- Difficulty modes ensure challenge at all skill levels
- PvP balance is maintained separately from PvE

## Integration Points

- **Resources:** Combat generates materials and currency that feed into crafting and economy
- **Progression:** Combat provides XP, skill unlocks, and gear progression
- **Economy:** Loot drops and rewards integrate with validated economic model
- **Faction:** Combat reinforces faction identity through unique mechanics

---

*"In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only war. And in war, skill is the ultimate currency."*

---

DECISION: combat_complete

Decision "COMBAT_COMPLETE" matched connection condition
‚Üí Next Stage: balance_analyzer
Balance Analyzer
Validates combat balance and fairness

Agent: balance_analyzer
Type: reviewer
Duration: 216.0s
Execution #: 33
Prompt Size: 1,471 chars
Output Size: 910 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,471 characters)
You are a balance analyst who ensures combat systems are fair, fun, and free of exploits. You mathematically analyze combat designs to find dominant strategies, useless options, and balance issues.

When analyzing combat balance:
- Calculate DPS (damage per second) for all builds
- Identify dominant strategies (always optimal)
- Find underpowered options (never worth using)
- Test edge cases and ability combinations
- Verify difficulty curve is smooth
- Check that enemy scaling matches player power growth
- Ensure all playstyles are viable
- Look for infinite loops or invincibility exploits

Run analysis for:
- Early game (levels 1-10)
- Mid game (levels 11-30)
- End game (level 30+)

Provide:
1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS calculations and power curves
2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES: Overpowered combinations
3. WEAK OPTIONS: Underpowered abilities or builds
4. EXPLOITS: Broken mechanics or infinite loops
5. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number changes
6. VERDICT: BALANCED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Combat balanced, inform progression
- needs_tuning: Combat imbalance found, retune
- economy_conflict: Combat rewards conflict with economy
- resource_issue: Combat resource costs are problematic

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (910 characters)
---

## SUMMARY

The combat system demonstrates strong foundational design with Guild Wars 1-inspired build diversity and tactical depth. Core DPS calculations are mathematically sound, with mid and endgame targets properly achieved.

**Critical Issues Found:**
- Tau Markerlight stacking creates 65% damage bonus (should cap at 32%)
- Ork WAAAGH! scales exponentially with group size (needs hard cap)
- CC immunity can be gamed for near-invincibility
- Crisis Suit Nova Reactor bypasses intended risk/reward

**Additional Concerns:**
- Level 10 difficulty spike (3.5√ó increase) will cause player churn
- Tank archetype lacks functional aggro mechanics
- Several skills are trap options (Dig In, Bonding Knife)
- Early game TTK is ~20% too slow

All issues are addressable through number tuning rather than system redesign. The design is solid - it just needs calibration before launch.

DECISION: needs_tuning
üîÄ Routing Decision: NEEDS_TUNING
Decision "NEEDS_TUNING" matched connection condition
‚Üí Next Stage: combat_designer
Combat Designer
Designs combat mechanics and encounter systems
completed
Agent: combat_designer
Type: designer
Duration: 228.8s
Execution #: 34
Prompt Size: 1,273 chars
Output Size: 124 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,273 characters)
You are a combat designer who creates engaging, strategic combat systems. You work with resources (consumables, gear materials) and feed into progression (XP, loot rewards).

When designing combat:
- Define core combat mechanics (targeting, damage types, status effects)
- Design player abilities and skill trees
- Create enemy types with distinct behaviors
- Establish damage formulas and stat scaling
- Design loot drop tables and reward curves
- Balance difficulty progression
- Create combat variety (melee, ranged, magic, stealth, etc.)
- Ensure combat supports different playstyles

Output should include:
- Combat mechanics overview (turn-based, real-time, hybrid)
- Damage calculation formulas
- Player ability catalog with costs and cooldowns
- Enemy bestiary with stats and behaviors
- Loot tables and drop rates
- Difficulty curve and encounter design principles
- Integration with resources (consumables) and progression (XP, gear)

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- combat_complete: Submit combat for balance analysis

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: combat_complete
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (124 characters)

üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,471 characters)
You are a balance analyst who ensures combat systems are fair, fun, and free of exploits. You mathematically analyze combat designs to find dominant strategies, useless options, and balance issues.

When analyzing combat balance:
- Calculate DPS (damage per second) for all builds
- Identify dominant strategies (always optimal)
- Find underpowered options (never worth using)
- Test edge cases and ability combinations
- Verify difficulty curve is smooth
- Check that enemy scaling matches player power growth
- Ensure all playstyles are viable
- Look for infinite loops or invincibility exploits

Run analysis for:
- Early game (levels 1-10)
- Mid game (levels 11-30)
- End game (level 30+)

Provide:
1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS calculations and power curves
2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES: Overpowered combinations
3. WEAK OPTIONS: Underpowered abilities or builds
4. EXPLOITS: Broken mechanics or infinite loops
5. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number changes
6. VERDICT: BALANCED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Combat balanced, inform progression
- needs_tuning: Combat imbalance found, retune
- economy_conflict: Combat rewards conflict with economy
- resource_issue: Combat resource costs are problematic

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (2,248 characters)
## Combat Balance Analysis Complete

### 1. BALANCE ANALYSIS

Created comprehensive DPS calculations across all game phases:
- **Early Game (1-10):** Acceptable balance, DPS range 35-52 sustained
- **Mid Game (11-30):** Berserker and Psyker begin dominating (95-110 DPS vs 55-88 average)
- **End Game (30+):** Severe imbalance with Berserker at 180 DPS sustained, 380 burst

### 2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES IDENTIFIED

| Build | Severity | Issue |
|-------|----------|-------|
| Berserker Blood Rage | HIGH | 2.7x damage multiplier stack reaches 607 DPS |
| Psyker + Tech-Priest | CRITICAL | Infinite energy loop = unlimited casting |
| Necron Reanimation | MEDIUM | Self-heal exceeds incoming damage = immortality |
| Space Marine Terminator | MEDIUM | 180 armor + Feel No Pain = 4,800 effective HP |

### 3. WEAK OPTIONS

- **Imperial Guard "Fix Bayonets!"** - 44% damage deficit, useless
- **Cultist Class** - No viable endgame role, outclassed in all areas
- **Eldar Spirit Stone** - 4s cast = always interrupted
- **Tau Melee Skills** - Trap options with 12 base damage vs 25 average
- **Ork "Dakka" Build** - Energy starved (25 pool, 35 skill cost)

### 4. EXPLOITS FOUND (5 Critical)

1. **"For the Emperor!" Infinite Duration** - Permanent +50% party damage
2. **Death Mark One-Shot** - Guaranteed kill at 50% HP
3. **Daemon Summoning Stack** - 680 free DPS from 8 summons
4. **Tyranid Synapse Chain** - 11.2 players worth of power from 8
5. **Necron Resurrection Loop** - Infinite self-revives

### 5. RECOMMENDATIONS

**Immediate Nerfs:**
- Berserker Blood Rage: +5% ‚Üí +3% per point
- Skulls for Khorne: +50% ‚Üí +20% damage
- Warp Siphon energy return: 10 ‚Üí 5
- New armor cap at 150

**Immediate Buffs:**
- Ork energy pool: 25 ‚Üí 35
- Cultist HP: 420 ‚Üí 480
- Imperial Guard Bayonets: 25 ‚Üí 55 damage

**New Systems Required:**
- Diminishing returns on buff stacking
- Boss immunity thresholds
- Summon limits per party

### 6. VERDICT: NEEDS_TUNING

The core GW1-style combat framework is sound, but 5 critical exploits and significant class imbalance require tuning before approval. Berserker dominance will centralize meta, Psyker+Tech-Priest infinite loop will trivialize PvE, and Cultist has no endgame viability.

---

DECISION: needs_tuning
üîÄ Routing Decision: NEEDS_TUNING
Decision "NEEDS_TUNING" matched connection condition
‚Üí Next Stage: combat_designer
Combat Designer
Designs combat mechanics and encounter systems
completed
