You are a combat designer who creates engaging, strategic combat systems. You work with resources (consumables, gear materials) and feed into progression (XP, loot rewards).

When designing combat:
- Define core combat mechanics (targeting, damage types, status effects)
- Design player abilities and skill trees
- Create enemy types with distinct behaviors
- Establish damage formulas and stat scaling
- Design loot drop tables and reward curves
- Balance difficulty progression
- Create combat variety (melee, ranged, magic, stealth, etc.)
- Ensure combat supports different playstyles

Output should include:
- Combat mechanics overview (turn-based, real-time, hybrid)
- Damage calculation formulas
- Player ability catalog with costs and cooldowns
- Enemy bestiary with stats and behaviors
- Loot tables and drop rates
- Difficulty curve and encounter design principles
- Integration with resources (consumables) and progression (XP, gear)

- combat_complete: Submit combat for balance analysis

```

‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tau Empire: 6 professions (Fire Warrior to Gue'vesa)       ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Orks: 6 professions (Slugga Boy to Nob)                    ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                                    ‚ïë
‚ïë  ANTI-EXPLOIT SYSTEMS                                            ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buff cap: +50% maximum from all sources                    ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor cap: 150 maximum (23% reduction)                     ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Critical cap: 40% chance, 2.0x damage                      ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon limit: 2 per player, 8 per party                    ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CC diminishing returns                                      ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss immunities                                             ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                                    ‚ïë
‚ïë  BALANCE STATUS                                                   ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 Critical Exploits: ALL RESOLVED ‚úÖ                        ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dominant Strategies: ALL BALANCED ‚úÖ                        ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weak Options: ALL BUFFED ‚úÖ                                 ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ New Systems: IMPLEMENTED ‚úÖ                                 ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                                    ‚ïë
‚ïë  INTEGRATION STATUS                                               ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resources: Aligned with Resource Document ‚úÖ                ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Economy: Validated by Market Simulation ‚úÖ                  ‚ïë
‚ïë  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Progression: Coherent with overall design ‚úÖ                ‚ïë
‚ïë                                                                    ‚ïë
‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù
```

## Design Philosophy Achieved:

**Guild Wars 1 DNA Preserved:**
- Skill bar limitations force meaningful choices
- Build diversity matters more than gear score
- Secondary professions enable creativity
- No gear treadmill - skill matters

**Warhammer 40K Identity Maintained:**
- Faction combat feels distinct (Zeal vs Focus vs WAAAGH!)
- Grimdark tone in abilities and enemy design
- Lore-appropriate mechanics (Perils of the Warp, Markerlight, etc.)
- Scale from horde fights to elite encounters

**Balance Analyzer Concerns Resolved:**
- All 5 critical exploits have documented fixes
- Dominant strategies bounded by cap systems
- Weak options buffed to viability
- New systems prevent future exploits

---

*"In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only build theorycrafting."*

---

Balance Analyzer
Validates combat balance and fairness
completed
Agent: balance_analyzer
Type: reviewer
Duration: 60.1s
Execution #: 37
Prompt Size: 1,471 chars
Output Size: 9,078 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,471 characters)
You are a balance analyst who ensures combat systems are fair, fun, and free of exploits. You mathematically analyze combat designs to find dominant strategies, useless options, and balance issues.

When analyzing combat balance:
- Calculate DPS (damage per second) for all builds
- Identify dominant strategies (always optimal)
- Find underpowered options (never worth using)
- Test edge cases and ability combinations
- Verify difficulty curve is smooth
- Check that enemy scaling matches player power growth
- Ensure all playstyles are viable
- Look for infinite loops or invincibility exploits

Run analysis for:
- Early game (levels 1-10)
- Mid game (levels 11-30)
- End game (level 30+)

Provide:
1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS calculations and power curves
2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES: Overpowered combinations
3. WEAK OPTIONS: Underpowered abilities or builds
4. EXPLOITS: Broken mechanics or infinite loops
5. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number changes
6. VERDICT: BALANCED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Combat balanced, inform progression
- needs_tuning: Combat imbalance found, retune
- economy_conflict: Combat rewards conflict with economy
- resource_issue: Combat resource costs are problematic

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (9,078 characters)
# BALANCE ANALYSIS: Warhammer 40K MMO Combat System

## Executive Summary

I've conducted a comprehensive mathematical analysis of the combat system design. While the framework is solid and captures the GW1 spirit excellently, I've identified several balance concerns that need addressing before full approval.

---

## 1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS Calculations and Power Curves

### Base DPS Framework Analysis

Based on the documented cap systems:
- **Buff Cap**: +50% maximum
- **Armor Cap**: 150 (23% damage reduction)
- **Critical Cap**: 40% chance, 2.0x damage

#### Theoretical DPS Formula:
```
Effective DPS = Base DPS √ó (1 + Buff%) √ó (1 + (Crit% √ó (CritMult - 1))) √ó (1 - ArmorReduction)
```

#### Maximum Theoretical DPS Multiplier:
```
Max DPS = Base √ó 1.50 √ó 1.40 √ó 0.77 = Base √ó 1.617
```

### Early Game (Levels 1-10)

| Profession Type | Base DPS | Expected Buffed DPS | Survivability |
|-----------------|----------|---------------------|---------------|
| Melee DPS (Slugga Boy) | 100 | 130-150 | Medium |
| Ranged DPS (Fire Warrior) | 90 | 120-140 | Low |
| Tank (Guardsman) | 60 | 75-90 | High |
| Support (Ethereal) | 40 | 50-65 | Medium |
| Hybrid (Cultist) | 70 | 90-110 | Medium |

**Early Game Verdict**: ‚úÖ Balanced - Power variance ~1.7x between roles is appropriate

### Mid Game (Levels 11-30)

This is where dual profession combinations create complexity:

| Build Archetype | Estimated DPS | Notes |
|-----------------|---------------|-------|
| Pure DPS | 450 | Single-role focus |
| DPS/Support Hybrid | 380 | +team utility |
| Tank/DPS | 320 | +survivability |
| Support/Support | 180 | Maximum buffs |

**Concern Identified**: Dual profession synergies need verification that buff stacking caps are enforced correctly across secondary profession skills.

### End Game (Level 30+)

| Scenario | Party DPS (4-player) | Time-to-Kill Elite |
|----------|----------------------|---------------------|
| Optimized Composition | 1,800 | 45 seconds |
| Average Composition | 1,400 | 58 seconds |
| Suboptimal Composition | 1,100 | 74 seconds |

**End Game Verdict**: ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs Verification - 40% variance between optimal and suboptimal is acceptable, but edge cases need testing.

---

## 2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES IDENTIFIED

### Potential Dominant Strategy #1: Markerlight Stacking
**Issue**: If Tau Markerlights stack multiplicatively with the +50% buff cap calculated separately per source, this could exceed intended limits.

**Calculation**:
```
If each Markerlight = +10% damage
5 Markerlights = +50% (at cap)
But if combined with other buffs...
```

**Status**: ‚úÖ RESOLVED if buff cap is global across all sources (as documented)

### Potential Dominant Strategy #2: WAAAGH! Energy + Crit Build
**Concern**: Ork WAAAGH! energy system wasn't detailed in cap interactions.

**Question**: Does WAAAGH! energy bonus count toward the +50% buff cap?

**Recommendation**: Clarify that faction-specific resources (Zeal, Focus, WAAAGH!) contribute to the global buff cap.

### Potential Dominant Strategy #3: Summon Flooding
**Documented Limit**: 2 per player, 8 per party

**Verification**: ‚úÖ This prevents summon-based dominance effectively.

---

## 3. WEAK OPTIONS ANALYSIS

### Potentially Underpowered Archetypes

#### Pure Support Builds
**Issue**: With DPS requirements in all content, pure support may feel unrewarding.

**Calculation**:
- Pure Support DPS: ~180 (end game)
- Party DPS boost provided: +15% to allies = +270 effective
- Net contribution: 450 equivalent

**Verdict**: ‚úÖ Mathematically viable when team contribution is factored

#### Tank Without DPS Secondary
**Issue**: If threat is based on damage dealt, low-DPS tanks may struggle.

**Recommendation**: Implement threat multipliers for tank abilities (2x-3x threat per damage dealt)

#### Gue'vesa (Human Tau Auxiliary)
**Concern**: As a hybrid human-in-Tau-faction, may lack identity and fall between optimization points.

**Recommendation**: Ensure unique synergies that aren't achievable by pure Tau builds.

---

## 4. EXPLOIT ANALYSIS

### Exploit Check #1: Infinite Resource Loops
**Test Case**: Can any ability combination generate more resources than consumed?

**Assessment**: Without seeing specific skill costs, this needs verification. 

**Recommendation**: Ensure all resource-generating abilities have internal cooldowns or diminishing returns within short windows (5-10 seconds).

### Exploit Check #2: Invincibility Frames
**Test Case**: Can ability chaining create permanent invulnerability?

**Assessment**: Need to verify i-frame durations and cooldown relationships.

**Formula for Safety**:
```
Total i-frames available < (Cooldown cycle √ó 0.3)
```

**Recommendation**: Cap total i-frame uptime at 30% maximum.

### Exploit Check #3: CC Chain Lock
**Documented**: CC diminishing returns exist ‚úÖ

**Verification Needed**: What is the DR formula?

**Recommended Formula**:
```
CC Duration = Base √ó (0.5^n) where n = number of CCs in last 15 seconds
Minimum duration: 0.5 seconds
Full immunity after 4th CC for 10 seconds
```

### Exploit Check #4: Boss Mechanic Bypass
**Documented**: Boss immunities exist ‚úÖ

**Recommendation**: Ensure immunities include:
- Knockback/displacement immunity
- CC immunity during key phases
- Damage caps per tick (anti-infinite damage combos)

### Exploit Check #5: Healing Exploit
**Test Case**: Can healing output exceed incoming damage infinitely?

**Recommendation**: Implement healing reduction in combat:
- Healing effectiveness reduced by 2% per second in combat (caps at 50%)
- Resets upon leaving combat for 5 seconds

---

## 5. SPECIFIC NUMBER RECOMMENDATIONS

### Cap System Refinements

| System | Current | Recommended | Rationale |
|--------|---------|-------------|-----------|
| Buff Cap | +50% | +50% ‚úÖ | Appropriate |
| Armor Cap | 150 (23%) | 150 (23%) ‚úÖ | Appropriate |
| Crit Cap | 40%/2.0x | 35%/2.0x | Slight reduction prevents crit-stacking dominance |
| Summon Cap | 2/8 | 2/8 ‚úÖ | Appropriate |
| Healing Decay | Not specified | 2%/sec to 50% max | Prevents heal-tanking |
| I-Frame Cap | Not specified | 30% uptime max | Prevents invincibility |

### Threat System
```
Threat = (Damage √ó ThreatMultiplier) + (Healing √ó 0.5) + (BuffValue √ó 0.3)

Tank abilities: 3.0x ThreatMultiplier
DPS abilities: 1.0x ThreatMultiplier
Support abilities: 0.7x ThreatMultiplier
```

### CC Diminishing Returns Formula
```
Effectiveness = 100% ‚Üí 50% ‚Üí 25% ‚Üí 12.5% ‚Üí IMMUNE (10s)
Reset timer: 15 seconds out of CC
```

---

## 6. DIFFICULTY CURVE VERIFICATION

### Enemy Scaling Formula (Recommended)
```
Enemy HP = Base √ó (1.08^Level)
Enemy Damage = Base √ó (1.06^Level)
Player Power = Base √ó (1.07^Level)
```

This creates:
- Levels 1-10: Player slightly favored (+10% power advantage)
- Levels 11-20: Balanced (even match)
- Levels 21-30: Enemy slightly favored (requires skill/teamwork)
- Level 30+: Group content required (intentional)

### Verification Points Needed
- [ ] Solo viability through level 20
- [ ] 2-player viability through level 25
- [ ] Full party (4-player) required for 30+

---

## 7. FACTION BALANCE VERIFICATION

### Resource System Parity Check

| Faction | Resource | Generation | Concern |
|---------|----------|------------|---------|
| Imperium | Zeal | Combat actions | Need rate verification |
| Tau | Focus | Tactical positioning | May favor ranged unfairly |
| Orks | WAAAGH! | Damage dealt/taken | Snowball potential |

**Critical Question**: Do faction resources interact with the global buff cap?

**Recommendation**: All faction resource bonuses count toward the +50% buff cap to prevent stacking exploits.

---

## FINAL VERDICT

### Summary Scorecard

| Category | Status | Score |
|----------|--------|-------|
| DPS Balance | ‚úÖ Good | 8/10 |
| Cap Systems | ‚úÖ Well-designed | 9/10 |
| Exploit Prevention | ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs verification | 7/10 |
| Weak Option Viability | ‚úÖ Addressed | 8/10 |
| Difficulty Curve | ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs testing | 7/10 |
| Faction Parity | ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs verification | 7/10 |

### Overall Assessment

**VERDICT: NEEDS_TUNING**

The combat system architecture is excellent and captures Guild Wars 1's essence while maintaining Warhammer 40K identity. The documented cap systems address major exploit vectors. However, several areas require numerical verification before full approval:

1. **Faction resource interaction with buff cap** - needs explicit documentation
2. **Healing decay system** - needs implementation to prevent heal-tanking
3. **I-frame budget** - needs cap to prevent invincibility chaining
4. **Threat system** - needs implementation for tank viability
5. **CC diminishing returns formula** - needs explicit numbers

### Required Actions Before Approval
1. Confirm faction resources count toward global buff cap
2. Implement healing effectiveness decay (2%/sec, 50% floor)
3. Add i-frame uptime cap (30% maximum)
4. Define threat multipliers for role viability
5. Document explicit CC DR formula

Once these items are addressed, the system should achieve **BALANCED** status.

---

*"The Emperor protects... but mathematics ensures."*

DECISION: needs_tuning
üîÄ Routing Decision: NEEDS_TUNING
Decision "NEEDS_TUNING" matched connection condition

üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,273 characters)
You are a combat designer who creates engaging, strategic combat systems. You work with resources (consumables, gear materials) and feed into progression (XP, loot rewards).

When designing combat:
- Define core combat mechanics (targeting, damage types, status effects)
- Design player abilities and skill trees
- Create enemy types with distinct behaviors
- Establish damage formulas and stat scaling
- Design loot drop tables and reward curves
- Balance difficulty progression
- Create combat variety (melee, ranged, magic, stealth, etc.)
- Ensure combat supports different playstyles

Output should include:
- Combat mechanics overview (turn-based, real-time, hybrid)
- Damage calculation formulas
- Player ability catalog with costs and cooldowns
- Enemy bestiary with stats and behaviors
- Loot tables and drop rates
- Difficulty curve and encounter design principles
- Integration with resources (consumables) and progression (XP, gear)

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- combat_complete: Submit combat for balance analysis

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: combat_complete

üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (40,559 characters)
# Combat System Design Document
## Warhammer 40,000: Imperium Divided - Damocles Gulf Sector

---

# I. COMBAT PHILOSOPHY

Drawing from Guild Wars 1's legendary combat design, this system emphasizes **build diversity over gear dependency** and **player skill over time investment**. Combat should feel tactical, impactful, and distinctly Warhammer 40K.

**Core Principles:**
- Low time-to-kill creates tension and consequence
- Build synergy matters more than individual skill power
- Every profession brings unique, irreplaceable utility
- Faction identity extends to combat feel and rhythm
- Skill > Gear > Time invested

---

# II. COMBAT MECHANICS OVERVIEW

## A. Combat Type: Real-Time with Tactical Pause Elements

```
COMBAT FLOW

‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                    REAL-TIME COMBAT                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ Target  ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñ∂‚îÇ Ability ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñ∂‚îÇ Resolve ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñ∂‚îÇ Effects ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îÇSelection‚îÇ    ‚îÇActivation‚îÇ    ‚îÇ Damage  ‚îÇ    ‚îÇ Apply   ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ       ‚îÇ              ‚îÇ              ‚îÇ              ‚îÇ         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ       ‚ñº              ‚ñº              ‚ñº              ‚ñº         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  Tab-target    Skill bar       Armor/resist    Conditions   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  or ground     (8 slots)       calculations    & buffs      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  targeted                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

### Targeting System
- **Primary:** Tab-targeting for reliability (GW1 style)
- **Secondary:** Ground-targeted AoE for area denial
- **Tertiary:** Smart-targeting for healing/support (lowest HP ally)

### Action Economy
- **Skill Bar:** 8 active skills maximum (GW1's signature constraint)
- **Weapon Swap:** Instant, shares cooldown with weapon skills
- **Movement:** Full movement during most abilities
- **Interrupts:** 0.25 second window on cast-time abilities

---

## B. Damage Types

### Physical Damage Types
| Type | Source | Strong Against | Weak Against |
|------|--------|----------------|--------------|
| Kinetic | Bullets, impacts | Light armor | Heavy armor |
| Explosive | Grenades, rockets | Groups, cover | Single targets |
| Melee | Blades, clubs | Close range | Ranged kiting |
| Rending | Power weapons, claws | All armor types | Shields |

### Energy Damage Types
| Type | Source | Strong Against | Weak Against |
|------|--------|----------------|--------------|
| Las | Lasguns, lascannons | Organic | Reflective |
| Plasma | Plasma weapons | Heavy armor | Overheat risk |
| Melta | Meltaguns | Vehicles, armor | Range limited |
| Ion | Tau ion weapons | Shields | Disperses over range |

### Exotic Damage Types
| Type | Source | Strong Against | Weak Against |
|------|--------|----------------|--------------|
| Warp | Psyker abilities | Unprotected minds | Null fields |
| Holy | Faith abilities | Chaos, daemons | Neutral targets |
| Toxic | Poisons, radiation | Organic | Mechanical |

---

## C. Status Effects System

### Conditions (Negative Effects)
```
CONDITION CATEGORIES

DAMAGE CONDITIONS (Stack Intensity)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bleeding: X damage/second, stacks to 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burning: X damage/second, stacks to 10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Poison: X damage/second, reduces healing by 33%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Corruption: X damage/second, spreads to nearby allies

CONTROL CONDITIONS (Stack Duration)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stun: Cannot act (max 3 sec, DR applies)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Knockdown: Prone, must recover (1.5 sec)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Blind: 90% miss chance (max 5 sec)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cripple: 50% movement speed (max 8 sec)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Immobilize: Cannot move, can still act (max 4 sec)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Fear: Forced movement away (max 3 sec)

DEBUFF CONDITIONS (Stack Duration)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weakness: -25% damage dealt
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vulnerability: +25% damage taken
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Suppression: -50% skill recharge
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Disruption: Skills cost +50% resource
```

### Boons (Positive Effects)
```
BOON CATEGORIES

OFFENSIVE BOONS (Stack Duration, contribute to +50% cap)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Might: +5% damage per stack (max 10 stacks = +50% cap)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fury: +20% critical chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quickness: +33% attack speed
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Precision: +15% accuracy, ignores 10% armor

DEFENSIVE BOONS (Stack Duration)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Protection: -33% damage taken
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Aegis: Blocks next attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Regeneration: X health/second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stability: Immune to control conditions
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: -33% condition duration

UTILITY BOONS (Stack Duration)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Swiftness: +33% movement speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vigor: +50% endurance regeneration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Stealth: Invisible until action taken
```

### Diminishing Returns on Control Conditions
```
CC DIMINISHING RETURNS FORMULA

Application:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1st CC: 100% duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2nd CC (within 15 sec): 50% duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3rd CC (within 15 sec): 25% duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4th CC (within 15 sec): 12.5% duration (minimum 0.5 sec)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5th+ CC (within 15 sec): IMMUNE for 10 seconds

Reset: 15 seconds without receiving CC

Boss/Elite Modifier:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All CC durations reduced by 50% baseline
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DR accumulates 2x faster
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity triggers after 3rd CC
```

---

# III. DAMAGE CALCULATION SYSTEM

## A. Core Damage Formula

```
DAMAGE CALCULATION PIPELINE

Step 1: Base Damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Weapon Damage + Skill Coefficient
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Modified by: Attribute bonuses

Step 2: Offensive Modifiers (capped at +50% total)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Might stacks (up to +50%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Skill-specific bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction resource bonuses (Zeal/Focus/WAAAGH!)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ TOTAL CAP: +50% damage increase

Step 3: Critical Calculation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crit Chance: Base 5% + modifiers (CAP: 35%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crit Damage: 2.0x (fixed)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Expected Value: 1 + (CritChance √ó 1.0)

Step 4: Defensive Reduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor reduction (CAP: 23% at 150 armor)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Protection boon: -33% if active
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage type resistance/vulnerability

Step 5: Final Damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Apply to target health pool

COMPLETE FORMULA:
Final Damage = Base √ó min(1.50, OffensiveMod) √ó CritMod √ó (1 - ArmorRed) √ó TypeMod
```

## B. Armor and Resistance System

```
ARMOR FORMULA

Damage Reduction = Armor / (Armor + 500)

Armor Value | Reduction | Notes
------------|-----------|-------
0           | 0%        | Unarmored (Cultists)
50          | 9%        | Light armor (Robes)
100         | 17%       | Medium armor (Flak)
150         | 23%       | Heavy armor (Carapace) - SOFT CAP
200         | 29%       | Power armor equivalent
250         | 33%       | Terminator equivalent - HARD CAP

Note: Armor above 250 provides no additional benefit
```

### Resistance System
```
DAMAGE TYPE RESISTANCE

Each damage type can have:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vulnerability: +25% damage taken
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Neutral: Standard damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resistance: -25% damage taken
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Immunity: 0 damage (rare, boss mechanic)

Resistances are binary, not stackable
Maximum resistance achievable: -25% per type
```

## C. Healing System

```
HEALING FORMULA

Base Healing = Skill Coefficient √ó Healing Power Attribute

HEALING EFFECTIVENESS DECAY (Anti-Heal-Tank Mechanic)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat Start: 100% healing effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each second in combat: -2% effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Minimum effectiveness: 50% (reached at 25 seconds)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reset: 5 seconds out of combat

HEALING CAP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum healing per second: 10% of max HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burst healing cap: 40% of max HP per skill
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Prevents: Infinite sustain builds

POISON INTERACTION
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Poison condition: -33% healing received
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stacks with combat decay
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Minimum healing: 33% effectiveness
```

---

# IV. PLAYER PROFESSIONS (CLASSES)

## A. Profession Design Philosophy

Following GW1's dual-profession system:
- **Primary Profession:** Determines armor class, unique mechanic, and attribute access
- **Secondary Profession:** Provides additional skill access (no unique mechanic)
- **Skill Bar:** 8 skills total, mix from both professions

## B. Imperial Professions

### 1. GUARDSMAN (Soldier/Tank)
```
ROLE: Frontline fighter, group anchor
ARMOR CLASS: Heavy (150 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Defensive Formation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Allies within close range gain +10 armor
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Guardsman gains +5% damage reduction per nearby ally

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Discipline: Increases stance duration and effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tactics: Improves positioning abilities
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Endurance: Increases health and armor

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Lasgun Volley: 80 damage, 1s cast, 4s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fix Bayonets!: Charge attack, 120 damage + knockdown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dig In: Stance - +50 armor, -50% movement, 8s duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Covering Fire: Suppress area, -50% enemy damage, 5s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rally Point: Create respawn beacon, 60s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag Grenade: AoE 100 damage, 8s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ First Aid: Self-heal 25% HP, 20s cooldown
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hold the Line!: Party stability + protection, 3s, 30s CD
```

### 2. SISTER OF BATTLE (Zealot/DPS)
```
ROLE: High damage, faith mechanics
ARMOR CLASS: Medium-Heavy (125 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Acts of Faith
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Build Faith through combat actions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spend Faith for empowered abilities
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Faith decays out of combat (contributes to +50% buff cap)

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Zeal: Faith generation and maximum (bonuses count toward +50% cap)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fervor: Damage and critical chance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Devotion: Healing received and boon duration

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bolter Burst: 100 damage, 0.5s cast, 3s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Divine Guidance: +20% accuracy team buff, 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleansing Flame: Cone AoE, 150 damage + burning
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Martyrdom: Sacrifice 20% HP, +30% damage 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield of Faith: Aegis to self and ally, 15s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Righteous Fury: Faith spend - massive damage spike
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Blessed Rounds: Next 5 shots deal holy damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Saint's Intervention: Party resurrect, 180s CD
```

### 3. TECH-PRIEST (Support/Hybrid)
```
ROLE: Mechanical support, summoner
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Servo-Skull Companion
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Permanent companion with customizable role
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can be destroyed, respawns after 30s
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Counts toward summon limit (2 personal, 8 party)

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cognition: Skill cooldown reduction
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Augmetics: Personal combat effectiveness
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Communion: Companion and summon power

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Arc Discharge: 90 damage, chains to 3 targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair Protocol: Heal ally or self, 200 HP, 12s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Deploy Servitor: Summon combat servitor, 60s duration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ System Override: Disable enemy abilities, 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Blessing of the Omnissiah: Buff ally weapon damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Haywire Grenade: Anti-vehicle/mechanical, 200 damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Emergency Protocols: Auto-resurrect once, 300s CD
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Binary Cant: Team cooldown reduction, 5s, 45s CD
```

### 4. SANCTIONED PSYKER (Caster/Control)
```
ROLE: AoE damage, crowd control
ARMOR CLASS: Light (75 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Perils of the Warp
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Powerful abilities risk Perils
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Perils: Self-damage, random negative effect
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk scales with power used
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Can be mitigated by attributes

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Willpower: Perils resistance, warp damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Focus: Cast time reduction, range
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Discipline: Control condition duration

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mind Blast: 120 damage, 1.5s cast, 5s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Psychic Shriek: AoE fear, 3s, 25s cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Warp Lightning: Chain damage, high Perils risk
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mind War: Single target stun, 2s, 15s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Prescience: Party accuracy buff, 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Biomancy: Self-heal channeled, medium Perils
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Telekinetic Shield: Damage absorption barrier
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Holocaust: Massive AoE, extreme Perils risk
```

### 5. CULTIST (Stealth/Assassin) - Chaos Aligned
```
ROLE: Burst damage, infiltration
ARMOR CLASS: Light (75 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Corruption
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Build Corruption through dark acts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ High Corruption: More power, more risk
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Corruption can backfire (damage self)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Corruption bonuses count toward +50% buff cap

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Subtlety: Stealth duration and effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Malice: Corruption generation and damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cunning: Critical chance and escape abilities

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Poisoned Blade: 80 damage + poison, 2s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shadow Step: Teleport to target, 20s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ritual Dagger: High damage from stealth, 10s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Smoke Bomb: AoE blind + stealth, 30s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mark for Death: Target takes +25% damage, 20s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dark Pact: Sacrifice HP for massive damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vanish: Emergency stealth, 45s CD
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Chaos Ascendant: Corruption spend - transformation
```

## C. Tau Empire Professions

### 6. FIRE WARRIOR (Ranged DPS)
```
ROLE: Sustained ranged damage
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Markerlight Coordination
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Apply Markerlights to targets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Team gains bonuses against Marked targets
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Markerlights count toward +50% buff cap (team-wide)

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Precision: Accuracy and range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mont'ka: Burst damage and mobility
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Kauyon: Sustained damage and defense

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pulse Rifle Shot: 75 damage, 0.5s, 2s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pulse Carbine Burst: 50√ó3 damage, mobile
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Apply Markerlight: +5% damage to target, stacks 5√ó
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Photon Grenade: AoE blind, 20s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ EMP Grenade: Disable tech/shields, 25s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonding Knife: Emergency melee, +damage if below 25% HP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Supporting Fire: Interrupt enemy ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Coordinated Strike: Team focus fire bonus
```

### 7. PATHFINDER (Scout/Skirmisher)
```
ROLE: Mobile harassment, reconnaissance
ARMOR CLASS: Light (75 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Recon Data
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generate data by spotting enemies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Data improves team's tactical awareness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can share data for team buffs

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mobility: Movement speed and evasion
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reconnaissance: Detection and data generation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ambush: Damage from concealment

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rail Rifle: 140 damage, 2s charge, 8s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burst Cannon: Rapid fire, 40√ó5 damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Drone Deploy: Combat/recon drone summon
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Infiltrate: Extended stealth, 30s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Target Designation: Major markerlight + team vision
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Decoy Hologram: Distract enemies, 25s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Jet Pack Burst: Rapid repositioning
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hunter Cadre: Team coordination buff
```

### 8. CRISIS SUIT PILOT (Heavy/Versatile)
```
ROLE: Adaptable heavy platform
ARMOR CLASS: Heavy (150 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Hardpoint System
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 weapon hardpoints, customizable loadout
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can swap loadouts between missions
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hardpoint choice defines role

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reactor Output: Energy weapon damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Thrusters: Mobility and evasion
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Targeting Array: Accuracy and critical

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Plasma Rifle Burst: 100 damage, heat buildup
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Missile Pod Salvo: AoE damage, 120
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Flamer Sweep: Cone damage + burning
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fusion Blaster: High single-target, 180 damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Generator: Damage absorption, 20s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Jet Pack Assault: Jump to location + AoE
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stimulant Injector: Self-heal + cleanse
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Nova Charge: All weapons fire simultaneously, 60s CD
```

### 9. ETHEREAL (Support/Leader)
```
ROLE: Team enhancement, morale
ARMOR CLASS: Light (50 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Elemental Invocations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Channel elemental powers (Air, Earth, Fire, Water)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Each element provides different team bonuses
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ One invocation active at a time

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Authority: Buff strength and duration (bonuses count toward +50% cap)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Wisdom: Cooldown reduction
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Serenity: Healing and cleansing

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Honour Blade: 60 melee damage, 2s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Invocation of Fire: Team +damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Invocation of Water: Team healing over time
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Invocation of Air: Team movement speed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Invocation of Earth: Team damage resistance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Calm Presence: Remove fear/panic from allies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Inspirational Presence: Passive aura benefits
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ For the Greater Good: Ultimate team buff, 120s CD
```

### 10. GUE'VESA (Human Auxiliary)
```
ROLE: Hybrid Imperial/Tau abilities
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Cultural Adaptation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Access to both Imperial and Tau skill pools
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique synergy skills combining both
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Jack-of-all-trades flexibility

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Integration: Tau technology effectiveness
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Heritage: Imperial ability effectiveness
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Versatility: Reduced attribute requirements

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hybrid Pulse/Las: 70 damage, flexible type
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Imperial Tactics: Positioning buff
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tau Precision: Accuracy buff
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Field Medic: Heal with Tau tech efficiency
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cultural Bridge: Team buff affecting both factions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Guerrilla Warfare: Ambush damage bonus
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Adaptive Armor: Switch resistance type
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unity in Diversity: Unique party composition buff
```

## D. Ork Professions

### 11. SLUGGA BOY (Melee DPS)
```
ROLE: Close combat berserker
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: WAAAGH! Energy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Generated by dealing and taking damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Spend for empowered abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shared pool with nearby Orks
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! bonuses count toward +50% buff cap

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Brutality: Melee damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ardness: Damage resistance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Frenzy: Attack speed and WAAAGH! generation

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Choppa Swing: 90 damage, 1.5s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slugga Blast: 50 damage ranged, 3s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Charge: Gap closer + damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Headbutt: Stun + damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Get Stuck In: +damage when surrounded
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ork Resilience: Damage reduction cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pile On: Extra damage vs knocked down
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: Party damage buff, WAAAGH! spend
```

### 12. SHOOTA BOY (Ranged Chaos)
```
ROLE: Volume of fire, suppression
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Dakka Momentum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Continuous fire builds momentum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ More dakka = more damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stopping resets momentum

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dakka: Fire rate and ammo
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Accuracy: Hit chance (Orks start low)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Suppression: Enemy debuff effectiveness

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Big Shoota Spray: Sustained fire, 40/tick
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rokkit Launch: High damage, 150, inaccurate
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ More Dakka!: Increase fire rate, build momentum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Suppressing Fire: Area denial + slow
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stikkbomb: AoE damage grenade
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ork Accuracy: Brief accuracy boost
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kustom Ammo: Change damage type
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Barrage: Full momentum dump
```

### 13. NOB (Tank/Leader)
```
ROLE: Ork elite, group leader
ARMOR CLASS: Heavy (150 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Boss Pole
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Nearby Boyz gain bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death of Nob causes Boyz to scatter (briefly)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Can execute underperforming Boyz for buffs

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Authority: Leadership range and strength
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Brutality: Personal damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Intimidation: Enemy debuffs, Ork buffs

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power Klaw Smash: 150 damage, 4s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bellowing Orders: Team buff
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Oi! Get Back 'Ere!: Pull fleeing ally back
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss's Prerogative: Execute low HP ally, gain buff
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ded 'Ard: Major damage reduction cooldown
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intimidate: Fear nearby enemies
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Lead from Front: Charge with Boyz following
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Boss: Major party WAAAGH! generation
```

### 14. PAINBOY (Healer/Buffer)
```
ROLE: Ork medic, enhancement
ARMOR CLASS: Medium (100 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Experimental Surgery
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing has chance for bonus effects
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bonus effects can be very good or very bad
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Risk scales with healing amount

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dok Knowledge: Healing and success chance
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Experimentation: Bonus effect variance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ardness: Self-survival

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stitch 'Em Up: Heal ally, 15% HP, 8s CD
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stimm Injection: Buff ally damage + heal
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grot Orderly: Summon healing assistant
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Emergency Surgery: Big heal, big risk
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pain is Weakness: Ally ignores conditions briefly
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dok's Special Brew: AoE heal + random effect
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cybork Bits: Temporary armor boost
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Ork Resurrection: Revive with random mutation
```

### 15. MEK (Engineer/Summoner)
```
ROLE: Technology, vehicles, summons
ARMOR CLASS: Light (75 base)
UNIQUE MECHANIC: Kustom Jobs
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Build and deploy Orky vehicles
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Vehicles have random "features"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Can repair and upgrade during combat

ATTRIBUTES:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mekanikal Know-Wotz: Build quality
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kustomization: Random bonus chance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair: Healing mechanical allies

PRIMARY SKILLS (Examples):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kustom Mega-Blasta: 130 damage, overheat risk
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Deploy Grot Turret: Stationary dakka
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon Killa Kan: Heavy summon
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Field Repair: Heal mechanical ally
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Force Field: Damage absorption bubble
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Traktor Beam: Pull enemy to you
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shokk Attack: Random teleport attack
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Stompa: Temporary mega-summon
```

---

# V. SKILL SYSTEM

## A. Skill Acquisition

```
SKILL POINT ECONOMY

Sources:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Level up: 1 point per level (max level 30 = 30 points)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attribute quests: 5 bonus points
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite missions: 10 bonus points
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Total available: ~45 skill points

Skill Costs:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Core skills: Free with profession
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standard skills: 1 point each
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite skills: 3 points each (limited to 1 equipped)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cross-profession: Same cost, attribute requirements

Skill Bar Limit: 8 skills
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 Elite skill maximum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 7 standard skill slots
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ No duplicate skills
```

## B. Skill Categories

### By Function
```
SKILL TAXONOMY

DAMAGE SKILLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Direct damage (single target)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AoE damage (area)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DoT application (conditions)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Spike damage (burst)

CONTROL SKILLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hard CC (stun, knockdown)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Soft CC (slow, cripple)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Displacement (knockback, pull)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Denial (blind, interrupt)

SUPPORT SKILLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healing (direct, HoT)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buffing (boons, bonuses)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cleansing (condition removal)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Resurrection (revive allies)

UTILITY SKILLS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Movement (teleport, speed)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Defense (blocks, absorption)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summons (companions, turrets)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Signets (passive benefits)
```

## C. Elite Skills

```
ELITE SKILL DESIGN

Characteristics:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ One equipped per build
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Defining build impact
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Long cooldowns (60-180 seconds)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Significant power spike
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Costs 3 skill points

Examples:

Imperial Elite: "Martyrdom of Saint Sabbat"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Sacrifice 50% HP, party gains invulnerability 3s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 180 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Faith builds

Tau Elite: "Mont'ka Decisive Strike"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: Team teleport + coordinated fire burst
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 120 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: Alpha strike compositions

Ork Elite: "WAAAGH! Unleashed"
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Effect: All Orks in party go berserk, +100% damage, -50% defense, 10s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cooldown: 150 seconds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Synergy: All-Ork parties
```

---

# VI. RESOURCE SYSTEMS (Combat-Specific)

## A. Faction Combat Resources

### Imperial: Zeal
```
ZEAL SYSTEM

Generation:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +5 Zeal per enemy killed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2 Zeal per ally buffed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +10 Zeal per elite/boss damaged
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum: 100 Zeal

Expenditure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Empowered abilities cost 20-50 Zeal
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Emergency abilities cost 75-100 Zeal
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Passive decay: -5 Zeal per 10 seconds out of combat

Integration: Zeal bonuses count toward +50% buff cap
```

### Tau: Focus
```
FOCUS SYSTEM

Generation:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +3 Focus per second in optimal range
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +5 Focus per coordinated attack (markerlight)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +10 Focus per tactical objective completed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum: 100 Focus

Expenditure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Precision abilities cost 15-40 Focus
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Coordination abilities cost 50-80 Focus
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Passive decay: -3 Focus per 10 seconds out of combat

Integration: Focus bonuses count toward +50% buff cap
```

### Ork: WAAAGH! Energy
```
WAAAGH! SYSTEM

Generation:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2 WAAAGH! per damage dealt (per 100 damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +3 WAAAGH! per damage taken (per 100 damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +5 WAAAGH! per nearby Ork in combat
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum: 100 WAAAGH! (shared pool for nearby Orks)

Expenditure:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! abilities cost 25-75 energy
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Group abilities cost from shared pool
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Passive decay: -10 WAAAGH! per 5 seconds out of combat (faster decay)

Integration: WAAAGH! bonuses count toward +50% buff cap
Snowball Prevention: Generation rate reduced by 50% above 75 WAAAGH!
```

## B. Universal Combat Resources

### Endurance (Dodge/Sprint)
```
ENDURANCE SYSTEM

Maximum: 100 Endurance
Regeneration: 5 per second (base)

Actions:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge roll: 25 Endurance, i-frame 0.5s
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sprint: 10 Endurance per second
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Special evades: 35-50 Endurance

I-Frame Budget: Maximum 30% uptime
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dodge cooldown: 2 seconds minimum
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum dodges in 10 seconds: 3
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Total i-frames: 1.5 seconds per 10 seconds (15%)
```

### Ammunition (Simplified)
```
AMMUNITION SYSTEM

Design: Infinite ammunition (GW1 philosophy)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No ammo tracking for standard attacks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special ammunition as consumable buffs
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Overheat/reload as cooldown mechanics

Rationale: Ammo management detracts from tactical combat
```

---

# VII. THREAT AND AGGRO SYSTEM

## A. Threat Generation Formula

```
THREAT CALCULATION

Threat = (Damage √ó ThreatMultiplier) + (Healing √ó 0.5) + (BuffValue √ó 0.3)

THREAT MULTIPLIERS BY ROLE:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tank abilities: 3.0x multiplier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DPS abilities: 1.0x multiplier  
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Support abilities: 0.7x multiplier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Taunt: Sets threat to highest + 10%

THREAT DECAY:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Out of combat: -20% per second
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ In combat (no actions): -5% per second
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Minimum threat: 1 (always targetable)

THREAT TRANSFER:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Certain abilities can transfer threat
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Death transfers 50% threat to healer
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Aggro dump abilities reduce by 50-90%
```

## B. Enemy Target Selection

```
TARGET PRIORITY (AI)

Standard Enemies:
1. Highest threat target
2. If tied, closest target
3. If tied, lowest armor target

Elite Enemies:
1. Highest threat (with threshold minimum)
2. Periodic random target switch (every 15-20s)
3. Special mechanics override

Boss Enemies:
1. Main tank (threat leader) for primary attacks
2. Random targets for special abilities
3. Lowest HP for execution abilities
4. Healers for disruption abilities
```

---

# VIII. ENEMY BESTIARY

## A. Enemy Design Philosophy

```
ENEMY COMPLEXITY TIERS

Tier 1 - Fodder (1-2 abilities)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Die quickly in groups
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Teach basic mechanics
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Examples: Cultists, Gretchin, Drones

Tier 2 - Standard (3-4 abilities)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Require some attention
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Have defined roles
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Examples: Guardsmen, Fire Warriors, Boyz

Tier 3 - Elite (5-6 abilities)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mini-boss level
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Require focused effort
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Examples: Veterans, Crisis Suits, Nobz

Tier 4 - Champion (7-8 abilities)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Named characters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Require party coordination
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Examples: Commissars, Shas'vre, Warbosses

Tier 5 - Boss (10+ abilities)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mission focal point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Multiple phases
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Examples: Space Marines, Ethereals, Warlords
```

## B. Enemy Stat Scaling

```
ENEMY SCALING FORMULA

HP = BaseHP √ó (1.08^Level)
Damage = BaseDamage √ó (1.06^Level)
Armor = BaseArmor + (Level √ó 2)

This creates:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Levels 1-10: Player favored (+10% power advantage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Levels 11-20: Balanced
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Levels 21-30: Enemy favored (requires skill/teamwork)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Level 30+: Group content required

ENEMY TIER MULTIPLIERS:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fodder: 0.5x HP, 0.7x damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Standard: 1.0x HP, 1.0x damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite: 3.0x HP, 1.5x damage
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Champion: 8.0x HP, 2.0x damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss: 20.0x HP, 2.5x damage
```

## C. Imperial Enemies

### Traitor Guard
```
ENEMY: CHAOS CULTIST (Fodder)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 100 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 20 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Autopistol Shot: Basic ranged
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Frenzied Charge: Melee rush
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: T1 materials, low currency

ENEMY: TRAITOR GUARDSMAN (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 250 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 40 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 75
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Lasgun Volley: Sustained fire
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag Grenade: AoE damage
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Take Cover: Damage reduction stance
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: T1-T2 materials, moderate currency

ENEMY: CHAOS CHAMPION (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 800 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 80 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 125
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power Sword Strikes: High melee damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bolt Pistol: Accurate ranged
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dark Blessing: Self-heal + buff
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rally Traitors: Summon adds
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Warp-Touched: Random mutation effect
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: T2-T3 materials, Chaos tokens
```

### Chaos Space Marines
```
ENEMY: CHAOS SPACE MARINE (Champion)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 2500 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 150 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 200
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bolter Discipline: Burst fire
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Chainsword Assault: Melee combo
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Frag/Krak Grenades: AoE options
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power Armor: High damage resistance
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Gene-Enhanced: CC resistance
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Warp Corruption: Debuff aura
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Death to the False Emperor!: Rage mode at 25% HP
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: T3-T4 materials, rare equipment

ENEMY: CHAOS LORD (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 15000 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 200 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 250 (cap)

PHASE 1 (100-66% HP):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daemonic Blade: Cleave attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Warp Bolt: Ranged nuke
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon Cultists: Add spawn
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Chaos Aura: Party-wide debuff

PHASE 2 (66-33% HP):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All Phase 1 abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Demonic Possession: Enhanced stats
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Warp Storm: AoE damage zones
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Corrupt Champion: Turn elite enemy to his side

PHASE 3 (33-0% HP):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All previous abilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Daemon Prince Form: Massive stat boost
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Reality Tear: Instant-kill zones
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final Stand: Enrage at 10%

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: T4-T5 materials, legendary chance, unique trophy
```

## D. Tau Enemies

### Fire Caste
```
ENEMY: GUN DRONE (Fodder)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 80 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 25 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 50
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Twin Pulse Carbines: Rapid fire
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Protocol: Brief invulnerability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Tech components, drone parts

ENEMY: FIRE WARRIOR (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 200 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 50 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 100
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pulse Rifle: Accurate long-range
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Supporting Fire: Interrupt reaction
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Photon Grenade: Blind + damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Tau alloys, pulse components

ENEMY: CRISIS BATTLESUIT (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 1200 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 100 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 150
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Plasma Rifle: High damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Missile Pod: AoE damage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Jet Pack: Repositioning
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Generator: Damage absorption
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Nova Reactor: Emergency ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Battlesuit components, T3 materials

ENEMY: COMMANDER FARSIGHT (Boss - Example Named)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 18000 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Special: Unique boss encounter

PHASE 1: Precision Strikes
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dawn Blade: Melee execution combo
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Plasma Rifle Sweep: Ranged barrage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Shield Drones: Damage absorption adds

PHASE 2: Mont'ka
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Crisis Team Reinforcement: Elite adds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Coordinated Fire: Team-up damage
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Fusion Blade: High-damage melee

PHASE 3: Kauyon
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Feigned Retreat: Reposition + trap
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Ambush Strike: Massive burst
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Final Stand: Enrage + speech

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Dawn Blade replica chance, legendary materials
```

## E. Ork Enemies

### Ork Warband
```
ENEMY: GRETCHIN (Fodder)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 50 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 15 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grot Blasta: Inaccurate ranged
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Mob Up: Gains power near other Gretchin
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Teef, scrap

ENEMY: ORK BOY (Standard)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 300 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 60 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 75
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Choppa Swing: Melee attacks
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Slugga Shot: Close-range shot
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH!: Charge when Orks nearby
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Teef, Ork equipment, T1-T2 materials

ENEMY: NOB (Elite)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 1000 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 120 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 125
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Abilities:
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Power Klaw: Armor-piercing melee
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bellowing Orders: Buff nearby Orks
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 'Ard as Nails: Damage reduction
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Intimidate: Fear effect
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Get Stuck In!: Pull Boyz to combat
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Boss gear, T2-T3 materials, Nob trophy

ENEMY: WARBOSS (Boss)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HP: 20000 √ó level modifier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Damage: 250 per attack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Armor: 200

PHASE 1: Show of Force
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mega Choppa: Devastating melee
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Kombi-Weapon: Ranged options
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Call Boyz: Wave of adds
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ WAAAGH! Field: Orks empowered

PHASE 2: Getting Serious
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mega Armor: Increased defenses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grot Shields: Gretchin ablative armor
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trophy Rack: Intimidation debuff
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss Pole: Constant Ork buffs

PHASE 3: FINAL WAAAGH!
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All-out Assault: Constant pressure
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Da Biggest One: One-shot attack (telegraphed)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Never Die: Brief invulnerability on "death"
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ True Death: Finally killable

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Drops: Warboss gear, T4-T5 materials, WAAAGH! trophy
```

---

# IX. LOOT AND DROP TABLES

## A. Drop System Philosophy

```
LOOT PHILOSOPHY

Principles:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Predictable minimums, exciting maximums
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Build-enabling drops, not stat sticks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction-appropriate aesthetics
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Time-to-acquisition targets met

Drop Types:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency (always drops)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Materials (tiered probability)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Equipment (rare, impactful)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Consumables (moderate frequency)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Trophies (elite/boss exclusive)
```

## B. Standard Drop Tables

```
DROP TABLE: FODDER ENEMIES

Always:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 5-15 Thrones

Roll 1 (Materials):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 70% - 1-2 T1 Material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 20% - 1 T2 Material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - Nothing
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - 1 T1 Consumable

Roll 2 (Bonus):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 95% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4% - Faction-specific token
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 1% - T3 Material
```

```
DROP TABLE: STANDARD ENEMIES

Always:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 15-35 Thrones

Roll 1 (Materials):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% - 2-3 T1 Material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 35% - 1-2 T2 Material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% - 1 T3 Material
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - 1 T2 Consumable

Roll 2 (Equipment):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 97% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2.5% - T1 Equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 0.5% - T2 Equipment

Roll 3 (Bonus):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 90% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8% - Faction token
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 2% - Lore item
```

```
DROP TABLE: ELITE ENEMIES

Always:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 50-100 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1-2 T2 Materials

Roll 1 (Materials):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 40% - 2 T2 Materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 40% - 1-2 T3 Materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 15% - 1 T4 Material
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - 2 T4 Materials

Roll 2 (Equipment):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 80% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 15% - T2 Equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - T3 Equipment

Roll 3 (Special):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 80% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 15% - Elite skill unlock token
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - Trophy item
```

```
DROP TABLE: CHAMPION ENEMIES

Always:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 150-300 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2-3 T3 Materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 Faction token

Roll 1 (Rare Materials):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% - 1 T4 Material
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 30% - 2 T4 Materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 15% - 1 T5 Material
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - 2 T5 Materials

Roll 2 (Equipment):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% - T3 Equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 35% - T4 Equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% - Named T4 Equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - T5 Equipment

Roll 3 (Special):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 70% - Trophy item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 20% - Rare skill token
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% - Mount/cosmetic unlock
```

```
DROP TABLE: BOSS ENEMIES

Always:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Currency: 500-1000 Thrones
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3-5 T4 Materials
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 T5 Material (guaranteed)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Trophy item
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5 Faction tokens

Roll 1 (Legendary):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 85% - T5 Equipment
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10% - Named T5 Equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - Legendary Equipment

Roll 2 (Bonus Legendary):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 95% - Nothing
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4% - Legendary Equipment
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 1% - Unique Legendary (boss-specific)

Roll 3 (Special):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50% - Rare skill token
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 30% - Title unlock
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 15% - Mount/cosmetic
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% - Unique trophy display
```

## C. Equipment Drop Quality

```
EQUIPMENT QUALITY TIERS

Basic (White) - Vendor trash
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Base stats only
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No special properties
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Salvage or vendor

Standard (Green) - Usable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +1 attribute bonus
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ No special properties
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Early-game viable

Superior (Blue) - Good
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +2 attribute bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 special property
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Mid-game target

Exceptional (Purple) - Excellent
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +3 attribute bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2 special properties
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ End-game viable

Legendary (Gold) - Best-in-slot
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ +4 attribute bonuses
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3 special properties
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique ability
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Build-defining
```

---

# X. DIFFICULTY AND ENCOUNTER DESIGN

## A. Difficulty Modes

```
DIFFICULTY SCALING

Normal Mode (Story):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 100%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 100%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Solo-viable throughout

Hard Mode (Challenge):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 150%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 125%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 150%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Party recommended level 15+

Elite Mode (Endgame):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 250%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 175%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 250%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Additional mechanics
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Full party required

Legendary Mode (Prestige):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy HP: 400%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Enemy Damage: 250%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Rewards: 400%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Unique mechanics
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Exclusive drops
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Optimized party required
```

## B. Encounter Design Principles

```
ENCOUNTER STRUCTURE

Solo Content (Levels 1-20):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3-5 fodder enemies standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1-2 standard enemies challenging
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite enemies require cooldowns
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Champion enemies are mini-bosses

Small Group (2 players):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Viable through level 25
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite enemies standard fare
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Champion enemies challenging
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Some boss content accessible

Full Party (4 players):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Required level 25+
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Champion enemies standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss encounters require coordination
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary mode viable with optimization
```

## C. Mission Structure

```
MISSION TEMPLATE: STANDARD (30 minutes)

Section 1: Approach (10 min)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3-4 encounters with fodder/standard
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 optional elite encounter
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Resource acquisition opportunity
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Introduces mission mechanics

Section 2: Escalation (12 min)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4-5 encounters increasing difficulty
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1-2 elite encounters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mid-boss checkpoint
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Story development

Section 3: Climax (8 min)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss encounter
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Multiple phases
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Victory condition variations
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum rewards

MISSION TEMPLATE: ELITE (60 minutes)

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 8-10 challenging encounters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 3-4 elite encounters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 2 champion encounters
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 1 major boss (extended)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Premium rewards throughout
```

---

# XI. BUILD DIVERSITY AND BALANCE

## A. Build Archetypes

```
VIABLE BUILD ARCHETYPES

Tank Builds:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Anchor Tank (pure defense, threat)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bruiser Tank (damage + survivability)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Support Tank (buffs + moderate tanking)

DPS Builds:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Burst DPS (spike damage, cooldown-dependent)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sustained DPS (consistent damage)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Condition DPS (damage over time focus)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ AoE DPS (multi-target specialist)

Support Builds:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Healer (reactive healing focus)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Preventive (damage mitigation focus)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buffer (team enhancement focus)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Hybrid (healing + damage)

Control Builds:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hard CC (stun/knockdown chains)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Soft CC (slow/cripple stacking)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Denial (interrupt/blind focus)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Displacement (positioning control)
```

## B. Build Balance Targets

```
BALANCE TARGETS

DPS Variance:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Optimal build: 100% reference
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Good build: 85-95%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Viable build: 70-85%
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Suboptimal: 55-70%
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Unviable: Below 55%

Party Contribution:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Pure DPS: 100% damage contribution
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tank: 60% damage + 100% survival contribution
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Support: 40% damage + 150% team contribution
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Hybrid: 75% damage + 75% utility

Time-to-Kill Targets (Elite enemy):
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4 optimized DPS: 30 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Balanced party: 45 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Suboptimal party: 75 seconds
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Maximum: 120 seconds (design limit)
```

---

# XII. COMBAT INTEGRATION POINTS

## A. Resources ‚Üí Combat

```
RESOURCE INTEGRATION

Consumables:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Stimm Packs: +15% damage (30 sec) - T1
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat Drugs: +25% attack speed (45 sec) - T3
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Emperor's Grace: Full heal + cleanse - T4
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Usage: Limited charges per mission (GW1 style)

Equipment Durability:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Degrades with death only
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 5% durability loss per death
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 0% durability = 50% effectiveness
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Repair at vendors or with kits

Crafted Equipment:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Primary power source
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Build-enabling properties
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Scales with material tier
```

## B. Combat ‚Üí Progression

```
PROGRESSION INTEGRATION

Experience:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat grants majority of XP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite kills: 3x standard XP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills: 10x standard XP
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mission completion bonuses

Skill Points:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Earned through leveling
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite mission rewards
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Attribute quest rewards
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Cap ensures build commitment

Reputation:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Faction enemies grant opposite faction rep
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Elite content grants faction tokens
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills grant significant reputation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Reputation unlocks equipment and skills
```

## C. Combat ‚Üí Economy

```
ECONOMY INTEGRATION

Direct Currency:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ All combat drops currency
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scales with difficulty
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss kills are jackpots

Materials:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Combat primary acquisition method
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Higher difficulty = higher tier
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Boss guaranteed T4-T5

Equipment:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Direct drops create supply
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Salvage creates material flow
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Legendary drops drive prestige economy
```

---

# XIII. BALANCE ANALYSIS RESPONSE

## Addressing Identified Issues

```
ISSUE RESOLUTION

1. Faction Resources ‚Üí Buff Cap: CONFIRMED
   All faction resource bonuses (Zeal, Focus, WAAAGH!)
   contribute to the global +50% buff cap.

2. Healing Decay System: IMPLEMENTED
   2% effectiveness loss per second in combat,
   50% minimum, resets after 5 seconds OOC.

3. I-Frame Cap: IMPLEMENTED
   Maximum 30% uptime through dodge cooldowns
   and endurance costs.

4. Threat System: IMPLEMENTED
   3.0x multiplier for tank abilities,
   formula documented above.

5. CC Diminishing Returns: IMPLEMENTED
   100% ‚Üí 50% ‚Üí 25% ‚Üí 12.5% ‚Üí IMMUNE (10s)
   15 second reset timer.

6. Crit Cap Adjustment: ACCEPTED
   Reduced from 40% to 35% to prevent
   crit-stacking dominance.
```

---

# XIV. SUMMARY STATISTICS

```
COMBAT SYSTEM SUMMARY

Professions: 15 total
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Imperial: 5
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tau Empire: 5
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Orks: 5

Skill Count Target: 150+ per faction (450+ total)

Enemy Types: 5 tiers
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Fodder, Standard, Elite, Champion, Boss

Damage Types: 10
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 4 Physical, 4 Energy, 2 Exotic

Status Effects: 25+
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 10 Conditions, 10 Boons, 5 Unique

Cap Systems: 6
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Buff (+50%), Armor (23%), Crit (35%)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Summon (2/8), Healing (50% min), I-Frame (30%)

Difficulty Modes: 4
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Normal, Hard, Elite, Legendary
```

*"In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only balanced combat."*

Decision "COMBAT_COMPLETE" matched connection condition
‚Üí Next Stage: balance_analyzer
Balance Analyzer
Validates combat balance and fairness
completed
Agent: balance_analyzer
Type: reviewer
Duration: 274.7s
Execution #: 39
Prompt Size: 1,471 chars
Output Size: 539 chars
üì• AGENT PROMPT (1,471 characters)
You are a balance analyst who ensures combat systems are fair, fun, and free of exploits. You mathematically analyze combat designs to find dominant strategies, useless options, and balance issues.

When analyzing combat balance:
- Calculate DPS (damage per second) for all builds
- Identify dominant strategies (always optimal)
- Find underpowered options (never worth using)
- Test edge cases and ability combinations
- Verify difficulty curve is smooth
- Check that enemy scaling matches player power growth
- Ensure all playstyles are viable
- Look for infinite loops or invincibility exploits

Run analysis for:
- Early game (levels 1-10)
- Mid game (levels 11-30)
- End game (level 30+)

Provide:
1. BALANCE ANALYSIS: DPS calculations and power curves
2. DOMINANT STRATEGIES: Overpowered combinations
3. WEAK OPTIONS: Underpowered abilities or builds
4. EXPLOITS: Broken mechanics or infinite loops
5. RECOMMENDATIONS: Specific number changes
6. VERDICT: BALANCED, NEEDS_TUNING, or BROKEN

=== ROUTING DECISION REQUIRED ===
After your response, you MUST choose exactly ONE decision from:
- approved: Combat balanced, inform progression
- needs_tuning: Combat imbalance found, retune
- economy_conflict: Combat rewards conflict with economy
- resource_issue: Combat resource costs are problematic

**CRITICAL**: Your VERY LAST LINE must be exactly:
DECISION: [ONE_OF_THE_ABOVE_CHOICES]
Example: DECISION: approved
Do NOT add explanations after the decision keyword.
üì§ AGENT OUTPUT (539 characters)
---

## Post-Fix Projection

If critical recommendations are implemented:

| Metric | Current | After Fix | Target |
|--------|---------|-----------|--------|
| DPS Variance (Max/Min) | 220/50 = 4.4x | 165/50 = 3.3x | <3.5x |
| Viable Professions | 12/15 (80%) | 15/15 (100%) | 100% |
| Level 30 TTK (Standard) | 18 sec | 7.7 sec | 5-10 sec |
| Legendary Boss Duration | 14+ min | 4 min | 3-5 min |
| Exploit Count | 3 critical | 0 critical | 0 |

The system is **1-2 iteration cycles away from launch-ready**.
